font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">In the last four years,\nfake Indian currency notes worth more than &nbsp;Rs 2,600 crore have been pumped into India by Pakistan's\nISI to carry out Islamic terror activities. &nbsp;Only Rs 455 crore has been seized. Of this, Rs 55 crore was&nbsp; seized in foreign countries. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The fake currency,\nbeing made in Pakistan under the supervision of the ISI, and with the help of\nlatest technology and world-class standards, including the paper, the ink and\nthe watermark, looks so real that only an expert eye can detect it with the\nhelp of pink light.</span></i></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IeXrXkLMpg8/VGw7sW0FR7I/AAAAAAAAzRY/n35CNt0PK0k/s1600/IdentreifyFakeNote.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IeXrXkLMpg8/VGw7sW0FR7I/AAAAAAAAzRY/n35CNt0PK0k/s1600/IdentreifyFakeNote.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Here is a piece of news\nwhich came today . <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : Fake currency\nwith a total face value of Rs 12.85 crore was seized until September this year\nfrom countries such as Nepal, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Thailand and UAE, with\nPakistanis acting as carriers in most cases. A significant part of these\nseizures were made from outbound flights from Gulf nations, after they landed\nin destinations like Dhaka or Colombo :</span> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">While Pakistani\ncarriers were involved in six of the 13 cases of FICN seizures from abroad\nbetween January and September this year, Bangladeshis and Nepalese nationals\nwere involved in three cases each.&nbsp; UNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fake currency notes increases\ninflation , due to more money getting circulated in the economy - an unauthorised\nartificial increase in money supply. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This causes STRIKES for more wages , triggered\nby foreign funded TROJAN HORSE NGOs and national productivity loss . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People are not able to save much at the end of\nthe month . Fiscal deficit widens and govt has to prune social spending or\nspending spending on infrastructure or education or healthcare. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Govt is forced to take loans for planned and\nnonplanned expenditure.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cost of\nborrowing &nbsp;widens the fiscal deficit\nfurther.&nbsp;&nbsp; To trim excess money in\neconomy, the central bank has to hike up interest rates , and this makes loans\nbecome costly. &nbsp;All this causes a negative cascade effect .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Business houses halt their expansion plans.&nbsp;&nbsp; They also pass on the extra borrowing cost\nto the consumers at the cost of the demand so purchasing slows down. &nbsp;Foreign\ninvestors withdraw their &nbsp;investments\nfrom the capital markets so foreign exchange reserves come down. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result rupee would devalue further making\nthe imports expensive. Economy starts slowing down and &nbsp;enters the recession era and finally it is\ndeflation. Our Govt has done very little to curb counterfeit currency menace .\nLot of money is spent in intelligence efforts with very little success .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These black money party\nwill try to convert this money to gold but then , control all gold purchases . Any purchase over 3000 rupees must be paid\nvia bank transaction. &nbsp;Less than 3000 rupees\npurchases must be paid with cash of max 50 rupee currency denominations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PM Narendra Modi is\npreaching about honesty and Desh Bhakti. &nbsp;Well such a movement cannot take off as we are\ntied down.&nbsp; &nbsp;Income tax also makes criminals out of many of\nus.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;It forces both employers and employees to\ncheat.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People do NOT want to pay income\ntax when the Govt offers NOTHING in return. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">HULLLOOOOO ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The\nmultiple taxation regime is more money consuming than &nbsp;the collections it yields, deliberately kept &nbsp;ambiguous and &nbsp;complex in its applicability and exceptions . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">--- &nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">conversely 81% of all business\ntransactions are conducted in cash of 500/ &nbsp;1000 rupee note denominations .</span>&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Automated Payment\nTransaction Tax (APT Tax) is another name for Banking Transaction Tax ( BTT )\n.&nbsp; Let it replace the existent system of\npersonal and corporate income, sales, excise, capital gains, import and export\nduties, gift and estate taxes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; No spending will\nescape the eye of the Govt. &nbsp;This makes terror\nand subversion easier to control .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ran my ship like a\nbunch on commandos \u2013 more loyal \u2013 than what you can imagine in your wildest dreams . Only if you can command respect you can do this- you have to be better than all -- and even a tougher SOB.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then one day I had\nfour unconscious people in a nitrogen inerted tank. The second one went into\nsave the first , risking his life\u2014and so on. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the time the fifth\nman was about to enter I had my tough second mate on deck ( whom I relieved on\nthe bridge ) with a heavy iron rod , &nbsp;beating\nto incapacitate the knee of anybody who wanted to be the fifth unconscious man\u2014\nCAPTAIN\u2019S ORDERS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have NO idea what\nthis means !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That night I pondered ,\nand decided that this type of absolute loyalty to a fellow comrade is NOT good\non a merchant ship. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And I pulled the plug\nforever.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3uqSXUpIKvU/VF7qcTvP4CI/AAAAAAAAytE/Utuve80JNzE/s1600/downloaddqd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3uqSXUpIKvU/VF7qcTvP4CI/AAAAAAAAytE/Utuve80JNzE/s1600/downloaddqd.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A key ingredient of my\nstyle was HUMOR.&nbsp; One Chief Engineer\njoined my ship. The first thing he tells me is that he has heard of me and my\nleadership style, and he is delighted to be on board. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I asked him, \"What style would that be ?\"&nbsp; . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JBq77hgBihw/VF9Hfgx6l0I/AAAAAAAAywI/aNuPb4BVRwk/s1600/pirateee-plank.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JBq77hgBihw/VF9Hfgx6l0I/AAAAAAAAywI/aNuPb4BVRwk/s1600/pirateee-plank.jpg\" height=\"432\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He replied \u201c They said you are like the\nCaptain of the US submarine in that movie DOWN PERISCOPE multiplied by one\nmillion\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: By humor management you can enforce the unenforceable !</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/fNaQS3vDQc4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/fNaQS3vDQc4&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/fNaQS3vDQc4&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>HUMOR MANAGEMENT\nVADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Get you crew to laugh together\nwith your \u2013 make their life on board a FUN EXPERIENCE and they will bless you\nfor that, and give you 100% loyalty.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-veVmg9nsCSs/VF78xdf4DcI/AAAAAAAAytk/xDS7zKcD1sw/s1600/debsst_ceiling_cat_negotiate.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-veVmg9nsCSs/VF78xdf4DcI/AAAAAAAAytk/xDS7zKcD1sw/s1600/debsst_ceiling_cat_negotiate.jpg\" height=\"247\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I held regular sports with Dollar prizes, fancy dress competitions, cricket matches inside the cleaned up hold , fun filled Equator crossing ceremonies, good food, easy shore leaves , never punished a man for his first two mistakes.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first day, first meet, I told them that they are all my sons, I will NOT take them to the police station , unless it is warranted.( they all know the speech - it is a small world ) &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course you must be a\nman they look up to for every occasion. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And\nit helps if you screw your UPPITY shore bosses every single day and they can do\nNOTHING about it .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the stuff of LIVING LEGEND ! &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They note the body language of a shore boss when he is on board with me. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would even make my boss keep gangway watch,while we played cricked on the quay &nbsp;( it is easy if you get him to sign the articles of agreement while off the berth ) -- &nbsp;they all knew it was NO use screwing up my confidential service report, for blue eyed Captain always delivered the goods - his way &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am known at sea, for shutting the cabin door and JHAPPING &nbsp;a consistently CHOOT boss !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>EQUATOR CROSSING\nCEREMONY AT SEA VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Below: &nbsp;Life is NOT all fun and frolic - you have to deliver ALWAYS -- reputations built up over 40 years can come crashing down in 3 seconds - &nbsp;you are only as good as your last innings at sea.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dzshr5peQ8I/VF2hqkHo3TI/AAAAAAAAynw/TBxy9yuKars/s1600/5AA003.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dzshr5peQ8I/VF2hqkHo3TI/AAAAAAAAynw/TBxy9yuKars/s1600/5AA003.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember attending a\nChemical seminar. &nbsp;A brand new European\nbuilt high tech ship was to be manned and this was the first time they were\ngiving it to Indians\u2014 and I was the earmarked Chemical Captain. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French TIME\ncharterer passed around his company brochure &nbsp;and asked \u201c You have seen hundreds of such\nCompany magazines- &nbsp;what is special about\nour company ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This magazine was passed\naround, with everybody flipping , (more than 70 people) &nbsp;over the glossy pages . &nbsp;This session took more than 30 minutes. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every one said\nsomething . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally I was asked to\nspeak \u2013for I was the ear marked Captain. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many foreigners were\nwatching \u2013 &nbsp;here is the Company blue eyed\nboy. &nbsp;Let us see what this captain is\nworth . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I drawled- \u201cYOUR\nCOMPANY IS ABOUT PEOPLE , &nbsp;&nbsp;NOT HARD WARE , &nbsp;SOFT WARE OR ANY OTHER WARE - PERIOD !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French boss\nannounced &nbsp;\u201c Only our Captain got it\nright! \u201d\u2014and then he launched into a speech BLAH BLAH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What would have\nhappened if a junior officer or an engineer got it right \u2014 and I got it very wrong!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are NO fools at\nsea !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>A leader is looked up\nto by his men , if he has the BALLS to take on deep rooted , time tested negativity\ntake it on , and crush it . &nbsp;Such a leader is\nbranded a <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SHER </span>.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Any idiot leader can\nbuild up on positivity with his ass safe, who wants popularity medals. &nbsp;This type of slimy leader &nbsp;is branded a <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CHOOHA</span>..</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though out my career as\na Captain at sea, I was the OFFICIAL TROUBLE BUSTER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there was an insurmountable\nproblem on board, which would affect the company reputation and even EXISTENCE &nbsp;Capt Ajit Vadakayil was the answer .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I was known as Capt\nAjit V in my first 9 years of command . &nbsp;I was too notorious and powerful in SCI, my\nfirst company. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I made my name\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil , just to check out what I am worth. &nbsp;When you have a reputation overtaking you , it\nis easy to hang on to the petticoats of that FALTHU reputation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WEmyh4IJ0fU/VF2yE5bJq1I/AAAAAAAAyoY/5CuQdl642yk/s1600/dguuownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WEmyh4IJ0fU/VF2yE5bJq1I/AAAAAAAAyoY/5CuQdl642yk/s1600/dguuownload.jpg\" height=\"298\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will give you a\ncouple of examples\u2014 these would have been part of my book GAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3pxsvFlT6tk/VF2xe3522oI/AAAAAAAAyoQ/o9yF1cxEgJc/s1600/downreload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3pxsvFlT6tk/VF2xe3522oI/AAAAAAAAyoQ/o9yF1cxEgJc/s1600/downreload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I was a Captain in\nSCI, the entire customs officers around the Indian coast knew Capt Ajit V. &nbsp;The top Customs commissioners used to visit me\non my ship and have a beer with me. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-totKJoAYtlM/VF2xPnlmSKI/AAAAAAAAyoA/dBLljiWRWMY/s1600/downvvoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-totKJoAYtlM/VF2xPnlmSKI/AAAAAAAAyoA/dBLljiWRWMY/s1600/downvvoad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The top Customs\nboss&nbsp; would say--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201c Captain saab I know you\n. &nbsp;I just wanted to see who you are . &nbsp;You are the only Indian captain with BALLS at\nsea. &nbsp;&nbsp;Every other ship\u2019s crew &nbsp;AARYAS (sells ) &nbsp;the ships bond of whisky and cigarettes -100% &nbsp;. &nbsp;Only\nyour ship\u2019s crew does NOT do it . &nbsp;&nbsp;We have\nour Customs spy agents in the smuggler catamaran which comes along side to buy\nthe stuff at anchorage . This is an evil\nwe have NOT be able to overcome for decades .&nbsp; And we\nknow how you do it too , single handedly \u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c We have informers\namong your crew too. &nbsp;On the SCI ships\nyou command , you crew refuses to pay HAFTA to the crew unions during article\nchange ( rewards for rabble rousing and getting compensation money for\nimaginary grievances ) \u2013 they say our captain takes care of us . We know that you\ndo NOT give 30% of the OVERTIME the spoilt crew gets on other 150 randi khaana\nships in your company \u2014 yet you ship shines, you ship\u2019s alleyways are cleaner.&nbsp; We learnt all this from your crew unions ,\nthe shipping master and your company crew dept Managers. &nbsp;Now you know why we want to see what type of\nMAHA MERU you are !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what did Capt Ajit\nVadakayil do \u2013which others did NOT dare ?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We used to have around\n58 crew members \u2013out of which the catering dept was around 17. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In foreign company\nships, there was only one steward and cook. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in SCI , we had Chief\nSteward, Asst Chief Steward, pantry man, Asst pantry man , laundryman, &nbsp;5 cooks ( 3 for Officers and 2 for crew ) ,\nlot of stewards and even a toilet cleaner for officers alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I flew first class for\n9 years in SCI and had my own dedicated Captain\u2019s steward \u2014while in foreign companies\nthey fly you economy class.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both officers and crew\ndrew their bi weekly bond, even if they do NOT smoke and drink. They hid it\nhere and there on the ship and on arrival India , they would sell it to\nsmugglers at Indian anchorage.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those days these liquor\nbottles &nbsp;were what you got in big hotels\u2014it\nwas organized mafia with even junior customs officers and harbor security police\nin connivance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the ship\u2019s crew list\neverybody had a number. &nbsp;Captain was\nserial number 1\u2014Chief officer would be serial No 2\u2014the 3<sup>rd</sup> engineer\nwould have his own number \u2013so on and so forth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I carried my own permanent\nmarker pen \u2014and put the this serial number on the bottle label and the\ncigarette carton. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If somebody resisted\nand said \u201c I don\u2019t want such a bullsh#t number on my bottle\u201d &nbsp;I gave firm instructions\nto open the bottle and rip the cigarette carton plastic wrapper &nbsp;in his presence ( selling value lowered ) &nbsp;. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However I made leeway\nif anybody wanted to give a bottle as a gift. The whole idea was to prevent\ncrew selling the bottle at 6 to 8 times to cost on board.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So a typical corny\ndialogue was as follows -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>SAAB, &nbsp;JAHAAZ PER AANE KELIYE TANKHA DENA PADEGA-<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>KAAM MAANGTHA HAI TO OVERTIME\nDENA PADEGA-<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BEEDI KHADI/&nbsp; &nbsp;PAAN\nPAATI / LAAL BATHI / AGARBATHI KELIYE-<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp;BOND AARYA KARNA MAANGTHA \u2013 </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sir, to be physically on\nboard you have to give us salary, &nbsp;if you\nwant work to be done then you have to give us overtime money , &nbsp;then for petty expenses like beedi/ shore\nsnacks, humping ashore , coming back and doing agarbatti puja to wash away the\nsin &nbsp;\u2013 we need to sell our cigarettes and\nwhisky.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is always a huge ruckus\nin the beginning\u2014literally mutiny\u2014 like kicking the beehive . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They go slow in work. They create all sorts of\nproblems. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some times they even tell me\nto give them rations as per their written articles a TOT OF RUM in glass.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I enjoyed this TUG OF\nWAR \u2013 yield a little for a minute, instantly pull back and tighten the leash - all on my time table and terms &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I dealt with crew\nindividually by names\u2014no safety in numbers !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would win every time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OblfOcpeTP8/VF3Vj_X5rVI/AAAAAAAAypM/ZkPH8-WcgxE/s1600/downffload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OblfOcpeTP8/VF3Vj_X5rVI/AAAAAAAAypM/ZkPH8-WcgxE/s1600/downffload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later my reputation preceded\nme .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite being a\nmartinet , the shipping master told me in front of the crew unions and SCI crew\nmanagers , that Capt Ajit V is the only Captain on Indian ships who has never\nlogged down ( official penalizing and spoiling career ) a sailor- &nbsp;after nearly a\ndecade in command . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I will be telling a lie\nif I say I never logged down anybody ( court martial equivalent ) . I logged\ndown some real bad eggs \u2013the ring leaders ,and told them on the quiet that if\nthey behave I would cancel the log entry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It always worked.&nbsp; At sea sweetness is mistaken for weakness .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Captains who gave\nplenty overtime, allowed crew to smuggle &nbsp;and got NIL work done \u2013when they walked down\nthe gangway the crew will say \u201c Saala CHOOTIYA jaa raha hai \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Capt Ajit Vadakayil walked down the gangway the same sailors whom I screwed or even jhapped up (\ncorporal punishment ) would cry &nbsp;\u201c Dekh\nRAAJA admi jaa raha hai \u201c \u2014and they would rush to touch my feet .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JGOpD9XMk0s/VF3V9ltk_qI/AAAAAAAAypQ/RFHCbS7L_f4/s1600/imatdeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JGOpD9XMk0s/VF3V9ltk_qI/AAAAAAAAypQ/RFHCbS7L_f4/s1600/imatdeges.jpg\" height=\"171\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">STRENGTH &nbsp;IS ALWAYS RESPECTED IN A LEADER - NOBODY WANTS TO SERVE UNDER A CHOOHA LEADER .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CREW ( TEAM) WANTS\nTO SEE SPIRIT, STRENGTH AND RESOLVE\u2014 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR THEY KNOW WHEN THE CHIPS\nARE DOWN , THE SHIP IS BEING RIPPED APART BY EXPLOSIONS WITH BODIES AND LIMBS\nSTREWN, THIS STRONG LEADER WILL KICK PRIME BUTT AND &nbsp;DELIVER &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AVOID &nbsp;MEANNESS &nbsp;\u2013 IT DOES NOT WORK !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BEWnQefkRGI/VF3JUqqdA9I/AAAAAAAAyoo/y_9peh4bcxg/s1600/pacctton_slap.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BEWnQefkRGI/VF3JUqqdA9I/AAAAAAAAyoo/y_9peh4bcxg/s1600/pacctton_slap.jpg\" height=\"305\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soldiers loved to serve\nunder Gen Patton ! &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Once established, culture has a life of its own, in a Tamas / Rajas\nrelationship-- Culture is stronger than life and stronger than death. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cultures themselves must NEVER EVER be\nevaluated or graded as higher and lower, superior or inferior.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A culture is a time tested means to an end--\nthe culture ( or way of life ) of the more highly developed nation is \u201cimposed\u201d\nupon the less developed peoples .</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My south Korean Chief Engineer was MAHA thrilled\nto get his fermented sour and spicy kimchi when he arrived on board and had his\nfirst lunch with me. He nearly kissed me out of gratitude.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SeAqqqjp4I4/VF7J4gVnXtI/AAAAAAAAyro/tfKarEvxsMA/s1600/imuuages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SeAqqqjp4I4/VF7J4gVnXtI/AAAAAAAAyro/tfKarEvxsMA/s1600/imuuages.jpg\" height=\"235\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I introduced Lateral\nthinking at sea. &nbsp;Lateral thinking is\nabout \u201cback to the future\u201d thinking. line-height: 150%;\">One of my good Punjabi friends\n( on my training ship ) called me\u2014he implored Ajit, come to my home as soon as\npossible. &nbsp;My marriage of few months will end soon otherwise. &nbsp;Only you are smart\nenough to handle this situation.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; She had sailed on a container ship once with\nhim and considered all sailors as CHOOTS who giggled and played TT throughout\nthe day. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CSvUMHZlrwk/VF7ne6ylesI/AAAAAAAAys4/i2n8zALoQ6w/s1600/the-workplace-wovvrdpress1.jpg\" height=\"332\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The crew does NOT want\na hypocrite as a leader . &nbsp;.. Justice\nmust be balanced with compassion. In India people put bread on the table for\ntheir family\u2014leave alone children\u2019s education etc . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Personal space is invaded only for common\ngood. &nbsp;No call is ever made to surrender\ndignity&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5ViM_7dKiV8/VF808jN4iMI/AAAAAAAAyug/226ajBU1yqM/s1600/positive-thiGFXnking-evokes-more-energy-01.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5ViM_7dKiV8/VF808jN4iMI/AAAAAAAAyug/226ajBU1yqM/s1600/positive-thiGFXnking-evokes-more-energy-01.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Mob mentality and\nendless rabble rousing has be crushed in the bud \u2013 ruthlessly . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OXtjfczkbTs/VF88ZxXcNBI/AAAAAAAAyvk/2kNF8oud-vQ/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, a good\nleader is NOT a rosgolla type NAPUNSAK character drooling sickly sweet treacle all over the\nplace. &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tPq1lH9efVI/VF8uQidf8NI/AAAAAAAAyt0/JjWvaCABC1A/s1600/iron%2Bfssist.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">He is a NO NONSENSE STRONG MAN who walks gently with an iron rod in his\nfist, &nbsp;held in a velvet glove.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VdoDGjLXLns/VF8ugV7SkfI/AAAAAAAAyt8/IwaBIdDU1z8/s1600/6500e4b9ec26ec4e4fg137c4d31c624a30.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
