font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">The adventure may be in peril if he cant take on this \"kick prime butt\"avatar when warranted..</span>&nbsp;</b></span><o:p></o:p><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T-RDBG4KKYw/VF8vItyOrYI/AAAAAAAAyuI/o7pFUi2Kum0/s1600/20140322_magrch.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-T-RDBG4KKYw/VF8vItyOrYI/AAAAAAAAyuI/o7pFUi2Kum0/s1600/20140322_magrch.jpg\" height=\"451\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rabble rousing will\nnever happen to a leader with SPIRIT. &nbsp;&nbsp;He\nmakes all understand the fine line between timely constructive criticism and\ndestructive personal attacks. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It does NOT hurt the leader to ASK nicely. &nbsp; Kindly attack issues - do NOT indulge in vitriolic FALTHU personal attacks.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leader with SPIRIT\nwill officially allow timeout for venting stream . After all we are all humans\nwho need emotional venting, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">right?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--4Lz8zAqXrM/VF8xgf0lH3I/AAAAAAAAyuU/cBdj7HbIA34/s1600/imffhages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--4Lz8zAqXrM/VF8xgf0lH3I/AAAAAAAAyuU/cBdj7HbIA34/s1600/imffhages.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who do NOT\nunderstand this , will get PAIN and will be kicked out of the team el pronto.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Defnition of negativity\nin a dream team includes FALTHU impatience, irritation and being fed up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-R8f3ne7q0kA/VF81PtZxcGI/AAAAAAAAyuo/UtOVx7BomFY/s1600/It-only-takes-oGFCXne-negative-comment-to-kill-a-dream.-Remember-that-next-time.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-R8f3ne7q0kA/VF81PtZxcGI/AAAAAAAAyuo/UtOVx7BomFY/s1600/It-only-takes-oGFCXne-negative-comment-to-kill-a-dream.-Remember-that-next-time.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"226\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is\na golden rule MATTERS THE MOST ARE NEVER AT THE MERCY OF THINGS THAT MATTER THE\nLEAST under his command&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Kxc8B6ZaVJw/VF8263LR1BI/AAAAAAAAyu8/QfmnjOtAT8E/s1600/imasdeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Kxc8B6ZaVJw/VF8263LR1BI/AAAAAAAAyu8/QfmnjOtAT8E/s1600/imasdeges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the dream team\npeople with COURAGE OF CONVICTIONS &nbsp;and\nFREEDOM OF SPIRIT are a valuable asset\u2014and they opinions are NOT construed to\nbe arrogance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even insubordination is examined to check out for inherent virtue\n\u2013 but if there is NONE and he keeps being insubordinate again and again , God\nsave him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leadership of SPIRIT is NOT rooted in high handed domination or\nintimidation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A leader with SPIRIT knows\nthat progress has been made on this planet only through disobedience and\nrebellion-- and that people with spirit , passion and courage have always been\nsinister to the walking dead.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything cannot be a\ntruth finding exercise. Getting along with the rest of the team is paramount. If\nyou take sides then you are part of the argument and the disagreement. You as a\nleader have to remain totally objective and in the middle. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: One legged Little chick lik hopping away-- rushing off to tell ze king -- THE SKY ITHH &nbsp;FALLIN' &nbsp; -- ( PSSST - actually a WEE acorn fell on her pea brained head )</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2aDAh4Ukzvg/VF9EVSum04I/AAAAAAAAyv0/EOS5TNLXITg/s1600/little-chick-on-tffhe-run.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2aDAh4Ukzvg/VF9EVSum04I/AAAAAAAAyv0/EOS5TNLXITg/s1600/little-chick-on-tffhe-run.jpg\" height=\"239\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being conciliatory is\nlike mother hen breaking up a fight between 2 of her chicks.. You just want to\nrestore peace. You will not spend inordinate time in finding out who pecked\nwhose ass first.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your rules say that\nthere can be no bullying, shouting, threatening , intimidation or victimisation\nin your team. &nbsp;This is abuse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Cz5wzxC5740/VF9EaR22cYI/AAAAAAAAyv8/rWPgYlEeSaI/s1600/yjdyk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Cz5wzxC5740/VF9EaR22cYI/AAAAAAAAyv8/rWPgYlEeSaI/s1600/yjdyk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leader is mentally\nat the pivot watching the natural forces at play and determining is they are\nacting for good.&nbsp; He will make\ninterventions to make the effect of those dynamics more positive.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nquickly determines the teams strength and weaknesses and tailors new\napproaches. He provides feedback to correct unproductive moves.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A well knit team takes\non a life of its own and the leaders job is to nurture and maintain it. Each\nmember of the team is entitled to be interested in all aspects of the\noperation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is not cancelled out by the fact that he has special\nresponsibilities in a limited area, like the goal keeper in a soccer team. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This creates higher\nlevels of job satisfaction and commitment plus higher levels of trust and\nsupport.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teamwork creates the forum for the common man to\nattain uncommon results.&nbsp; A bunch of\nsuperstars stars do NOT meake a team. A group in itself does not necessarily\nconstitute a team. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Members of a&nbsp; team must have complementary and diversified\nskills committed to a common purpose, where they use their strengths in full\nand can complement for each others weakness.. In order to be a good team player\none has to unselfish, compromise and even sacrifice . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hostility among team\nmembers and low participation are symptoms that signal a need for team\nbuilding. &nbsp;Morale problems do not happen\novernight and they cannot be resolved overnight. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conflict resolution is\nnot a stand alone skill. Without this skill the team cannot bond.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis the job of the manager to identify issues that inhibit the team. He must\naddress those issues and remove the inhibitors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Team members must know\nhow to examine team and individual errors and weaknesses without making\npersonal attacks. The manager must be able to identify jealousy and defensive\nbehavior. &nbsp;He must build a feeling of\nsolidarity and team spirit.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has to look out for\nthe cynical lone ranger who ignores others, and survives by being servile to\nthe leader who can make or break him.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t excuse a badly\nbehaving team member.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people are just negative by nature.\nDon\u2019t hesitate to confront such cynical team destroyers and demand behavior\nchange at once. Some people lack confidence and view attacks on their opinions\nas a personal attack. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A typical statement\nwould be \u201care you telling that my 20 years of experience does not matter?\u201d</span>\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Music orchestra bands\nare a clear example of how a team works. Poor performing bands are inflexible,\nthe musicians have petty differences, compete with each other, stay in their\ncomfort zones and expect the audience to accommodate their jarring music.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just\nplain old Harmony is not the goal of cross functional teamwork .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False consensus is\nundesirable where team members are afraid to express a contrary point of view\nfor fear it will destroy the positive feelings among team members.&nbsp; An absence of overt conflict is often\nmistaken for teamwork.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conflict is natural and\ndesirable. Issues are attacked \u2013not each other. If conflict is not visible ,\neither the people are thinking alike or they have suppressed conflict. Both\nsituations are not helpful. Teams that suppress conflict lose effectiveness and\nthe conflict erupts into destructive ways. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good leader will not\nallow endless debates on minor problems.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strength of character\nand courage of convictions is NEVER mistaken for poor attitude. &nbsp;He communicates in the language of his people\nNOT in fuckin' latin.&nbsp; A good manager\nwill not convert men by silencing them. He knows when he praises everybody he\npraises nobody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there is no synergy in the team, the\npeople are passive.&nbsp; If bonuses and\nincentives are part of the reward system, they should be given to teams\nperformance\u2014not individual performance. Team culture is destroyed by racism,\ninappropriate race based pay systems &nbsp;,\nand destructive comments from management.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No one can whistle a\nsymphony\u2014it takes an orchestra to play it. Be ready to prune dead wood,\nstraggly growth and tone deaf lousy flute players.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: King of piano Italian\ncomposer and pianist Ludovico Einaudi.(divenire)-- a man who made a dent in the universe !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/X1DRDcGlSsE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/X1DRDcGlSsE&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/X1DRDcGlSsE&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBelow: My elder son playing the same thing - destressing after a hard days cerebral work !.</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/mruHCYf_3Og/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/mruHCYf_3Og&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/mruHCYf_3Og&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Playing a piano\nrequires coordination between hands and with visual / auditory stimuli. Playing\na piano with both hands is not about skill alone but about using both brain\nlobes and brain communication.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">improves the brain\u2019s ability to discern the\ncomponents of sound \u2014 &nbsp;the pitch, tone and frequency. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Playing piano&nbsp; produces long-lasting changes in motor\nabilities and brain structure,&nbsp; and\ncreates new pathways in the brain. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AJgupgrkFCc/VGFabdLLWgI/AAAAAAAAyzU/j2cmfeKYXbk/s1600/imaddeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AJgupgrkFCc/VGFabdLLWgI/AAAAAAAAyzU/j2cmfeKYXbk/s1600/imaddeges.jpg\" height=\"239\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Piano&nbsp; music is more complex in structure,\ninstrumentation and harmony, it primes the brain with pathways needed for other\ncognitive tasks. The synapses become stronger and so transmit the signals more\nreliably.&nbsp; New synapses form, so the\nneurons are more strongly connected.&nbsp; Myelin\ngrowth leads to faster transmission of the electrical signals down the axon,\nand better timing of neuronal signals.&nbsp;\nNeurons that fire together wire together. When neurons fire at the same\ntime, the connections between the neurons get stronger.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: My elder son playing Primevera of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Ludovico Einaudi</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/h9OVvmZ8CZg/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/h9OVvmZ8CZg&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/h9OVvmZ8CZg&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Below: The original master !</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/-dPcz_cxDa4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/-dPcz_cxDa4&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/-dPcz_cxDa4&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">The force of a team\nlike a typhoon takes time to grow\u2014but once it is spinning, it is a formidable\nthing indeed.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hRlX7YmhGBA/VF9Mw3tzJDI/AAAAAAAAywY/lt3gIPA6-KI/s1600/downdnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hRlX7YmhGBA/VF9Mw3tzJDI/AAAAAAAAywY/lt3gIPA6-KI/s1600/downdnload.jpg\" height=\"310\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression: &nbsp;Once we manned a Chemical Tanker will all\nwhite Europeans . &nbsp;For two weeks I\nmentored the two 4 stripers and two 3 stripers at the company office ( abroad ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7ldXbNUZEzA/VF9ucviUneI/AAAAAAAAyxQ/-LdvaQ6hkbA/s1600/doghwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7ldXbNUZEzA/VF9ucviUneI/AAAAAAAAyxQ/-LdvaQ6hkbA/s1600/doghwnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I sailed on the\nship for five weeks &nbsp;\u2013 during which time\nI had to monitor ( as a CHANGE MANAGER ) load , discharge and tankclean operations \u2013 with a CDI inspection and an oil\nmajor SHELL vetting thrown in for good measure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My job as a change\nmanager was to make sure the officers/ crew do their jobs the right way. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-be9_Xjm4NGA/VF9tfzFuv7I/AAAAAAAAyxA/4tPzvlHpQHA/s1600/stockxpertcomfk_id21692551_jpg_9df817ae09fd93c6154fcee72184f404.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-be9_Xjm4NGA/VF9tfzFuv7I/AAAAAAAAyxA/4tPzvlHpQHA/s1600/stockxpertcomfk_id21692551_jpg_9df817ae09fd93c6154fcee72184f404.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a VERY difficult\ntask,&nbsp; when the sailors are dim-witted\nand there are communication problems . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luckily I used the\nLatvian Chief Engineer who was young, sharp and intelligent. &nbsp;For the Russian Chief Officer would develop a\nvery bad stutter the moment I put the pressure on.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oBK4Uc2i7Zo/VF9sy7fo0TI/AAAAAAAAyw4/BTgS0ZuR-Zw/s1600/leadershicdp-styles.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oBK4Uc2i7Zo/VF9sy7fo0TI/AAAAAAAAyw4/BTgS0ZuR-Zw/s1600/leadershicdp-styles.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any way when I disembarked\nat France, &nbsp;the top 4 came to see me off\nat the gangway with the Russian Captain carrying my briefcase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After I shook hands , I\ntold the Russian Captain \u201c Captain, I must apologize from the bottom of my heart for\ntreating you shabbily \u2013 this is NOT my style - and I am just another brother\nsea Captain like you &nbsp;\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He replied \u201c Sir, you\njust did your job and you have succeeded in your mission !\u201d\u2014and he hugged me .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HHHxyVa9kvU/VF9uBfQYmsI/AAAAAAAAyxI/qEgN2NcuRyU/s1600/dowbnnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HHHxyVa9kvU/VF9uBfQYmsI/AAAAAAAAyxI/qEgN2NcuRyU/s1600/dowbnnload.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly Chief Officer\nstarted crying loudly, then Captain who was older than me cried too, with Chief\nEngineer looking very confused. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Russian captain is\nGOD in their system .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The I got a call from\nthe Company to do the same on another ship and to board at London.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Only a leader with SPIRIT can invoke and arouse the conscience of his team .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You conscience is that spark of celestial fire. &nbsp;God resides in your DNA.\nNever do anything against conscience even if the state , your society or your\nreligion demands it. &nbsp;You sin, if you go against your conscience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A computer\ndoes NOT have a conscience. OOPS ! just revealed a secret !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And mind you, sometimes\nthis pisses of my bosses ashore\u2014so who&nbsp;\ncares?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One who breaks an unjust law that conscience tells him is unjust,\nand who willingly accepts the penalty to arouse the conscience of the community\nover its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for written\nlaw.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is indeed a\nhigher court than courts of justice or courts of honour, and that is the court\nof conscience. It supersedes all other courts.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; Such evil people mistake short memory\nfor a clear conscience.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-67b8gZqobpg/VGAtmg0-3TI/AAAAAAAAyyU/DJoRIyeLBJ4/s1600/images%2B(7)hhjkJll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-67b8gZqobpg/VGAtmg0-3TI/AAAAAAAAyyU/DJoRIyeLBJ4/s1600/images%2B(7)hhjkJll.jpg\" height=\"181\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience is your\ninner antenna.&nbsp; Human dignity requires an\nupright conscience. Deep within his conscience every man discovers a celestial\nlaw which he has not laid upon himself,&nbsp;\neven society or his upbringing -- which he must obey.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">It is his most\nsecret core, and his sanctuary, where he is alone with God, to have a silent\nand short dialogue . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>To youngsters who are\nabout to take up a career , I will tell them this\u2014\u201cNever take up a job in which\nyou cannot apply your own conscience\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>This is in case you want to happy , when your work is a continuous\nfestival of joy. &nbsp; Then you can have&nbsp; a\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">face without lines</span> , like a certain BAAD captain - at the age of 59</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Betrayal of trust and\ningratitude is common for men with no conscience.&nbsp; A guilty conscience needs no accuser. &nbsp;There is no pillow as hard as a guilty\nconscience.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience is what\nmakes you behave well behind closed doors or when nobody is looking......&nbsp; &nbsp;(<b><span style=\"color: red;\">HARK\n, &nbsp;YE &nbsp;EMPOWERED BRAVEHEART WOMEN , WITH VAGINAS AS BIG AS FOOTBALLS&nbsp;</span></b>).&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience an aspect of\nextended consciousness beyond survival-related dispositions . Conscience is a\ngift of crisis--- It tells you the right thing to do when you don't have time\nto figure it all out.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience thinks in a\nflash, in terms of metaphor, feelings, pictures, and the spatial whole and\ndoesn't fit neatly into the cause-and-effect model. Your conscience will not\nforce you to do things that are truly wrong for yourself or other people in\ncontradiction with the laws of the universe. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zL6G0wuPccI/VGAtYd5K_TI/AAAAAAAAyyM/F-_oXYKWqHs/s1600/fDghjj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zL6G0wuPccI/VGAtYd5K_TI/AAAAAAAAyyM/F-_oXYKWqHs/s1600/fDghjj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We cannot command our\nconscience to use it at will. &nbsp;It just surfaces spontaneously when certain\ncircumstances are present\u2014it suddenly appears as a feeling.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conscience extrapolates\nlarger truths . Use it as a guide always, never ignore it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in India know the\nmeaning of conscience -- in 4300 BC, when Lord Sri-Ram was sent away to the\nforest for 14 years in exile ( cheated in a dice game wager ) his step-brother\nBharat , whose mother Kaikeyi did the foul spadework ,&nbsp; kept Rama's shoes on the throne , till the\nexile period was over.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prince Bharat ran\nto the forest to seek out King Ram and apologize on behalf of his mother.</span>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-80t7fCnj0so/VGAp7iulG1I/AAAAAAAAyxg/t_sWbFqK02E/s1600/imHageshjui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-80t7fCnj0so/VGAp7iulG1I/AAAAAAAAyxg/t_sWbFqK02E/s1600/imHageshjui.jpg\" height=\"295\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\nthe Mughal invaders, where brothers gouged each other eyes and killed their own\nfathers and sons to usurp the throne.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\nONLY A LEADER OF INTEGRITY WITH SPIRIT CAN EVOKE CONSCIENCE -<br />\n<br />\nSUCH LEADERS &nbsp;SCOFF AT BENAMI FOREIGN FUNDED TV CLIPS SHOWING PEOPLE CLAPPING TO RIDICULE A MOTHER WHOSE 4 YEAR OLD SON PEED BEHIND A BUSH -- <br />\nSHE WOULD NOT BE DOING IT IF THERE WERE CLEAN PUBLIC TOILETS EVERY 300 METRES LIKE IN WESTERN COUNTRIES.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006 Gujarat high\ncourt termed the appointment of the high-level Justice UC Banerjee panel that\nprobed the Godhra train carnage as \u201cunconstitutional, illegal and void\u201d. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UC Bannerjee ignored the written statement of\n&nbsp;J Mahapatra, additional director general\nof the Gujarat police, \"miscreants had kept the petrol-soaked rags ready\nfor use much before the train had arrived at the Godhra\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2011, death penalty\nwas awarded to 11 convicts; those believed to have been present at a meeting held\nthe night before the incident where the conspiracy was formed, and those who, according\nto the court, had actually entered the coach and poured petrol before setting\nit afire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 2006, the High\ncourt quashed the conclusions of DESH DROHI Banerjee and ruled that the\ninvestigation was \"unconstitutional, illegal and null and void\",\ndeclared its formation to be a <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\"colourable exercise of power with mala\nfide intentions\"</span>, and its argument of accidental fire \"opposed to the\nprima facie accepted facts on record.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The High Court also directed that\nthe report should not be tabled in the Parliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Justice UC Banerjee LYING that Muslims had nothing to do with the fire ! &nbsp;He was chosen by Lalu Prasad Yadav, who then used the Godra riot pictures on posters to garner Muslim votes.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ekB2QJ0M8io/VGLSKYqKiXI/AAAAAAAAy2k/_cLztyiCi5I/s1600/l2005011ccf705.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was clear to all that\nwhen Bihar elections were announced, &nbsp;R\ncommunist Justice UC Banerjee came out with an INTERIM report on the incident (\npushed by the waitress ) and later when five states were going in for assembly\nelections, the final report of the committee was published.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Till today nobody has cared for &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">254 Hindus ( plus 59 in train ) </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;who were killed by Muslims in the\n2002 riots - they only talk about 720 muslims killed - &nbsp;SELECTIVELY . &nbsp; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UVY0gCqXTCo/VGVwN_2vKGI/AAAAAAAAy5w/qsowk2Cu3qw/s1600/ifffgmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"184\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UVY0gCqXTCo/VGVwN_2vKGI/AAAAAAAAy5w/qsowk2Cu3qw/s320/ifffgmages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DESPITE A SUPREME COURT\nORDER NOT TO USE INDIANS AS LAB RATS AND GUINEA PIGS FOR CHEAP UNTESTED GENERIC\nMEDICINES , THIS EVIL PRACTISE CONTINUES DURING THE RULE OF THE WAITRESS..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AxRN6crpU_k/VGV0Ll9_q5I/AAAAAAAAy6w/FkUJTsAxTPs/s1600/dbbfownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"337\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AxRN6crpU_k/VGV0Ll9_q5I/AAAAAAAAy6w/FkUJTsAxTPs/s640/dbbfownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lK0Be2DtHPA/VGV0ifr8TmI/AAAAAAAAy64/A9NNtdSBMBA/s1600/imrrgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lK0Be2DtHPA/VGV0ifr8TmI/AAAAAAAAy64/A9NNtdSBMBA/s400/imrrgages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Finally on 3rd Jan 2013\nan exasperated Supreme Court , slammed the Centre for its failure to stop\nillegal clinical trials of untested drugs by multinational companies, &nbsp;saying the drug trials are creating HAVOC in\nthe country and causing death of many citizens .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-h4nrcjhSu_Y/VGV0zj7aFHI/AAAAAAAAy7A/mG9pUIsVcJ0/s1600/afdfgamirtime2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-h4nrcjhSu_Y/VGV0zj7aFHI/AAAAAAAAy7A/mG9pUIsVcJ0/s640/afdfgamirtime2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>A bench of justices RM\nLodha and AR Dave RULED that all clinical trials will be done under the\nsupervision of the health secretary at the Centre . </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pOe5Pd-4oqc/VGV4HKSyu2I/AAAAAAAAy7o/zSL2R6oUxlI/s1600/imagCCDes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pOe5Pd-4oqc/VGV4HKSyu2I/AAAAAAAAy7o/zSL2R6oUxlI/s400/imagCCDes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You have to\nprotect health of citizens of the country. &nbsp;It is your obligation. &nbsp;Deaths must be arrested and illegal trials\nmust be stayed</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> UNQUOTE -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;the apex judicial bench said, asking the\ngovernment to handle the menace on an urgent basis .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ap53BjHo650/VGV3QjISX1I/AAAAAAAAy7Y/8IUpOByABQY/s1600/doCFFwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"329\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ap53BjHo650/VGV3QjISX1I/AAAAAAAAy7Y/8IUpOByABQY/s400/doCFFwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The apex court said\nthat the government has gone into deep slumber on the issue and has failed to\nput in place proper mechanisms to stop rackets of multinational companies,\nwhich are conducting illegal clinical trials .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eN_Wa5zMm8s/VGV1b6fmDeI/AAAAAAAAy7M/6lSLUu5gZ0k/s1600/39849866.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eN_Wa5zMm8s/VGV1b6fmDeI/AAAAAAAAy7M/6lSLUu5gZ0k/s640/39849866.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE LINK BELOW:--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/aamir-khan-appears-before-par-panel-pitches-for-generic-drugs/964953/1</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sicQPhHXH2I/VGV3wy9_XxI/AAAAAAAAy7g/b4JyT2SrPfQ/s1600/certificatDDe.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sicQPhHXH2I/VGV3wy9_XxI/AAAAAAAAy7g/b4JyT2SrPfQ/s400/certificatDDe.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\nwww.sacw.net | March 24, 2005<br />\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: #003399; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Text of citizens statement re the Indian Prime minister's comments in the Rajya Sabha following refusal of US Visa to Narendra Modi</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\n<span style=\"color: #003399;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We express our shock and anger at the stand taken by the Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in the Rajya Sabha on the issue of refusal of visa to Mr. Narendra Modi by the USA. &nbsp;He has said that it is not proper for any agency to form its opinion on the role of Sh. Modi in the 2002 Gujarat genocide based on mere allegations. &nbsp;Sh. Singh needs to be reminded that it was the NHRC which had castigated Mr. Modi and his state government for having </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">aided and abetted the act of genocide of Muslims in Gujarat in 2002,</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> and it was the Supreme Court of India that had opined that the Modi government cannot be relied upon to bring about justice to the victims of the carnage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">More than 50 national and international agencies of high credibility with their painstaking investigation had held Mr. Modi directly responsible for the act of genocide.</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> The Prime Minister needs to come clean on this issue. Does he hold a considered opinion that the observations made by the NHRC and the Supreme Court of India are to be treated with contempt as shown by him in his Rajya Sabha speech?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Mr. Modi's policies of hatred should not be legitimised even by association. Mr. Modi is no ordinary elected leader. He has become infamous for his <span style=\"color: blue;\">active abetment in the most brutal massacre</span> since India became free, of a segment of the citizens of his state. His notoriety has deepened in the past 3 years because he remains completely unrepentant for these crimes, including the<span style=\"color: red;\"> </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">mass slaughter and rape of hundreds of innocent women and children</span>, and instead has openly <span style=\"color: blue;\">fought elections from a platform of hate</span>. He has deliberately subverted the process of justice, that have attracted unprecedented structure from the Supreme Court of India.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We continue - to harbour grave disquiet about the militaristic and chauvinistic policies of the current US government itself, most notably in Afghanistan and Iraq. George Bush and his cohorts cannot be the arbiters of human rights.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We commend the untiring efforts of NRIs and human rights activists in the US and in India who mobilized public opinion and pressurized the US administration which led to the denial of Modi's visa. For those who claim that the international community has no role to play in the Gujarat carnage since it is a matter internal to the Indian nation, we would like to remind them that by the same logic, the entire world should have remained a mute spectator as millions of Jews were imprisoned and executed in concentration camps by the Nazi government.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">For those who claim that any insult to any elected official is an insult to the entire nation, we would like to remind them that Hitler, who is reviled even today, was also an elected official. There is </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">nothing more insulting to the Indian nation than the pogroms that took place in Gujarat, and the fact that their main architect, Sh Narendra Modi, still continues to enjoy the powers </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">and privileges of the Chief Minister in that state, while the Prime Minister of the country rushes to his defence.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">It is a matter of great shame that even 10 months after having assumed power the UPA government has done nothing to ensure justice to the victims of Gujarat genocide. It has taken no steps to instill a sense of security and confidence among the displaced, raped, and maimed minorities of Gujarat who have been left to fend for themselves. No financial and legal aid has been arranged by the Central government for them and it is treating the whole Gujarat genocide as a routine state matter.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The statement by Dr. Manmohan Singh adds insult to the injury suffered by the Genocide victims of Gujarat, and is an affront to those NRIs and human rights activists in the US whose unflagging pressure on the US administration resulted in the denial of Mr. Modi's visa. That Dr. Singh should feel compelled to come out openly to speak for an </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">organizer of mass murder who feels no remorse for his role </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">shows that Dr. Singh has lost all sense of propriety. The statement also shows that the government wants to remain neutral on the question of communalism.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We, as people who are committed to secularism and human rights in India, feel betrayed and would like to take this opportunity to express our sense of despair that the political formation which is in power at the centre lacks any sense of moral responsibility and moral courage.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">On behalf of the dead and living victims of Gujarat genocide and on behalf of the sections of civil society which have worked for the defeat of the communal forces we demand an apology from Dr. Manmohan Singh for having humiliated the wronged citizens of India by issuing a highly insensitive and irresponsible statement defending Mr. Narendra Modi.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">March 21, 2005</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Released by</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Shabnam Hashmi - ANHAD, Delhi <anhad_delhi yahoo.co.in=\"\">&gt;</anhad_delhi></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">On behalf of:</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">1. Aamir Khan- Actor, Mumbai</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">2. Aditya-Ceo, Ekgaon Technologies</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">3. </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Admiral Ramu Ramdas</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">- Member, National Integration Council</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">4. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said- <i><span style=\"color: purple;\">\"Like a\ncircus company I have toured all over India since 1943 to provide free eye\nrelief service. In the process I have examined over 10 million patients and\nconducted over 700,000 eye operations, which I am told is a world record.&nbsp; Somebody compared me to Henry Ford,&nbsp; saying I had brought conveyor belt technology\nto the field of eye-care.&nbsp; My way of\nlooking at things has not been affected by the ageing process at all.&nbsp; I am just an ordinary man.&nbsp; I will serve as long as God wants me to.&nbsp; For me, my patient is my god, the operating\nroom is my temple and my instruments are my puja.&nbsp; My work has therefore been my pilgrimage</span></i>.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; . &nbsp;A\nteam is a reflection of its leadership . &nbsp;He does NOT seek consensus for he hold the\nmagic wand to mould it out of thin air.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We call this day Karkidaka\nVavu Bali or Karutha Vavubali Tharpanam.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is done on the new\nmoon day ( amavasya ) of Karkidakam&nbsp; .\nKarkidakam is the last month of the Malayalam Calendar ( Cancer )&nbsp; of <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Saka era Ashada Sravana</span> was on July 26th\nin 2014. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YfdcloLXDi4/VFnW9dHE8LI/AAAAAAAAyd4/2rruPfZfO9I/s1600/52222FF90.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">rest of India </span>(\ngenerally ) the rituals for dead ancestors known as Pitru Paksha Shraadh , was\ndone on new moon ( amavasya ) day of Virgo <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">23<sup>rd</sup> Sept 2014</span>, &nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Saka era Bhadrapada Aswina </span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
