font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0948\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0947\u092f\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0906\u0924\u094d\u092e\u0928\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0930\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u0928\u0947\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0923\u0947\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0924\u094d\u092f\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u0947\u0928\u0947\u0926\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u0926\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n||</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u0101tm\u0101 v\u0101 are\ndr\u0323s\u0323tavyah\u0323 \u015brotravyo mantavyo nididhy\u0101sitavyo maitreyi<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u0101tmano v\u0101 are dar\u015banena\n\u015bravan\u0323ena maty\u0101 vij\u00f1\u0101nenedam\u0323 sarvam\u0323 viditam</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The Self, my dear\nMaitreyi, should be realized \u2013 should be heard of, reflected on and medtated\nupon;&nbsp; by the realization of the Self, my\ndear, through hearing, reflection and meditation, all this is known.\" \u2013 &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Brihadaranyaka\nUpanishad St.II.iv.5) - 5000BC</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n_HMA3lKuwg/VFCdIyy7o6I/AAAAAAAAyAs/DXpjQUNxqf4/s1600/yajnavalkya_hrttidh111.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n_HMA3lKuwg/VFCdIyy7o6I/AAAAAAAAyAs/DXpjQUNxqf4/s1600/yajnavalkya_hrttidh111.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"246\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nididhyasana is the\npractice of <i>atma-vichara</i>,\nself-enquiry, self-investigation, self-scrutiny or self-attentiveness. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It\nleads to Nirvikalpa Samadhi from where there is no return into lower states of\nconsciousness.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samadhi\nis a spiritual state of consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are various kinds of samadhi.\nAmong the minor samadhis, savikalpa samadhi happens to be the highest. Beyond\nsavikalpa comes nirvikalpa Samadhi. In nirvikalpa samadhi there is no mind,\nthere is only infinite peace and bliss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disciple of Adi\nShankaracharya Suresvara wrote what his Guru taught him 4000 years ago :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u093e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u091a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0928\u0941\u092d\u0935\u0928\u0948\u0930\u094d\u0939\u0947\u0924\u0941\u092d\u093f\u0936\u094d\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u092e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u093f\u0924\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">|<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0908\u0926\u0943\u0917\u0948\u0915\u093e\u0924\u094d\u092e\u094d\u092f\u0938\u0902\u092c\u094b\u0927\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Mangal&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093f\u0926\u093f\u0927\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0938\u0928\u092e\u0941\u091a\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0947</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n||</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Nididhyasana is\nso called when, instruction about the uniqueness of the Atman is justified</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">by (proper) reasons\nviz. the Sruti, (the instructions of) teachers and (one\u2019s own) experience (of\nthe same).\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nididhyasana is a state\nin which a knowing is present without needing words.&nbsp; The words used during contemplation, can fall\naway and will lead the seeker to silence.&nbsp;\nIt is a silence filled with knowing. The seeker can rest in this\nknowing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-J5z319yB6gY/VFCg0rU9XVI/AAAAAAAAyBA/e9x3L3qauU8/s1600/25dd7008.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-J5z319yB6gY/VFCg0rU9XVI/AAAAAAAAyBA/e9x3L3qauU8/s1600/25dd7008.jpg\" height=\"408\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man has never\nunderstood the extent of a Vedic way of meditation. It will NOT be possible for\nhim to understand this too.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However let me try. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep your fu#kin\u2019 brandy and cigars aside --ready ?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Your prayer is NOT\nmeditation ! &nbsp;It is just a petition\nto&nbsp; God.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Meditation is a\ndetached observation of one's own mind, and its processes. &nbsp;The spiritual aims are peace of mind, wisdom,\nand, ultimately, a state of enlightenment or self-realization. &nbsp;During meditation thinking is separated from\nperceiving, so that the individual can stand apart from the emotional\nself.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The reason why people\nremain mired in negativity is because of the beliefs they have inherited over\ntime. &nbsp;&nbsp;Beliefs are subconscious. So a\nMaharishi named Manu can never benegative or a bigot , no matter how much you\ntry.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The ancient Vedic&nbsp; Indian psychology has a&nbsp; fourfold scale, which represents the degrees\nof the ladder of being by which man climbs back to the source, the absolute\ndivine. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The change, from \u201chere\u201d\nto \u201cthere,\u201d&nbsp; is not an uneventful process\nat all. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">There come dry periods,\ndeviations, violent alterations, and temptations. If there are raptures and\nazure heavens, there are anaconda agonies and absolute abandonments, howling\nhot deserts and \u201cdark cold nights of the soul\u201d to go through. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Streaming tears of joy,\nhorripilation (bristling of the hair), stigmata (bodily marks or pains), and\nparapsychological phenomena have been known to develop.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The first stage of\nmeditation&nbsp; achieves detachment from\nsensual desires and impure states of mind through analysis and reflection and\nthereby attains an emotional state of satisfaction and joy. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">In the second stage,\nintellectual activities are abated to a complete inner serenity; the mind is in\na state of \u201cone-pointedness\u201d or concentration, joy, and pleasantness. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">In the third stage,\nevery emotion, including joy, has disappeared, leaving the meditator\nindifferent to everything while remaining completely conscious. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The fourth stage is the\nabandoning of any sense of satisfaction, pain, or serenity because any\ninclination to a good or bad state of mind has disappeared. &nbsp;The meditator thus enters a state of supreme\npurity, indifference to everything, and pure consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Comprehendo?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I knew you cant\u2014 so leave it\n!</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharshis\nunderstood the staggering scale of the human mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, what is the\ndifference between a quantum physicist and an ancient Indian maharishi seer of\n9500 BC ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seer placed himself\ninside and saw outwards.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum scientist with a shriveled pineal\ngland and 2 strand DNA ( 97% junk ) with pre-conceived notions pounded in by a\nmoron Isaac Newton&nbsp; stood outside and\npeeked inside all the while scratching his head.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their state of\nhigher consciousness the seers realized that the ultimate constituents of the\nuniverse - energy and mass, particle and wave, - were but different aspects of\nthe same basic process, but the same Oneness which pervaded the entire\nuniverse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intuition of Indian\nmystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time\ncontinuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas state that\nwithout manifestation of time, the unmanifest material energy cannot become\nactive and take form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c<i>Elementary time is\nmeasured to its covering of a particular elementary space. &nbsp;That time which covers the unmanifest\naggregate of the elementary particle is called the great time ( Mahakala )</i>\u201d :-\n<b>Bhagawatam &nbsp;3.11.14- 5000 BC.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While modern\nmathematics, science and technology centre around linear dimensional reality ,\nbut the Vedic systems avail multidimensional spiraling reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our human brain is in\nreality none other than a biological space-time energy transducer. As such, it\ncreates not only space, but also time. Adi Shankaracharya pondered about the source,\nnature, foundation, scope, validity and limits of human knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the first\nmetaphysicist.&nbsp; Metaphysics&nbsp; means \u201cwhat comes after physics\u201d.&nbsp; Its object is to determine the real nature of\nthings\u2014to determine the meaning, structure, and principles of whatever is\ninsofar as it is-- with reality as a whole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a call to\nrecognize the existence and overwhelming importance of a set of higher\nrealities that ordinary men could not deduce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphysics is the\nscience of ultimate reality , as opposed to appearance or the contrast between\nappearance and reality . 99.9999% of every atom is empty space. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What we perceive as\nphysical dense matter is actually 99.999 % empty space - large electron fields\nwith very little matter in the center.&nbsp;\nWe live in a universe created of \"objects\" that are actually\n99.999% empty space.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS EMPTY SPACE , THE\nINTELLIGENT MORPHOGENETIC FIELD IS BRAHMAN-- THE HINDU GOD , AS PER ADVAITA\nVEDANTA&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is in perfect harmony and balance. The cosmos is a unified\nsystem. A little disharmony and the entire matter of the universe will go back\ninto the black hole ( Kali ) .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 7000 year old Upanishads we get a glimpse\ninto the workings of the minds of the great ancient Indian thinkers who were\nunhampered by the tyranny of religious dogma of men who became brokers of Gods\nor Gods themselves , burnings at the stake, political authority, pressure of\npublic opinion, seeking truth with single-minded devotion, rare in the history\nof thought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Indian sages were\nnot satisfied with their intellectual speculations. They discovered that the\nuniverse remained a mystery and the mystery only deepened with the advance of\nsuch knowledge, and one of the important components of that deepening mystery\nis the mystery of man and consciousness. The Upanishads became aware of this\ntruth, which modern science now emphasizes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Upanishads\ncontain such godlike fullness of wisdom on all things that I feel the authors\nmust have looked with calm remembrance back through a thousand passionate\nlives, full of feverish strife for and with shadows, ere they could have\nwritten with such certainty of things which the soul feels to be\nsure</span></i>.\"--<b>A. E. George Russell -Poet, mystic.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being in the zone is a\nstate of mind\u2014where you are free of thinking and negative emotions and in A\nFEELING MODE. &nbsp; &nbsp;The less you think, the more you achieve . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All have a sense of\nfinesse and grace, with mind and body working in perfect unison All of them are\nbeyond the boundaries of human ego, and feel that they are part of something\nlarger, where the laws of the physical world cease to exist, transcending the\ncondition of being human.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--All trust their\ninstincts and intuition to do the right thing at the right time, without\nreasoning or analysing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--All can feel what\u2019s\ngonna happen next and act according with the flow . The game comes to you and\nnot you going to the game.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LW8k9MtP1Yw/VFDX3Qyab7I/AAAAAAAAyBk/uZjcClIZt2M/s1600/tumblr_n3ukgufqee32t1tq3ol3o1_500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LW8k9MtP1Yw/VFDX3Qyab7I/AAAAAAAAyBk/uZjcClIZt2M/s1600/tumblr_n3ukgufqee32t1tq3ol3o1_500.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GENIUSES ARE ORDINARY PEOPLE WHO CAN MAKE CONSCIOUS\nTHEIR UNCONSCIOUS PERCEPTIONS. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER , EVERYTHING YOU DO WELL WITHOUT\nAWARENESS ,IS DONE BY THE SUBCONSCIOUS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GYzkeLVuXd0/VFDUg0-SN8I/AAAAAAAAyBQ/yTLCIJN8C4g/s1600/dowssnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GYzkeLVuXd0/VFDUg0-SN8I/AAAAAAAAyBQ/yTLCIJN8C4g/s1600/dowssnload.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When the left and right\nlobe of the brain works in harmony, the unleashed mysterious </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">K force </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">can made\nyou achieve the extraordinary .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Nididhyasana is the\nlast frontier the mind has to cross. It is the ultimate sadhana which one has\nto keep doing till the Truth is realised. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Nididhyasana is the\nfinal step of the spiritual journey but the most difficult one. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is\nonly with the grace of God and attunements received from of the Guru that one\ncan reach and cross over this stage</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZhQu_EWbs-o/VFDXjxXUKUI/AAAAAAAAyBc/8VQ2g9IVdO4/s1600/1342648378dd829307.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZhQu_EWbs-o/VFDXjxXUKUI/AAAAAAAAyBc/8VQ2g9IVdO4/s1600/1342648378dd829307.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya said 400 years ago\n\u2013 \u2018<i>Jnanena hi pramaanena avagantum ishtam\nbrahma</i>\u2019 \u2013 that this jnana, this knowledge which one has gained through the\nbuddhi is like a pramaan, a means to gain Brahma avagati, the direct\nrealisation of that Brahman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For nidhidhiyasan, the\nguide is the knowledge but finally the knowledge is also left behind and one\nremains as that Supreme Truth alone. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Nididhyasana\nis the practice of atma-vichara, self-enquiry, self-investigation,\nself-scrutiny or self-attentiveness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3m8Zue4Xxds/VFDYGu0i1vI/AAAAAAAAyBs/Qr87nCljzDE/s1600/kundalini1mej5jditation1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3m8Zue4Xxds/VFDYGu0i1vI/AAAAAAAAyBs/Qr87nCljzDE/s1600/kundalini1mej5jditation1.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It leads to Nirvikalpa\nSamadhi from where there is no return into lower states of consciousness, and\nin which state there is no longer mind, duality, a subject-object relationship\nor experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nididhyasana or\natma-vicara (self-enquiry), is subjective meditation in which there is no focusing\nof consciousness or effort of will in which process the ego withdraws into the\nsource. &nbsp;Upasana, which is symbolic\nmeditation, can give the required training to the mind to proceed with\nNididhyasana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NlCwdB1dgPA/VFDYTpEqotI/AAAAAAAAyB0/epBklNVQ9Ow/s1600/HolisticYogaMeditationee3.com_Wisdom_Quote_Krsna.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NlCwdB1dgPA/VFDYTpEqotI/AAAAAAAAyB0/epBklNVQ9Ow/s1600/HolisticYogaMeditationee3.com_Wisdom_Quote_Krsna.jpg\" height=\"480\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nididhyasana is the\nprocess of being the Self after knowing the Self. For nidhidhiyasan, the guide\nis the knowledge but finally the knowledge is left behind and one remains as\nthat Supreme Truth alone.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rL3vnuMJijo/VFDe2lvYEUI/AAAAAAAAyDQ/iuK-4Zyhx1E/s1600/downlcdoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rL3vnuMJijo/VFDe2lvYEUI/AAAAAAAAyDQ/iuK-4Zyhx1E/s1600/downlcdoad.jpg\" height=\"251\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The teaching of the\nUpanishads is divided in ten nididhyasanas, and the last is Aham Brahmasmi, I\nam Brahman.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ijI6I-7y0Fk/VFDdwHanXlI/AAAAAAAAyC8/cEPVOrwZfNY/s1600/dowffnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ijI6I-7y0Fk/VFDdwHanXlI/AAAAAAAAyC8/cEPVOrwZfNY/s1600/dowffnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">At the end of it all , the\nGuru and the shishya recite </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aham Brahmasmi</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> together- and then they part probably never to see again .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zbNNPD-b2is/VFDZ4wVjABI/AAAAAAAAyCA/xZkzMrr61rU/s1600/imageddtys.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zbNNPD-b2is/VFDZ4wVjABI/AAAAAAAAyCA/xZkzMrr61rU/s1600/imageddtys.jpg\" height=\"197\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you remove the limitations of the mind,\nthe ahamkara disappears, Brahman appears.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this is called the\nnididhyasana and you do it through the tarka pragnya is the base of the\nnididhyasana. It is about experiencing what has been understood.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lxW6S5k9Pnk/VFDcT2HdXqI/AAAAAAAAyCo/6s4Hl7njC1c/s1600/ieermages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lxW6S5k9Pnk/VFDcT2HdXqI/AAAAAAAAyCo/6s4Hl7njC1c/s1600/ieermages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Rig Veda\nthe knowledge of the \"soul,\" or the Self of all beings is the\nprerequisite to the understanding of anything else. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads say:\n\"Know that, by which everything is known\u201d.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OTKZw9U3lGE/VFDbTqwRMMI/AAAAAAAAyCU/hzYTICrYebQ/s1600/imaddges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OTKZw9U3lGE/VFDbTqwRMMI/AAAAAAAAyCU/hzYTICrYebQ/s1600/imaddges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we have a glimpse of the\nomnipresent nature of our consciousness, once we have a glimpse of a field of\nexistence that is indeed the omnipresent source of all that exists, we\nnaturally start to be aware of the interconnectedness of all levels of\ncreation. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Hf-rejEVsK0/VFDbonXhT7I/AAAAAAAAyCc/MbNc2TbUyGE/s1600/imfegeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Hf-rejEVsK0/VFDbonXhT7I/AAAAAAAAyCc/MbNc2TbUyGE/s1600/imfegeages.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we have seen the\nwhole, we start to recognize the parts as expressions of the whole. Since the\nwhole is holistic in its nature, its expressions are holistic representations\nof the whole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aham\nBrahmasmi\" - \"I am Brahman, I am the totality, really I am\neverything.</span></i>\"- <b>Upanishads 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oF9bRXofXYw/VFDa63xfohI/AAAAAAAAyCM/DzYzcLkN6BE/s1600/ee0b7f2d99d9ddwe295a050eed57c77105fc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oF9bRXofXYw/VFDa63xfohI/AAAAAAAAyCM/DzYzcLkN6BE/s1600/ee0b7f2d99d9ddwe295a050eed57c77105fc.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"273\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Lord Shiva as the FIRST Guru Daksinamurthy, attuning the 4 Sanatkumaras in total silence&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3mDfTl08WXo/VFDhGYJAAwI/AAAAAAAAyDc/TxlFQuG_sLM/s1600/dakshina-moeeforthy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3mDfTl08WXo/VFDhGYJAAwI/AAAAAAAAyDc/TxlFQuG_sLM/s1600/dakshina-moeeforthy.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sons of Brahma, who\nhad mastered the Vedas and Upanishands at a very young age , the four Kumaras\nSanaka, Sanandana, Sanatana and Sanatkumara,&nbsp;\ncame to have Darsana of Lord Siva and prostrated before him. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They entreated Lord Shiva to teach them the\nway to remove the veil of Maya or illusion.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: The curse of the 4 Sanatkumaras is the reason why Vishnu's beloved gatekeepers Jaya and Vijaya had to be bailed out by Vishnu in several avatars. &nbsp;</b></i></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every thing was\npre-ordained !</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jaya and Vijaya were first born as Hiranyaksha\nand Hiranyakasipu. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu as Varaha the\nboar killed most powerful Hiranyaksha ( Jaya ).</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu took another\navatar as Narasimha the lion man to kill powerful Hiranyakashipu ( Vijaya ). &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their second life\nJaya and Vijaya were born as Ravana and his brother Kumbhakarna . </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This duo was killed by Vishnu as avatar Lord\nRama .</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their third life\nJaya and Vijaya were born as weaker Sishupala and Dantavakra.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This duo was killed by Vishnu as avatar Lord\nKrishna.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k6rjb98qxC8/VFDjRP0uAnI/AAAAAAAAyEE/tv8Jns-N_nU/s1600/Jay%2BVijay%2Band%2Bfoheur%2BKumaras%2Bat%2BVaikuntha%2BLok.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k6rjb98qxC8/VFDjRP0uAnI/AAAAAAAAyEE/tv8Jns-N_nU/s1600/Jay%2BVijay%2Band%2Bfoheur%2BKumaras%2Bat%2BVaikuntha%2BLok.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"490\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Above: &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The four Kumaras mastered\nthe Vedas at the age of five, and were powerful in their own right !.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An\nallegory in the Puranas says that the 4 Kumaras, the first progeny of Brahma,\nwere without desire or passion, inspired with the holy wisdom, and undesirous\nof progeny. They refused to procreate, but were compelled later on to complete\ndivine man by incarnating in him.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The kumaras eventually\n\u201csacrifice\u201d themselves , in a pre-ordained manner by an incident , thus incarnating in mankind.</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva, hearing this appeal made by the sages, assumed the form of\nDakshinamurti .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He attuned them to the\nbrain wave frequency of Turiya and transferred the requisite knowledge to them\nby telepathy in total silence.\u2014 in a process called ATTUNEMENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qlYXnCq-D2w/VFDhqTKDb7I/AAAAAAAAyDk/aAl9-YLS98s/s1600/ww142.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qlYXnCq-D2w/VFDhqTKDb7I/AAAAAAAAyDk/aAl9-YLS98s/s1600/ww142.jpg\" height=\"640\" width=\"547\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya state there\nis the absolute awareness.&nbsp; It is the\nexperience of ultimate reality and truth. You are now a unique individual and\nyou are a vital part of a larger universal life force that transcends\neverything on earth.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hNCAL0SIpQQ/VFDiVK2_wlI/AAAAAAAAyDs/B9kql68kXwY/s1600/imagesCAtyyWL6LND.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hNCAL0SIpQQ/VFDiVK2_wlI/AAAAAAAAyDs/B9kql68kXwY/s1600/imagesCAtyyWL6LND.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Para represents the\ntranscendental consciousness;</i><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>pasyanti, the\nintellectual consciousness; <o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>madhyama, the mental\nconsciousness;<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>vaikhari, the physical\nconsciousness. <o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Four stages:\nconsciousness plus thinking is waking, consciousness minus thinking is turiya,\nunconsciousness plus thinking is dreaming, unconsciousness minus thinking is\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>OM is the four states\nof consciousness, as per Patanjali Yoga.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>OM is the waking state\nor jagrat. Beta brain wave<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>OM is the dreaming\nstate or svapna.&nbsp; REM sleep state<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>OM is the deep sleep\nstate or sushupti. (dream-less deep sleep state , the delta brain wave)<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Om is the transcendental\nstate or turiya. (beyond all the states) , the fourth has been called nirvana.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Finally, the\nsemi-circle symbolizes Maya and separates the dot from the other three curves.\nIt is the illusion of Maya that prevents us from the realization of this\nhighest state of bliss.&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>The semi-circle is open at the top and does not touch\nthe dot. This means that this highest state is not affected by Maya. Maya only\naffects the manifested phenomenon.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>In Turiya thoughts\nsubside and one becomes increasingly more awake; the mind settles down and\nconsciousness itself becomes primary.&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Mediators describe this as pure\nconsciousness or unbounded awareness. One sees the entire world and all things\nwithin it as part of oneself, and oneself part of all.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>&nbsp;Turiya&nbsp;\nis a state of transcendence, the result of arduous meditation.&nbsp; There can be no consciousness without passage\nthrough intense pain. The Upanishads equates this experience with\nenlightenment.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>We ordinary people lack\ncontact with our fourth state of consciousness, and so we fail to live up to\nour potential as human beings.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reality and truth\nbecome more clearly defined, allowing you to perceive that which lies above,\nbelow, and beyond the human experience.&nbsp;\nThis utterly quiet, peaceful and blissful state is the ultimate aim of\nall spiritual activity . This highest state is not affected by Maya .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya\nConsciousness&nbsp; is the ultimate goal of\nspirituality for here you know what freedom is all about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NPEob30GRO8/VFDikek-hjI/AAAAAAAAyD0/nTmKGcFWb98/s1600/turibbya3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NPEob30GRO8/VFDikek-hjI/AAAAAAAAyD0/nTmKGcFWb98/s1600/turibbya3.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sage is an\nextraordinary being. A sage does not dream, because he has no polarity. He\u2019s\njust a witness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This witness never\nsleeps. It is eternal awareness or Nirvana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Turiya is the totality of\neverything, and the headwaters from which all consciousness flow.&nbsp; It is said in the Mandukya Upanishad.&nbsp; \u201c It is unseen, transcendent, the sole\nessence of the consciousness of self, the completion of the world.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Turiya there is total mental clarity, and\ncomplete inner peace one recognizes the Self in every shining atom of\nexistence.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wFGAPvhBius/VFDi01hBEtI/AAAAAAAAyD8/rGrsvBuWOzo/s1600/States-Diagragm-Consciousness.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wFGAPvhBius/VFDi01hBEtI/AAAAAAAAyD8/rGrsvBuWOzo/s1600/States-Diagragm-Consciousness.png\" height=\"316\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nididhyasana is a\nsubjective meditation (atma vicara), in which the yogi withdraws his ego to its\noriginal source, instead of allowing it to chase the surrounding world.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As withdrawal of ego is complicated, the\naspirant by observance of continence, and with the help of an adept guru,\nmotivates and prepares his intellect through upasana initially, and rises to\nnididhyasana level of contemplation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thoughts and emotions\nhave an electromagnetic frequency vibration that is perceived by every cell in\nthe body through the instant communication system of scalar waves.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Scalar waves travel faster than light. &nbsp;The\nignorant west will understand all this after 100 years when India wields\nthe&nbsp; scalar weapons of Nikola Tesla.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar waves generated in the body also\nprovide an energetic communication system that connects all cells.&nbsp; This energy contains the power of the\nuniverse and has unlimited potential.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DNA helix is basically a mobius coil.\nThe Indian sage has exploded into a space of consciousness in which inner\nawareness is spontaneous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Realisation is\ndifferent from understanding. Our thoughts and actions are sometimes\ndissociated. &nbsp;At its highest level,\nknowledge blends with the being; it transforms the person. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the mere\nscholar, a true saint realises truth in his being.&nbsp; When this happens, one's being and knowing\nbecome identical. Truth is not merely to be known but realised in one's being.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No point in knowing drugs are harmful while still injecting yourself with\nheroin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The individual would no\nlonger be an information machine. He is truth himself. &nbsp;A doctor who goes beyond understanding medicine\nlives the life of a noble physician, &nbsp;who\nfollows his oath and follows the laws of the universe..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our intuition is like\nthe weather vane, pointing us in the right direction. It does not take your\ndecisions.&nbsp; Any idea or thought you\nyourself accept as true will be taken as a command by the subconscious mind, as\nit cannot distinguish between dreams and reality .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It pays to remember -- The subconscious\nresponds to stimuli, not pressure.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The face of a high board diver in the\nOlympics just before the jump for the gold medal -- is the face of a human\nbeing in the zone.&nbsp; The brain has\nsurrendered to the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OqNKtq9sGLc/VFEP31P8yfI/AAAAAAAAyEU/nV1NZ6DhnTA/s1600/Diving_Mens_10m_Platfofrrrm_Final_-_United_States_GOLD_th.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">Your attention\nis undivided and your awareness merges with your action.&nbsp; You are now inside the waterfall of the\nflow,&nbsp; highly aligned with the task in\nhand. There is NIL anxiety.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/1JuTChzX9wg/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/1JuTChzX9wg&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/1JuTChzX9wg&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">All biological behavior can be controlled by\n\u201cinvisible\u201d energy forces, which include thought and intention.&nbsp; Scalar waves can also be generated by\nbalancing the RH and LH lobes of your brain, if your pineal gland is still not\ncalcified.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Our cellular memory can store\nthe memory of physical trauma like accidents, wounds, surgeries, abuse,trauma ,\nfear etc that manifests in low self-esteem, stress etc. When trauma is\nsuppressed into the cellular memory, that energy can get stuck.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines can be\nused to explain cellular memory. You are given a shot that contains a small\ncontrolled amount of a bacteria. Your immune system immediately sets up a\ncounter-offensive to keep you from getting sick from it. &nbsp;Then your immune\nsystem 'remembers' that type of experience to keep you healthy. This means\nvaccines evoke cell memory by their actions. Cells can \u201cremember\u201d how to fight\na virus so you won\u2019t get reinfected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellular memory is the reason why after a\nheart transplant, patients are given immune suppressant drugs to stop their own\nbodies from attacking the new organ. YEH HAMAAR MAAL NAAHI HAI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sound of a\nparticular mantra has to pass through &nbsp;para,\n&nbsp;pasyanti, &nbsp;madhyama and vaikhari stages before it is\nfully experienced by the listener in perfection.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each stage of sound\ncorresponds to a level of existence, and one's experience of sound depends upon\nthe refinement of one's consciousness.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These four levels of\nsound correspond to four states of consciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Para represents the\ntranscendental consciousness;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pasyanti, the\nintellectual consciousness;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madhyama, the mental\nconsciousness;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaikhari, the physical\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a Gurukul there is a\nmass prayer , where the sishyas pray for the realization of a full life.&nbsp; Sayana prescribes four processes \u2013 sauca\n(purity), santosa (contentment), tapas (penance) and swadhyaya (self-study) for\nthe realization of a student\u2019s aims.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe gurukula system the teacher always instructed the pupils to speak the\ntruth, and practice virtue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below was the prayer in\nTaxila University where Chanakya was a professor . &nbsp;He resigned the day a\nforeign student told him that Alexander the Great has crossed the Dardenelles\nwith a huge army on horses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
