font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1: Lead us from Unreal\nto the Real,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2: Lead us from the\nDarkness to the Light,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3: Lead us from the\nFear of Death to the Knowledge of Immortality.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4: OM- Peace, Peace,\nPeace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3vvqGBFNoR0/VFGj6tztvxI/AAAAAAAAyE8/WP5h_tngTjg/s1600/imbtrsages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The disciple in the\nVedic school was called brahmacarin. &nbsp;&nbsp;He\nhad to dedicate his life for the sake of gaining knowledge, and leading a &nbsp;graceful life.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his formative life\nhe must lead an austere and disciplined life.&nbsp; &nbsp;He had to strictly abide by the rules of conduct and behaviour\nstipulated by the Guru&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads\nclearly describe the qualities required for a brahmacarin. &nbsp;A shishya had to be\ncalm, patient, self-restrained and self-denying.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DIGRESSION: EVERYTHING IN LIFE IS RELATIVE , &nbsp;RIGHT?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently I saw a\nprogram of TV .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A young pretty teacher\n, who chucked her job in USA, was being egged on by the Indian TV presenter, to\nsay how the call of patriotism gravitated her back to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen a train\nload of men without balls-- this female had it. She had character too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She cried, yet she came\nout with the naked truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the first day itself\nwith her heart pounding with excitement, as she was gonna teach in the land on\nmilk and honey, she got the rudest shock of her life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All her students aged\n16 to 18, were rude to here. One of them called her a fuc#in'&nbsp; bitch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last straw was when\none huge black guy sitting in the front row whipped out his huge stiff member\nand started masturbating, all the time looking at her figure with a glazed look\non his face.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ifvZ5nLQwUw/VFGkzVLzIlI/AAAAAAAAyFI/3Cd9ypdQuE0/s1600/frtyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ifvZ5nLQwUw/VFGkzVLzIlI/AAAAAAAAyFI/3Cd9ypdQuE0/s1600/frtyy.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She continued till the\nend of class and then ran to the teachers wash room to cry and wash her face.\nThere she saw her colleague crying loudly like a wounded animal . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">Another pretty teacher\n, from a poor family in India had joined the same day. This lady had taken\nloans to secure a job and travel there, and there were huge expectations back\nhome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her class it was a\nweird white guy with cold sores on his lips and punk hair do, who did the\nhonors with his tiny flaccid member. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">One day sage\nParashurama was resting with his head in the lap of Karna. &nbsp;Soon he fell asleep. Meanwhile a big insect\nstarted to bite the thigh of Karna. He felt agonizing pain and blood started to\nooze from the wound. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But he endured lest the\nsound sleep of his revered Guru should be disturbed. But the stream of warm blood reached the Guru due to which he was awakened from his sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">He was amazed at the degree of tolerance and\nendurance of Karna who did not even stir or move his body at such a great pain.\nBut a thought crossed Parashurama\u2019s mind: &nbsp;how could a mere Brahmin boy tolerate such\ngreat pain! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; The consequences would be grave.</i>\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mXzbSsN9Oic/VFGpfTF32bI/AAAAAAAAyF4/6-NoZ5kGQTY/s1600/8f14e45fce_138562178294fr9death_of_karna.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mXzbSsN9Oic/VFGpfTF32bI/AAAAAAAAyF4/6-NoZ5kGQTY/s1600/8f14e45fce_138562178294fr9death_of_karna.jpg\" height=\"316\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arjun saw only the eye\nof the fish overhead . At that time the activity in the neocortex ceases and\nthere is no thinking. &nbsp;The cerebellum\ntakes over at that point. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; It\nconsists in simple wants. The blatant display of status symbols&nbsp; is the result of low self esteem. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The self confident\nperson can afford to project a modest image. &nbsp;Only people with inferiority\ncomplex wants to impress others. He will never fall into the same hole twice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>For a Gurukul product no\norder is higher than his own intelligence and conscience .&nbsp; He is a success in life as all he really wants\nis only what he really needs.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">He was an expert &nbsp;in life management.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Life\nis a combination or physical, intellectual and spiritual aspects. &nbsp;&nbsp;Without spiritual development , man is\nwithout love or positive emotions ( affection, care, respect, sympathy ) . &nbsp;Self respect commands respect from others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The system was based on\nsimple living and high thinking. &nbsp;The\nenvironment was respected . &nbsp;Classes were\nnext to a water body under a banyan tree which gave positive vibes..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shishyas ate vegetarian\nfood. &nbsp;&nbsp;Self defence , sanskars ( ancient etiquette ) was\na compulsory part of education.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gurukul product\nwill engage any problem without getting overwhelmed. &nbsp;He will find a good match between the demands\nof the situation and his own innate ability.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-__57ZedQXPM/VFHhLrZjnVI/AAAAAAAAyHU/sEMJxLRlHr0/s1600/imaERges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">All these modern\npsychiatrists talk about past life regression.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">This means they are Hindus or they have stolen from our ancient texts.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For\nonly in Hinduism we have endless re-births till a person obtains Moksha , as a\nresult of NIL Karmic baggage . </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Past life\nregression is mentioned in the Upanishads of ancient India and is also</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">discussed in great detail in the Yoga Sutras\nof Pata\u00f1jali. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu scholar\nPata\u00f1jali discussed the soul being burdened with an accumulation of impressions\nthat were part of the karma from previous lives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali called the\nprocess of past life regression, prati-prasav ( literally \"reverse\nbirthing\"), and involved addressing current problems through memories of\npast lives.</span> <br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1r-H6hHKQo/VFHgXAomORI/AAAAAAAAyHI/O732X8t63W8/s1600/Patanjali_rr4Statue.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1r-H6hHKQo/VFHgXAomORI/AAAAAAAAyHI/O732X8t63W8/s1600/Patanjali_rr4Statue.jpg\" height=\"432\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Past\nlife regression a Vedic technique of Charaka is recommended for people who are\nwilling and decided to change, to secure relief from vices, negativity,\nrepetitive illnesses, phobias, separations and conflicts, inability to\nlove,trust, learn. etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon completion of the\npast life regression therapy, subjects are able to \u201creverse and resolve\u201d phobias,\nnegativity and vices&nbsp; which, they were\nunable to solve through any other modern treatment or therapy.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each cell in our body\nstores memories from early life, intra-uterine life, our parents and ancestors\nas well as, many past generations. &nbsp;A bio\ncomputer essentially acts like a file which when triggered causes us to act in\na repetitive manner.. &nbsp;Erasing stored\ntraumatic experiences from our cellular memory is akin to deleting a virus from\na computer.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">ALL VEDIC HEALERS WERE PSYCHIATRISTS - &nbsp; HOW MANY OF TODAYs PSYCHIATRISTS &nbsp;ARE HEALERS ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Oh Yeah?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Then why do a lot of them commit suicide ?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If each cell contains\nall of the information for the whole organism, then our experiences, good or\nbad, are also recorded on a cellular level. &nbsp;Those experiences that we perceive as life\nthreatening will continue to resonate within the memory banks of the body\u2019s\ncrystalline cellular and molecular matrix because we were not able to resolve\nthe conflict or dissipate its energy.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below</span><span style=\"color: red;\">: &nbsp;TIME FOR A\nMENTAL ORGASM -- </span><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;to make some immoral folks spill their brandy on their cigars, and get into a tail spin !.&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Check out the profound thoughts penned down 7000 years ago by\nancient Indians , when the white man was running around naked doing grunt grunt\nfor words .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The 4 Vedas and the 108 Upanishads are to India what the Crown and\nScepter are to an anointed king. They are India's proudest and most ancient\npossessions. It hardly matters if you are a Christian or a Muslim or even a\nPakistani-as long as you have Indian DNA.&nbsp;\nFor Vedas are NOT about religion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">A brilliant man like Schopenhauer found\nthe Upanishads to be the \"solace\" of his life and death, and Kant\nfound the Hindus were \"gentle\", that \"all nations are tolerated\namongst them.\" .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CfaarU5W0GI/VFL9MXysPkI/AAAAAAAAyKY/MsHzQ7SW8pg/s1600/devotiouinalindia-vedas-hindu-scriptures--14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CfaarU5W0GI/VFL9MXysPkI/AAAAAAAAyKY/MsHzQ7SW8pg/s1600/devotiouinalindia-vedas-hindu-scriptures--14.jpg\" height=\"213\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">India has the unique record of never attacking any\ncountry or stealing , in the past history.&nbsp;\nAll the obligatory duties of the Hindu owe their allegiance to the\nVedas. The Vedas in its unchanged unabridged format in Sanskrit verses , have\nguided the Indian\u2019s&nbsp; religious direction\nand conscience of its denizens for ages and will continue to do so till our sun\ngoes supernova.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The ancient Maharishis ( <span style=\"color: red;\">products of Nididhyasana </span>) were\nEpistemologists whose theories deal with puzzles about the source, nature,\nfoundation, scope, validity and limits of human knowledge. Vedas show how\nancient rishis experienced the divine reality and how they responded with exuberant\njoy, confidence and a feeling of intimacy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-v6ZPi2FFk4o/VFL87qTrJwI/AAAAAAAAyKQ/gBguC-Qnz60/s1600/imffages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-v6ZPi2FFk4o/VFL87qTrJwI/AAAAAAAAyKQ/gBguC-Qnz60/s1600/imffages.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">This literature is not rustic or\nprimitive but highly developed in its literary form, in its intellectual\ninsight, and in its questioning attitude. The glory of this vast literature is\nits imaginative and emotional qualities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Vedas are not puerile babblings of\nrustic troubadours or minstrels , but sedate out-pourings of exceptionally\nsharp and graceful minds in quest of truth .&nbsp;\nLike indestructible diamonds of brilliant fire they have come down\nseveral millenniums by oral route, before they were penned down 7000 years ago,\nwith no need to be revised or abridged, to suit the modern era.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8IZUZobH4-0/VFL9bxIq1pI/AAAAAAAAyKg/NCK_Npca9ls/s1600/Bathing_ghat_ffon_the_Ganges_during_Kumbh_Mela_2010_Haridwar.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8IZUZobH4-0/VFL9bxIq1pI/AAAAAAAAyKg/NCK_Npca9ls/s1600/Bathing_ghat_ffon_the_Ganges_during_Kumbh_Mela_2010_Haridwar.jpg\" height=\"280\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">From the Vedas evolved the Upanishads, whose\ncopious enquiries into the nature of man, the Universe, and God, strike the\nintelligent and high IQ modern scientific mind with speechless wonder.&nbsp; Vedas are verses written in the most\ndigitally perfect language in the world, Sanskrit. The rishis made claims so\ncosmic that even modern physics seems only to be catching up with them and\nrealizing, after every scientific breakthrough, that the ancients were there\nlong before them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Vedas&nbsp; are the\nworld's oldest intellectual legacies. They are the only composition in the\nuniverse invested with Divine origin, and hence divine sanctity. They have been\nheirlooms of the Hindus from generation to generation.&nbsp; Vedas record the spiritual experiences of\nsouls strongly endowed with the sense for reality.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bx4EyvLB7mg/VFL8li_m1KI/AAAAAAAAyKE/rUrdrgZzdq0/s1600/indiani9%2Bedu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bx4EyvLB7mg/VFL8li_m1KI/AAAAAAAAyKE/rUrdrgZzdq0/s1600/indiani9%2Bedu.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"309\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Vedas are the\nquintessence of classical Hindu philosophy. Thinking with your heart; loving\nwith your mind. All yoga and meditation aim to attain this goal. Anything else\nis Maya delusion, or worse.&nbsp; And when the\nheart sees, it sees the unknowable, nameless, formless, limitless, supreme God.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Vedas are the inspired utterances of a whole galaxy of realized souls, of\nspiritual geniuses, of people not merely well versed intellectually but with\nspiritual enlightenment. Vedic hymns are used today at Hindu wedding ceremonies,\nand temple and school prayers&nbsp; in an\nastonishing example of continuous tradition. The feat of memorizing and handing\ndown a vast amount of oral literature is a hallmark of Hinduism.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">While the Vedas\nlook outward in reverence and awe of the phenomenal world, the Upanishads look\ninward,&nbsp; finding the powers of nature\nonly an expression of the more awe-inspiring powers of human consciousness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1efhQ6J1nA8/VFL6naxSJQI/AAAAAAAAyJU/x76TzqSI7o8/s1600/45652708rr459.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1efhQ6J1nA8/VFL6naxSJQI/AAAAAAAAyJU/x76TzqSI7o8/s1600/45652708rr459.jpg\" height=\"235\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I\nwould like you to reflect on how many millions of people were killed by\nChristianity and Islam , reflect on the senseless Inquisitions and Crusades .In\nthe Upanishads we get a glimpse into the workings of the minds of the great\nIndian thinkers who were unhampered by the tyranny of religious dogma,\npolitical authority, pressure of public opinion, seeking truth with\nsingle-minded devotion,&nbsp; rare in the history\nof thought.</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QhJ8m40MaI0/VFL7cWh1FUI/AAAAAAAAyJ0/btQYPsycAn4/s1600/383px-Sun_temple_martuand_indogreek.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QhJ8m40MaI0/VFL7cWh1FUI/AAAAAAAAyJ0/btQYPsycAn4/s1600/383px-Sun_temple_martuand_indogreek.jpg\" height=\"281\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The sages who gave us\nthe Vedas and Upanishads did not care to leave their names; the truths they set\ndown were eternal, and the identity of those who arranged the words\nirrelevant. The Upanishads are not philosophy but are darshanas, \u201csomething\nseen\u201d and therefore to be realized. They are crammed with thoughts\nthat wander through eternity. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Their message is that there is far more to life\nthan success, and far more to success than money; and there can be no higher\ndestiny for man than to be engaged in endless seeking after endless truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">They give answers to\nthe three&nbsp; questions :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">\"Where\nis the life we have lost in living\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Where\nis the wisdom we have lost in knowledge?<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Where\nis the knowledge we have lost in information?<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Rishis had\nrepeatedly emphasized that the ultimate reality lies beyond the realms of the\nsenses and the grey matter beneath our skulls. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hark again to the\nUpanishads:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">\"There\nthe eye goes not<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Speech\ngoes not, nor the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">We\nknow not, we understand not,<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">How\nwould one teach it?\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yuakoTBQfsI/VFL62PGfb_I/AAAAAAAAyJc/NNcJwSChEmE/s1600/imageoos.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yuakoTBQfsI/VFL62PGfb_I/AAAAAAAAyJc/NNcJwSChEmE/s1600/imageoos.jpg\" height=\"141\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The ancient Maharshis\nunderstood the staggering scale of the divine play. Many millineums later the\nscientific mind still boggles at the scale of creation which makes infinity\nintelligible. In their state of higher consciousness the rishis realized that\nthe ultimate constituents of the universe - energy and mass, particle and wave,\n- were but different aspects of the same basic process, but the same Oneness\nwhich pervaded the entire universe.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Today science has relearned that lesson.&nbsp; Science, in its most advanced stage, is\ncloser to Vedanta than ever before.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5BugllJ5SBM/VFL7Syvi5BI/AAAAAAAAyJs/vMAGwfnmfto/s1600/imag65s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5BugllJ5SBM/VFL7Syvi5BI/AAAAAAAAyJs/vMAGwfnmfto/s1600/imag65s.jpg\" height=\"257\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Vedas and the Upanishads are summits of\nthought on mankind and the universe, designed to push human ideas to their very\nlimit and beyond. The human being is the central mystery of the universe\nholding the key to all other mysteries. It was such a science that India sought\nand found in the Upanishads in an attempt to unravel the mystery of human\nbeings and of consciousness.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The purpose of the Vedas was to ensure the true welfare\nof all beings, worldly as well as spiritually. Before such a synthesis could be\nachieved, there was a need to penetrate the inner worlds to its depth. This is\nwhat the Upanishads did with precision and gave us the science of the self,\nwhich helps man leave behind the body, the senses, the ego and all other\nnon-self elements, which are perishable.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4TcMpUszuc8/VFL96UxAkoI/AAAAAAAAyKo/mwVWlqFiCQo/s1600/hindugyu_temple.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4TcMpUszuc8/VFL96UxAkoI/AAAAAAAAyKo/mwVWlqFiCQo/s1600/hindugyu_temple.jpg\" height=\"478\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Upanishads tell us the great saga\nof this discovery \u2014 of the divine in the heart of man. These Indian thinkers\nwere not satisfied with their intellectual speculations. They discovered that\nthe universe remained a mystery and the mystery only deepened with the advance\nof such knowledge, and one of the important components of that deepening\nmystery is the mystery of man and consciousness.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Upanishads became aware of\nthis truth, which modern science now emphasizes. The physical and mental\nclimate that made it possible is the land of plenty that was India, a land\nwhere you must be blessed to be born in. They had found leisure and peace to\nthink and ask questions. They had the choice to utilize the leisure either to\nconquer the outer world or the inner.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pJcMqvkfW6A/VFL7Du25INI/AAAAAAAAyJk/PzhjyVljNLU/s1600/imagues.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pJcMqvkfW6A/VFL7Du25INI/AAAAAAAAyJk/PzhjyVljNLU/s1600/imagues.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"341\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">With their mental gifts, they had turned\ntheir mental energies to the conquest of the inner world rather than of the\nworld of matter and life at the sensate level. The Upanishads have given us a\nbody of insights that have a universal quality about them and this universality\nderives from their impersonality.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The sages who discovered them had\ndepersonalized themselves in the search for truth.&nbsp; Unlike modern Western philosophers who lift\nideas and patent it in their names. The rishis wanted to go beyond nature and\nrealize the transcendental nature of man. They dared to take up this challenge\nand the Upanishads are the unique record of the methods they adopted, the struggles\nthey undertook and the victory they achieved in this astonishing adventure of\nhuman spirit.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">And this is conveyed to us in verses of great resonance power and\npoetic charm.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">In seeking the immortal, the Vedic seers conferred the\nimmortality upon the literature that conveyed it.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DSCBakZWWas/VFLzSxvMFBI/AAAAAAAAyJE/-W-h6lftOUk/s1600/imuuages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DSCBakZWWas/VFLzSxvMFBI/AAAAAAAAyJE/-W-h6lftOUk/s1600/imuuages.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now listen carefully- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why does a new born\nkitten dig a hole in the ground, before a crap?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If this kitten is born\nin a city flat, why does it go through the motions as in the video below?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is about cellular\nmemory !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/GndyKlxATQ8/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GndyKlxATQ8&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GndyKlxATQ8&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second &nbsp;generation rats could do it faster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third generation\nliterally ran through the maze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GSto_jUd6GQ/VFLstEvzOfI/AAAAAAAAyIU/SFuJivCdaQg/s1600/downlrgy46uoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GSto_jUd6GQ/VFLstEvzOfI/AAAAAAAAyIU/SFuJivCdaQg/s1600/downlrgy46uoad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Without past life\nregression therapy it can be almost impossible to heal, as the memories are\nsuppressed and we are not aware of holding onto them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The healer&nbsp; helps the subject access the specific\ninternal negative file and then reprograms or formats it.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you magnify your cells down to\nyour atoms, you would see that you are made up of subtle bundles of\n\"info-energy.\"</span> &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Release stored emotions\nfrom your subconscious mind and cellular memory and find peace with your past,\nby past life regression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cells are constantly\ngrowing and dying they are the ultimate reflection of how the universe works. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is constantly changing,\nconstantly transforming chaos to order, darkness into light and requires all\nwho inhabit it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; padding: 0px 0px 5px;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE : &nbsp; On May 14 this year, the cybercrime cell had arrested and charge-sheeted the first accused, Ajit Vadakayil (58), a retired merchant navy captain from Manipal, Karnataka, for claiming on blogs and a website that proceeds from the show were being used to build mosques, thereby accusing Aamir of promoting Islamic fundamentalism.</span></i></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; padding: 0px 0px 5px;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Both Mr Vadakayil and Mr Shakhtawat have been booked under the IPC and Information Technology Act for spreading defamatory content.</span></i></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; padding: 0px 0px 5px;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cWe have also seized the data card and the laptop that was used to maintain the blogs and the content therein,\u201d said DCP Dhananjay Kulkarni.</span></i></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 18px; padding: 0px 0px 5px;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">On his part, Aamir put out a statement clarifying that the show was actually financed by a different organisation of the same name based in West Bengal, which was involved in social work among the villagers. &nbsp;: &nbsp;UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px; line-height: 16.8666667938232px;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">above is not true !</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Let me lay down the ground rules:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">1) TELLING THE TRUTH IS NOT DEFAMATION/ HATE SPEECH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 18px; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">2) OUR CONSTITUTION ALLOWS FREE SPEECH ESPECIALLY WHEN THE HONOUR OF BHARATMATA IS INVOLVED.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">( </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "363", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2362830446907845501/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8004603485675734678", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2014-10-27T09:28:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-10-28T20:43:31+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDE0NTA5MjExOTcxCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/thermal-oil-heating-on-chemical-tankers.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8004603485675734678", "title": "THERMAL OIL HEATING ON CHEMICAL TANKERS -  CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e0-50edXxHo/VE3CK4py9WI/AAAAAAAAx-E/2JTJMaXTdBg/s1600/im54eages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e0-50edXxHo/VE3CK4py9WI/AAAAAAAAx-E/2JTJMaXTdBg/s1600/im54eages.jpg\" height=\"253\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermal oil heating is\nrequired when the chemical cargo to be heated reacts with water ( leaky coils ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERMAL OIL HEATING IS USED\nTO HEAT EXTREMELY TOXIC CARGOES , WHERE THE RETURN STEAM CANNOT BE TAKEN BACK\nTO ENGINE ROOM.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thermal oil heating is done where the cargo requires very high heat -- steam is just over is 100 deg C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Cargo tank heat\nexchanger heats thermal oil which is circulated in Cargo heating coils. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On IMO 2-type Chemical\ntanker it is required by Class to have a physical split between the cargo part\nand the \u201cheat producing\u201d part of the system, by means of e.g. heat exchanger to\navoid the risk of flammable liquids reaching the oil fired heater (in case of\neventual leakages in the heating coils). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not use thermal oil\nfor heating edible liquids. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oil is heated by steam\nand then fed into the coils in a closed cycle.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;In case you do not have thermal\noil heating on your ship, try and use adjacent heat.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A typical ship system\u2019s\noperation is as follows\u2014 &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 2 sets of\ncirc pumps at 35 cum/ hr.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Open\ncirc pump inlet valve and steam heater inlet valve fully<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Open\noutlet valves by one turn only<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Put\non the circulating pump<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adjust\noutlet valves to obtain correct pressure<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember\nthat the viscosity of thermal oil is high in the beginning.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So\nkeep valve throttled for some time.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a 200 mm mesh\nfor straining and a separator for removing impurities. Confirm cooling water\nflow to circ pump.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check level of\nexpansion tank, usually on the highest deck Set temperature regulator to the\ndesired temperature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERMOMAT THERMAL OIL\nHEATERS : &nbsp;&nbsp;The THERMOMAT is a forced-circulation heater\nof 3- pass design for organic, high-temperature heat-transfer media on mineral\nor synthetic basis. It consists of a cylindrical combustion chamber, formed by\nclosely bended pipes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This principle ensures\nthat a defined heat transfer is achieved at any point of the heating surface.\nForced circulation, and thus the flowing speed, is ensured by measuring and\nmonitoring the volume flow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It operates\npressure-free with a temperature range of up to 340\u00b0C. At a temperature range\nof &gt;340\u00b0C to&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">400\u00b0C it is necessary\nto consider a system pressure of up to 12 bar.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It operated with the\ncustomary heat carriers, which do not cause any corrosion \u2013 either in the\nheater or in the pipeline system. Nitrogen can be used to keep the heating\ninstallation stable, durable and fully operational over a period of many years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EXHAUST-GAS THERMAL OIL\nHEATER: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Exhaust-Gas Thermal Oil\nHeater economically utilizes exhaust gases. &nbsp;The available heat of the Exhaust-Gas Thermal\nOil Heater could be used to heat up thermal oil to a temperature 100\u00b0C to 350\u00b0C<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To maximize heating\nefficiency can both horizontal and vertical heating coils be used in cargo\nheating. The pipe materials are stainless steel .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary circuit is\nused to provide the main heating medium for the secondary oil circuit which is\nused to heat the tanks. It is provided with two circulating pumps and the\noperator is able to control the temperature of the oil by opening any of the\nthree heaters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The secondary oil\ncircuit consists of a electric circulation pump and deck heaters located on\ncargo tanks. An enclosed drain system is fitted for the purpose of collecting\noil leakage from the thermal oil pumps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MCA considers thermal\noil heating units as high risk areas and recommends the installation of local\nwater- based fire-fighting systems, particularly on chemical tankers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: <span style=\"color: blue;\">A stainless steel tank in a Chemical tanker ( we may have as many as 50 tanks ) </span>--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">---we carry different types of cargo-- &nbsp;deadly poison cyanates ( like the Bhopal one ) , olive oils, &nbsp;orange juice, &nbsp;sulphuric acid, fish oil, tallow, white phosphoric acid for Coke, red and white wines, bacardi rum, &nbsp;gasoline, corrosive caustics , diesel oil, clay slurry for making crockery and paper , latex rubber -- <span style=\"color: red;\">anything liquid under the sun</span>&nbsp;.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bpBb2ilRIos/VE-yZcY-4wI/AAAAAAAAx-0/l0sogLXRRsU/s1600/ddde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: orange; font-size: large;\"><b>Nor, do you have to be\na shoemaker to check out if the shoe fits your leg.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel himself has said\nthat ancient Hindus were the first to develop &nbsp;\u201cdialectical logic\u201d&nbsp; or a method of \u201cquestion and answer\u201d in\nphilosophy .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Vedic\nMaharishis were the first to investigating the nature of truth by the criticism\nof initial concepts and hypotheses. &nbsp;The\nancient Indian Vedic dialectic is based on a dialogue between two or more\npeople who may hold differing views, yet wish to pursue truth by seeking\nagreement with one another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\ndebate, in which two or more people hold differing views and wish to persuade\nor prove one another wrong (and thus a jury or judge is needed to decide the\nmatter), or rhetoric, which is a relatively long oration conducted by a single\nperson.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hagel also referred to \u201cSocratic\ndialectic\u201d.&nbsp; &nbsp;Hegel does NOT know that all of Socrates\nphilosophy was lifted whole sale from ancient Sanskrit texts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectics gives\nexpression to a law which is felt in all grades of consciousness and in general\nexperience. Everything that surrounds us may be viewed as an instance of\ndialectic. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are aware that\neverything finite, instead of being inflexible, is rather changeable and\ntransient; and this is exactly what we mean by the dialectic of the finite, by\nwhich the finite, as implicitly other than it is, is forced to surrender its\nown immediate or natural being, and turn suddenly into its opposite.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
