, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel has zilch understand of what he talked about. This is what happens\nwhen you lift ideas wholesale from Spirituality and clad it for the material\nworld. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel has lifted his ideas\nfrom the amazing DVAITA VEDANTA of Hindusim , perceived 30 millinuems before he was born --in a MORBID manner .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegelianism declares\nthat the human mind can\u2019t understand anything unless it can be split into two\npolar opposites. &nbsp;Good / Evil, &nbsp;Right / Wrong, &nbsp;Left / Right\u2014 THESIS \u2013ANTITHESIS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6vINuy_BxI8/VEm_-56BP6I/AAAAAAAAxbk/Og8AVzEF0oM/s1600/DIalecticbtjEffect.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6vINuy_BxI8/VEm_-56BP6I/AAAAAAAAxbk/Og8AVzEF0oM/s1600/DIalecticbtjEffect.gif\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dvaita Vedanta explains\nhow the Cosmos works on the MACRO and MICRO scales.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a dance of\nopposites. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This what BRAHMA (\ncreator ) \u2013 VISHNU ( mediator ) - SHIVA ( destroyer ) is all about. &nbsp;&nbsp;They are Cosmic force fields. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So if some TRIPLE SRI\nsays on TV while speaking to Barkha Dutt / Karana Thapar that Lord Vishnu had homosexual\nsex with Lord Shiva to produce the 9<sup>th</sup> avatar Lord Ayyappa (\nSabarimala is this planet\u2019s No 1 pilgrimage \u2013 55 million pilgrims in 2014. ) we\nknow he has an agenda , and we know who opened his branches in 153 countries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">DVAITA VEDANTA OF\nSANATANA DHARMA VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These opposite forces cannot\ndance and be mediated unless it is put on a template of a Morphogenetic\nConciousness field &nbsp;\u2013 &nbsp;a intelligent &nbsp;field which cannot be detected by our 5 human\nsenses we Hindus call brahmAn ( our Hindu god ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the macro level it is the\nAkasha ( aether ) and at the micro level it is the empty space within the atom\nin which the electrons whizz around furiously.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">To give you a brief\nidea how muddled Hegel\u2019s mind is ,&nbsp; let\nme give some quotes.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am being kind to him\nwhen I will NOT reveal what his medical condition is termed in Modern Psychiatry.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I suggest my laymen readers\nto skip this blue coloured prose \u2014it is NOT worth putting too much &nbsp;JOR ON DIMAAG . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinkers can read this .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirit is the \u201cnature\u201d of individuals, their immediate\nsubstance, and its movement and necessity; it is as much the personal\nconsciousness in their existence as it is their pure consciousness, their life,\ntheir actuality.</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; color: red;\"><b>Jena Lectures of 1805-6</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Absolute substance ... is the unity of the different\nself-related and self-existent self-consciousnesses in the perfect freedom and\nindependence of their opposition as component elements of that substance: Ego\nthat is \u201cwe\u201d, a plurality of Egos, and \u201cwe\u201d that is a single Ego. Consciousness\nfirst finds in self-consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Phenomenology of Spirit (1807)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reason is negative and dialectical, because it\nresolves the determinations of the understanding into nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Science of Logic (1812)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is this self-construing method alone which enables\nphilosophy to be an objective, demonstrated science. It is in this way that I\nhave tried to expound consciousness in the Phenomenology of Spirit.\nConsciousness is spirit as a concrete knowing, a knowing too, in which\nexternality is involved; but the development of this object, like the\ndevelopment of all natural and spiritual life, rests solely on the nature of\nthe pure essentialities which constitute the content of logic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Preface to The Science of Logic (1812)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectic is here understood in the grasping of\nopposites in their unity or of the positive in the negative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Science of Logic (1812)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p2FTa_dwldU/VExXHaAqM3I/AAAAAAAAx2Y/AedH-UuDnXo/s1600/1609u99a.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-p2FTa_dwldU/VExXHaAqM3I/AAAAAAAAx2Y/AedH-UuDnXo/s1600/1609u99a.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectic has often been regarded as an art, as though\nit rested on a subjective talent and did not belong to the objectivity of the\nNotion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Science of Logic (1816)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DovycPdMpkU/VEnQy4rDfaI/AAAAAAAAxcQ/y3H7iezcZWw/s1600/0AAA4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DovycPdMpkU/VEnQy4rDfaI/AAAAAAAAxcQ/y3H7iezcZWw/s1600/0AAA4.jpg\" width=\"208\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science exhibits itself as a circle returning upon\nitself, the end being wound back into the beginning, the simple ground, by the\nmediation; this circle is moreover a circle of circles, for each individual\nmember as ensouled by the method is reflected into itself, so that in returning\ninto the beginning it is at the same time the beginning of a new member. Links\nof this chain are the individual sciences [of logic, nature and spirit], each\nof which has an antecedent and a successor \u2013 or, expressed more accurately, has\nonly the antecedent and indicates its successor in its conclusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Science of Logic (1816)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conception and its existence are two sides,\ndistinct yet united, like soul and body. The body is the same life as the soul,\nand yet the two can be named independently. A soul without a body would not be\na living thing, and vice versa. Thus the visible existence of the conception is\nits body, just as the body obeys the soul which produced it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Right (1821)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ozXMvfpLSgk/VExXZ6gwSHI/AAAAAAAAx2g/I7KURCpYxHA/s1600/Unification%2BThipnought41.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"288\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ozXMvfpLSgk/VExXZ6gwSHI/AAAAAAAAx2g/I7KURCpYxHA/s1600/Unification%2BThipnought41.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The inner dialectic of civil society drives it to push\nbeyond its own limits and seek markets in other lands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Right (1821)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nation state is Mind in its substantive\nrationality and immediate actuality \u2014 the absolute power on earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Right (1821)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">World history is not the verdict of mere might, but\nactualisation of the universal mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Right (1821)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The history of Mind is its own act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Right (1821)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Swbszi21QfA/VExYmG2CehI/AAAAAAAAx3A/fJ0XqqaK3p8/s1600/hegel-presen6rjtaciones-ppt-2-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Swbszi21QfA/VExYmG2CehI/AAAAAAAAx3A/fJ0XqqaK3p8/s1600/hegel-presen6rjtaciones-ppt-2-728.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spiritual culture, the modern intellect, produces this\nopposition in man which makes him an amphibious animal, because he now has to\nlive in two worlds which contradict one another.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Introduction to the Lectures on Aesthetics (1826)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Think for yourself\u2019 is a phrase which people often use\nas if it had some special significance. The fact is, no man can think for\nanother, any more than he can eat or drink for him. In point of contents,\nthought is only true in proportion as it sinks itself in the facts; and in\npoint of form it is no private act of the subject, but rather that attitude of\nconsciousness where the abstract self, freed from all the special limitations\nto which its ordinary states are liable, restricts itself to that universal\naction in which it is identical with all individuals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Encyclopedia of the Philosophical Sciences.\nPreliminiary Notion (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8xo_EI635vI/VExVRZLSdtI/AAAAAAAAx2E/MrgVDsNX3Js/s1600/spiral_dynathmemics_aqal_simple.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8xo_EI635vI/VExVRZLSdtI/AAAAAAAAx2E/MrgVDsNX3Js/s1600/spiral_dynathmemics_aqal_simple.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my Phenomenology of the Spirit, which on that\naccount was at its publication described as the first part of the System of\nPhilosophy, the method adopted was to begin with the first and simplest phase\nof mind, immediate consciousness, and to show how that stage gradually of\nnecessity worked onward to the philosophical point of view, the necessity of\nthat view being proved by the process. But in these circumstances it was\nimpossible to restrict the quest to the mere form of consciousness. For the\nstage of philosophical knowledge is the richest in material and organisation,\nand therefore, as it came before us in the shape of a result, it presupposed\nthe existence of the concrete formations of consciousness, such as individual\nand social morality, art and religion. In the development of consciousness,\nwhich at first sight appears limited to the point of form merely, there is thus\nat the same time included the development of the matter or of the objects\ndiscussed in the special branches of philosophy. But the latter process must,\nso to speak, go on behind consciousness, since those facts are the essential\nnucleus which is raised into consciousness. The exposition accordingly is\nrendered more intricate, because so much that properly belongs to the concrete\nbranches is prematurely dragged into the introduction. The survey which follows\nin the present work has even more the inconvenience of being only historical\nand inferential in its method. But it tries especially to show how the\nquestions men have proposed, outside the school, on the nature of Knowledge,\nFaith, and the like - questions which they imagine to have no connection with\nabstract thoughts - are really reducible to the simple categories, which first\nget cleared up in Logic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Encyclopedia of the Philosophical Sciences.\nPreliminiary Notion. (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oj0eG0JOMYk/VExZDaS138I/AAAAAAAAx3I/3vg0PMMSeuY/s1600/imaghgfites.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oj0eG0JOMYk/VExZDaS138I/AAAAAAAAx3I/3vg0PMMSeuY/s1600/imaghgfites.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Trying taking this book to the Jaipur literary fest and watch how the peabrained moth eaten faced STARDUST writers (who love French wine) faint. &nbsp;</b><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">Above: Jaipur fest !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z_dHpZLJrRo/VEnQ2_9B77I/AAAAAAAAxcY/Kv9p6dIu4Mo/s1600/0AAAd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z_dHpZLJrRo/VEnQ2_9B77I/AAAAAAAAxcY/Kv9p6dIu4Mo/s1600/0AAAd.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To know what free thought means go to Greek\nphilosophy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic. (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What we want is to combine in our process of inquiry\nthe action of the forms of thought with a criticism of them. The forms of\nthought must be studied in their essential nature and complete development:\nthey are at once the object of research and the action of that object. This is\nDialectic, instead of being brought to bear upon the categories from without,\nit is immanent in their own action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pure Being, as it is mere abstraction, is just\nNothing. In fact this definition is implied in saying that God is only the\nsupreme Being and nothing more. The Nothing which the Buddhists make the\nuniversal principle, as well as the final aim and goal of everything, is the same\nabstraction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830</b>)</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OBGK5KBck0w/VExZbzhlLRI/AAAAAAAAx3Q/q5gRzvfJXNY/s1600/Dialejkooctical%2BCycle%2B1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"304\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OBGK5KBck0w/VExZbzhlLRI/AAAAAAAAx3Q/q5gRzvfJXNY/s1600/Dialejkooctical%2BCycle%2B1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Newton gave physics an express warning to beware of\nmetaphysics, it is true, but to his honour be it said, he did not by any means\nobey his own warning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universal ... cost thousands of years to enter the\nconsciousness of men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their objective sense, the three figures of the\nsyllogism declare that everything rational is manifested as a triple syllogism;\nthat is to say, each one of the members takes in turn the place of the\nextremes, as well as of the mean which reconciles them. Such, for example, is\nthe case with the three branches of philosophy: the Logical Idea, Nature, and Mind.\nAs we first see them, Nature is the middle term which links the others\ntogether. Nature, the totality immediately before us, unfolds itself into the\ntwo extremes of the Logical Idea and Mind. But Mind is Mind only when it is\nmediated through nature. Then, in the second place, Mind, which we know as the\nprinciple of individuality, or as the actualising principle, is the mean; and\nNature and the Logical Idea are the extremes. It is Mind which cognises the\nLogical Idea in Nature and which thus raises Nature to its essence. In the\nthird place again the Logical Idea itself becomes the mean: it is the absolute\nsubstance both of mind and of nature, the universal and all-pervading\nprinciple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Idea, as unity of the Subjective and Objective\nIdea, is the absolute and all truth, the Idea which thinks itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The method is not an extraneous form, but the soul and\nnotion of the content.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Shorter Logic (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nature passes over into its truth, the subjectivity of\nthe concept, whose objectivity is itself the suspended immediacy of\nindividuality, the concrete generality, the concept which has the concept as\nits existence \u2014 into the Spirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Philosophy of Nature (1830)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each individual is the child of a people at a definite\nstage of its development. One cannot skip over the spirit of his people any\nmore than one can skip over the earth. But only through his own effort can he\nbe in harmony with his substance; he must bring the will demanded by his people\nto his own consciousness, to articulation. The individual does not invent his\nown content; he is what he is by acting out the universal as his own content.\nThis universal content everyone must activate within himself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>General Introduction to the Philosophy of History\n(1831)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the course of history two factors are important.\nOne is the preservation of a people, a state, of the well-ordered spheres of\nlife. This is the activity of individuals participating in the common effort\nand helping to bring about its particular manifestations. The other important\nfactor, however, is the decline of a state. The existence of a national spirit\nis broken when it has used up and exhausted itself. This development is\nconnected with the degradation, destruction, annihilation of the preceding mode\nof actuality which the concept of the Spirit had evolved. This is the result,\non the one hand, of the inner development of the Idea and, on the other, of the\nactivity of individuals, who are its agents and bring about its actualization.\nIt is at this point that appear those momentous collisions between existing,\nacknowledged duties, laws, and rights and those possibilities which are adverse\nto this system, violate it, and even destroy its foundations and existence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>General Introduction to the Philosophy of History\n(1831)</b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAP RE !</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Jm88O0KEFVI/VE0Jd7n0MEI/AAAAAAAAx7o/VwCCztBOOUA/s1600/doddewnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Above: I urge all my readers to see the movie <span style=\"color: blue;\">MY COUSIN VINNY </span>twice ! &nbsp;This movie moulded my mindset ! &nbsp;Such a great movie ( very small budget ) will NOT happen again !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a child will NOT\nfall prey for the Hegelian Dialectic if he remembers the process involved. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine Nambi Narayanan of ISRO or our wannabe\nsecond Gandhi .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately think about\nwho will gain or profit from it. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then remove yourself\nfrom the equation and take a step back to look at it from a third party\nperspective. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;See the so-called\n\u201cproblem\u201d, look at who is reacting, why and in what way. &nbsp;Then look for who is offering up the solution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EllWFU_Dm9g/VEnpia47kTI/AAAAAAAAxdg/HwErT7EnnMg/s1600/imdgesCANTQN1P.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EllWFU_Dm9g/VEnpia47kTI/AAAAAAAAxdg/HwErT7EnnMg/s1600/imdgesCANTQN1P.jpg\" width=\"284\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AK-49 had offered lot\nof solutions. &nbsp;Let the Magsaysay award\nwinners and Nobel prize winners (like Amartya Sen ) decide about Jan Lok Pal.&nbsp; &nbsp;Foreign funded NGOs must NOT be in the purview\nof Jan Lok Pal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: The man who nearly became India's PM for life.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I learnt this very\nearly by an ordinary event .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I used to frequent a\nforeign bank in Calicut. I would go first to a pretty girl who worked as an\nintern for my father \u2013and she was the bank managers secretary &nbsp;. The second was an old colleague of my father\nwho joined the bank\u2014and he was the senior most who knew the job . . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So one day I walked\ninto the bank managers cabin ( a young Tamilian ) and told him that the young\nlady and the old man are both missing, so he has to attend to my work urgently .\n&nbsp;Then I asked him in jest \u201c I hope your pretty\nsecretary has NOT eloped with that old man !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His first reaction was \u201c\nWho will gain from this ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">War is the ultimate\ndiscipline to any government. &nbsp;If it can\nsuccessfully meet the challenge of war, it will survive. &nbsp;If it cannot, it will perish. &nbsp;&nbsp;Everything else is secondary. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE GULF OF TONKIN LIE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7xdGfdEiryQ/VEoX_R4GuSI/AAAAAAAAxf4/-UsOWIkrI0Y/s1600/ut-vietddenam-girl.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most\nshameful legacies of the Vietnam War is the US military's use of the deadly\ndefoliant Agent Orange/Dioxin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The military sprayed it to kill people like\ncockroaches , unsparingly over much of Vietnam's land. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VWYl1U1cn_4/VEoY1RXi_2I/AAAAAAAAxgQ/S3EhTIfmb3A/s1600/imytitages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VWYl1U1cn_4/VEoY1RXi_2I/AAAAAAAAxgQ/S3EhTIfmb3A/s1600/imytitages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 3.3 million\nVietnamese still suffer the effects of those deadly chemical defoliants. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oBnXGpROLIc/VEoZc0KAViI/AAAAAAAAxgo/LIUghQDEamo/s1600/agent-oranmk%3Bge4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Paris Peace Accords signed in 1973, the\nNixon administration pledged to contribute $3 billion toward healing the wounds\nof war and the post-war reconstruction of Vietnam.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That promise remains\nunfulfilled.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">AND THE WINNER IS\nVADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ei6jbf_ZNNY/VEoYosIA9NI/AAAAAAAAxgI/E2_FgMyyNjk/s1600/timddethumb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate obstacle to\nBig Brother is a patriot government which declines to finance its wars through\ndebt. &nbsp;&nbsp;Although this seldom happens,\nwhen it does, it will be necessary to encourage internal political opposition,\ninsurrection, or revolution to replace that \u201cnot playing ball\u201d&nbsp; government with one that is more compliant to\nR\u2019 will. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many such heads of state suddenly died\nmysteriously or were assassinated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Sikhs were mere pawns in the assassination of Indira Gandhi-- her fate was sealed as soon as she nationalised the banks . &nbsp; BBC was there to watch it LIVE .</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vlnTyOnGYBs/VEodNwXO1uI/AAAAAAAAxg8/8DMfo9IbXck/s1600/imreghjages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big Brother will keep\nusing his R media to talk about the virtues of peace. But the unspoken objective\nis perpetual war . In any conflict which leads to war, unless one of the\ncombatants is very hostile to R interests and, therefore, must be destroyed,\nneither side should be allowed a decisive victory or defeat. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both sides ( say Iraq\nand Kuwait ) have to be milked after the war .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
