font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Kuwait was encouraged by Zionists to do slant\ndrilling and steal Iraqi oil, which pissed off Saddam Hussain, as a rich man is\nNOT supposed to steal in his culture.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Wars became easy\nto finance through central banking and fiat money they became virtually\nperpetual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5ZLvdioazRM/VEohtC02LQI/AAAAAAAAxhM/RasD1SHgOb0/s1600/imag23fes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"250\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5ZLvdioazRM/VEohtC02LQI/AAAAAAAAxhM/RasD1SHgOb0/s1600/imag23fes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As long as the\nmechanism of central banking exists, it will be to such men an irresistible\ntemptation to convert debt into Perpetual war and war into perpetual debt\u201d\n-Edward Griffin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel's different way\nof thinking has become known as dialectical thinking. &nbsp;&nbsp;When thinkers ask, what type of nonsense dialectical\n&nbsp;philosophy is this , they are told by\nthe master con-man\u2019s agents , that it can be can only be seen in practice.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_h86-ozJWBk/VEojWfIlI8I/AAAAAAAAxhc/GY0bt_a-wnk/s1600/holocaugeggst-unravels.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"612\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_h86-ozJWBk/VEojWfIlI8I/AAAAAAAAxhc/GY0bt_a-wnk/s1600/holocaugeggst-unravels.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nwill explain, it is NOT a &nbsp;\"method\" or a set of principles, which\ncan be simply stated and then applied to whatever subject-matter one chooses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They will give bull from the Vedas \u2013 &nbsp;for Hegel,\nonly PURNAM , the whole is true. Every stage or phase or moment is partial, and\ntherefore partially untrue.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CRgVw5_DJv8/VEojOFdh3TI/AAAAAAAAxhU/8-sPEySHnzc/s1600/problemrehjjactionsolutionfz0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CRgVw5_DJv8/VEojOFdh3TI/AAAAAAAAxhU/8-sPEySHnzc/s1600/problemrehjjactionsolutionfz0.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel dissolves\nclassical static view in a dynamic movement towards the whole.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3kKWSHz5-3g/VEok5OEpz0I/AAAAAAAAxhs/Aks4XntKcKo/s1600/imaffges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3kKWSHz5-3g/VEok5OEpz0I/AAAAAAAAxhs/Aks4XntKcKo/s1600/imaffges.jpg\" width=\"268\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing is lost or\ndestroyed but raised up and preserved as in a spiral.&nbsp; Think of the opening of a fern or a shell.&nbsp; Mindless lifting from spirituality and\napplied on materialism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vGRR-2pbsdY/VEokjgL3DRI/AAAAAAAAxhk/ltzL5-W6uZ0/s1600/imddtages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vGRR-2pbsdY/VEokjgL3DRI/AAAAAAAAxhk/ltzL5-W6uZ0/s1600/imddtages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel even has a name\nfor it\u2014hold your breath--\"sublation\"- a translation of the German\nterm aufheben.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now in German Aufheben has\nseveral contradictory meanings, including \"to lift up\", \"to abolish\",\n\"cancel\" or \"suspend\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast Sanskrit has NIL ambiguity.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel has taken pains\nto explain that in his brand of philosophy, &nbsp;aufheben is what what happens when a thesis\nand antithesis interact . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term Aufhebung thus\nhas the apparently contradictory implications of both preserving and changing,\nand eventually advancement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, so , &nbsp;Sublation is the motor by which the dialectic\nfunctions. May be now it has frog jumped to \u201cmediate\u201d , &nbsp;\"preserve\", and \"transcend\u201d \u2013\nlike what Lord Vishnu does ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sublation exists at the most basic level of\nHegel's system of logic.&nbsp; &nbsp;The two concepts Being and Nothing are each\nboth preserved and changed through sublation in the concept Becoming.&nbsp; &nbsp;Quality,\nand quantity, are each both preserved and sublated in the concept measure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1PZDULLnxWo/VEooZBPfaEI/AAAAAAAAxh8/pC2u26hQaog/s1600/imagrrhes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1PZDULLnxWo/VEooZBPfaEI/AAAAAAAAxh8/pC2u26hQaog/s1600/imagrrhes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel's philosophy of\nhistory stresses the importance of negative (the antithesis) in\nhistory\u2014negative includes wars, etc. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PLiM_uHMrOM/VEopARBmEdI/AAAAAAAAxiM/NWLBQavKGRk/s1600/imnykgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"291\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PLiM_uHMrOM/VEopARBmEdI/AAAAAAAAxiM/NWLBQavKGRk/s1600/imnykgages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without\ncreated conflict Hegel cannot take off.&nbsp; Why\nhas this planet given any importance to this man ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-L2UDpUnUTN8/VEoo5DHGKjI/AAAAAAAAxiE/x5wGJWTS2N8/s1600/imntrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-L2UDpUnUTN8/VEoo5DHGKjI/AAAAAAAAxiE/x5wGJWTS2N8/s1600/imntrages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His conception of historical\nprogress follows a dialectic spiral, in which the thesis is opposed by the\nantithesis, itself sublated by the synthesis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">APPIDIYAAA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">APPIDITHAAN !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DkM9d6ooKSc/VEonlvAYWaI/AAAAAAAAxh0/jcVNn7HZ1-w/s1600/methods-of-mafhjnipulation.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DkM9d6ooKSc/VEonlvAYWaI/AAAAAAAAxh0/jcVNn7HZ1-w/s1600/methods-of-mafhjnipulation.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hey, do NOT condemn him\n\u2013his supporters say.&nbsp; For in Hegel's\nlogic, self-contradiction is legitimate and necessary. &nbsp;&nbsp;For anything to happen, everything has to be\nin place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel, history (like\nlogic) proceeds in every small way through sublation . &nbsp;&nbsp;For Hegel, reflective thought is to be\navoided due to its circularity\u2014hey, what about his mangy spiral? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;So war is peace ! &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is genius, right!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WRONG !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel calls on\nspeculative thought: two contradictory elements are held together, uplifted and\nsublated without completely destroying one another. &nbsp;&nbsp;Copied from ancient &nbsp;Indian philosophy without understanding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel calls this\ndynamic aspect of his thinking the power of \"negation\". If negation\nis the inner life-force of the dialectic, then triadic structure is its\norganic, fractal form. &nbsp;Oh boy he even\nintroduced FRACTAL geometry into this amalgam. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PRvNlaTFc9k/VEoyHU1W3GI/AAAAAAAAxis/4stWqAtutco/s1600/inwsmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PRvNlaTFc9k/VEoyHU1W3GI/AAAAAAAAxis/4stWqAtutco/s1600/inwsmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So this means Hegel\nnever used the terms thesis, antithesis and synthesis\u2014and somebody has been\nputting translation lies in his books?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not at all!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WTOha3hzxcs/VEo1TOXR6BI/AAAAAAAAxjM/WBLyJUa8TOE/s1600/imagdddes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WTOha3hzxcs/VEo1TOXR6BI/AAAAAAAAxjM/WBLyJUa8TOE/s1600/imagdddes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dialectical method\nof &nbsp;Hegel &nbsp;consists of two main DIABOLICAL steps: &nbsp;the invention of artificial extremes\n(``thesis'' and ``antithesis'') which superficially conflict with each other,\nand the synthesis from that conflict of a goal, which is made to appear to be\nthe product of consensus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-knkLaMdvIZE/VEox1TN3y_I/AAAAAAAAxik/IiY4X3i0Yu8/s1600/im'i68ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-knkLaMdvIZE/VEox1TN3y_I/AAAAAAAAxik/IiY4X3i0Yu8/s1600/im'i68ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The artificial extremes\nare chosen and propagandized (marginalizing the population) by the PRESSTITUTE\nmedia in such a way that the goal is naturally synthesized from them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is, essentially, a gargantuan punishable fraud.\n&nbsp;It is a strategy of ideological\ndivide-and-conquer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mb6ZPHeuCPM/VEoyvxnR35I/AAAAAAAAxi0/YgBC_zcBWto/s1600/dowjutnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mb6ZPHeuCPM/VEoyvxnR35I/AAAAAAAAxi0/YgBC_zcBWto/s1600/dowjutnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dialectic ruse\ndissipates the energy and coherency of its targets - unless they recognize the\nruse as such.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5JBLgzCuS5s/VEozCi_aH6I/AAAAAAAAxi8/aAaixwGffPc/s1600/full_dialecticbse2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"610\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5JBLgzCuS5s/VEozCi_aH6I/AAAAAAAAxi8/aAaixwGffPc/s1600/full_dialecticbse2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A central precept of\nthe Hegelian ethic is that people are principally motivated by the desire to\nreceive the approval and recognition of others, and to avoid their disapproval.&nbsp; &nbsp;Hegelianism\nworks directly to subvert the individual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lncrs3mkFn8/VEozuuj8YHI/AAAAAAAAxjE/UMllAGzVo1c/s1600/maslow%2Bhierarchy%2Bgreesmaller.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"242\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lncrs3mkFn8/VEozuuj8YHI/AAAAAAAAxjE/UMllAGzVo1c/s1600/maslow%2Bhierarchy%2Bgreesmaller.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How was Hegel catapulted to fame?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Illuminati was a secret\nsect invented by German Jew Rothschild using a fellow German Jew Joseph Johann\nAdam Weishaupt to infiltrate Freemasonry, in 1776 . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was to take advantage of the Grand Orient\nFreemason Lodges to cloak the true nature of their FUTURE evil drug running and\nslave running work in philanthropy and to spread their atheistic-materialistic\nideology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Weishaupt\nrecruited more than 2100 agents.&nbsp; He\nchose the most intelligent men in the field of arts and letters, education,\nMath, science, finance, and industry.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weishaupt was given a\nunlimited expense account by Rothschild, to mentor and tutor these chosen\nmercenaries, who were well paid on the best methods of bribing, manipulating\nand controlling people, public opinion and the press. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weishaupt used the\nmethods employed by Voltaire, to achieve such brainwashing mind control. Once\nin there was no way out-- only death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xiewSH91qpU/VEpW_J_eVLI/AAAAAAAAxjk/LufOdZuQOYo/s1600/ADAM%2BWIEShgkHAUPT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xiewSH91qpU/VEpW_J_eVLI/AAAAAAAAxjk/LufOdZuQOYo/s1600/ADAM%2BWIEShgkHAUPT.jpg\" width=\"273\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Weishaupt reorganized\nthe Illuminati by May 1, 1776.&nbsp; This is\nthe famous May Day which the whole world celebrates.&nbsp; In Germany, Walpurgisnacht,&nbsp; the night from 30 April to 1 May,&nbsp; is the night when witches are reputed to hold\na large celebration on the Brocken and await the arrival of spring. The new\norder was&nbsp; called&nbsp; \u201cthe Bavarian Illuminati\u201d.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam adopted the code\nname \u201cSpartacus\u201d, as he considered himself a liberator of the human\nconsciousness and of the dogmas and religions that enslaved men.&nbsp; The mission of the Illuminati order was the\nabolition of all monarchical governments and state religions in Europe and its\ncolonies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The order formed an\nelaborate network of spies and counter-spies throughout Europe. Adam Weishaupt\nhimself was initiated into the Masonic Lodge \"Theodor zum guten\nRath\", at Munich in 1777.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term Illuminati, is\nderived from Lucifer, meaning \u201cholder of the light.\u201d&nbsp; The plan deceptively uses the phrase \u201cpeace\non earth\u201d and necessitates the destruction of all existing governments and\nreligions through a process of dividing the masses into opposing warring camps\nin ever increasing numbers on political, social, economic, and other issues. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People would fight and\nweaken themselves and gradually destroy national governments and religious\ninstitutions.&nbsp; On the 22 of June 1784,\nthe Bavarian authorities on some inside information raided Adam Weishaupt\u2019s\nhome on how to control all facets of Freemasonry,&nbsp; overthrown all European Monarchies and put an\nend to the Catholic Church using the same methods that the Jesuits used to\nprotect it from Protestantism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Writings that were\nintercepted in 1784 were interpreted as seditious, and the Illuminati Society\nwas banned by the government of Karl Theodor, Elector of Bavaria, in 1784.&nbsp; Weishaupt was sacked from the University of\nIngolstadt and he promptly went underground. The shocked Bavarian authorities\nordered the prosecution of all members of Freemasonry and the Illuminati.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, Weishaupt and\nhis family was rescued by Rothschild with the helped of Ernest II, Duke of\nSaxe-Gotha-Altenburg ( also a member of the Illuminati ). He lived in Gotha\nunder the Duke's protection until his death on the 18th of November 1830.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Owner of British East\nIndia Company Rothschild, (Mayer) died on September 19, 1812. Through his will,\nhe left an enormous amount of gold ( Tipu Sultan\u2019s gold in 1799 , which Tipu\nstole from Kerala temples ) to his five sons and \u201cbusiness\u201d instructions\npertaining to marriage, total family control and absolute secrecy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild policies\ninclude \u201ctotal ruthlessness in all business dealings.\u201d&nbsp; Everything is shrouded in secrecy, a\ncharacteristic they subtly impose on their multitudes of minions who, through\ncareful observation, have discovered that discreetness is much more conducive\nto their general well-being. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every money-making\nopportunity is just business \u2013 war, terror, genocide, mass public plunder,\nopium drug running, black slave running,&nbsp;\n\u2013 all disguised with the \u2018right rhetoric\u2019 for mass acceptability. The\nRothschild family epitomized the phrase \u2018international banker. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now punch into Google\nsearch \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DIRTY SECRETS OF BOSTON\nTEA PARTY VADAKAYIL.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This will give you an\nidea who their US agents are. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; It has been decided by the state that the\n15th of August this year will be celebrated as the Silver Jubilee year of\n\u2018independence day\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is to say that the\ncountry was freed from foreign rule after many centuries and \u2018we\u2019 ruled our own\n\u2018nation\u2019.&nbsp; Or so they say.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to me this is\nnot the day when we \u2018got independence\u2019.&nbsp;\nOn the contrary it\u2019s the day when suitable conditions were created for\nslavery, idiosyncrasy, unethical behaviour and dishonesty to thrive. It is that\nday of sorrow.&nbsp; It is 25 years since that\n\u2018day of sorrow\u2019 began.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am not saying this\nnow.&nbsp; I said it the day \u2018indian\nindependence\u2019 was announced. The day the declaration of \u2018independence\u2019 was made\npublic I said very clearly in the editorial in Kudiarasu that \u2018this is a day of\nsorrow. It is a day of shame for the nation and all of mankind\u2019.-- UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erode Venkata Ramasami\nPeriyar started each of his public by categorically asserting the non-existence\nof god.&nbsp; He did not believe in the\nexistence of soul. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVR Periyar a born\nHindu was vehemently opposed to Hinduism and Islam.&nbsp; He never ever criticized Christianity,\nthe&nbsp; reason why there are so many Tamil\nChristian converts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Periyar dead against\nSanskrit and Hindi as a national bonding language.&nbsp; He favored Tamil language and a separate\nnation for Tamils.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We all remember how Tamils objected to Teacher\u2019s\nday being renamed as Guru Divas. In\n1953 in order to discourage idol-worship, Periyar led a statewide campaign to\nbreak the idols of Lord &nbsp;Ganesh at public\nplaces .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EV Ramasamy Periyar was buried and NOT cremated at Periyar Thidal on\n25 December in a&nbsp; wooden coffin , with\nplenty of Christians in attendance .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was NOT a Muslim, to\nbe buried-- all know that. They even enjoyed\ncomedies about the gods. What they wanted from the gods was Beauty, Drama, Art\nand Fate. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel wrote that the pagan (\nHindus)was neither passive nor zealous, neither pious nor sinner. &nbsp;The pagan (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> leave aside Capt Ajit Vadakayil\nborn for this purpos</span></i>e ) didn't use history to prove his religion. &nbsp;The final authority of religious truth, for\npagans, was the human heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Georg Hegel has written\nthat every aspect of the life of Greece and Rome interweaved Pagan mythology in\nits bosom. &nbsp;It was at home, at school, in the theater, in the Senate, in the\nbattlefield and in the public square. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judaism was created by disgraced Namboodiris. Jesus Christ\nstudied in Kerala, before he suddenly burst upon the scene at Jerusalem . Koran\nwas edited at Kodungallur Cheraman Perumal mosque of Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel asked -- could\nChristianity have overwhelmed the Roman Empire if it was not psychologically\nsuperior to paganism ( Hinduism ) ? &nbsp;Was this not a proof of Divine forces\nbehind Christianity as the white man cried ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel believes\notherwise. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his view, Rome fell to\nChristianity by way of the Emperor's bureaucracy. The pagan gods only ruled\nnature. Now, with the doctrines of individual worthlessness, anti-heroism and\nhuman corruption, the god which fit the spirit of this time would demand to\nrule the individual will as well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right theology appeared at the right\ntime. Christianity began to spread.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild used his two\nstooges &nbsp;Adam Smith and Georg Hegel, to \u201cdevelop\non the epistemological issues concerning our understanding of the\nself-reflective nature of our participation in economic activities\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAP RE !.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adam Smith and Georg\nWilhelm Friedrich Hegel laid down the conception of the constitution of the economic\nprocesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Adam Smith &nbsp;focused on the economic mechanism of the market\nbased exchange process, Georg &nbsp;Hegel wass\nconcerned with how economic interactions also entail a larger social and\npolitical system within which it they are embedded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAP RE YET <b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;YENOTHER </span></b>TIME !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For both Hegel and\nSmith, there is a moral element entailed in explaining the market economy,\nwherein individuals interact within an intersubjective &nbsp;space.&nbsp; Hegel\nagrees with Smith that the commercial society is a self-regulating mechanism. Hegel\nis concerned by \u2018historically effected consciousness\u2019 (wirkungsgeschichtliches\nBewusstsein).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MODERN ECONOMICS, AN\nEMPIRICAL VULGAR PSEUDO SCIENCE VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"> .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1847 the London\nCommunist League (Karl Marx and Frederick Engels) used Hegel's theory of the\ndialectic to back up their economic theory of communism. &nbsp;&nbsp;Now, in the 21st century, Hegelian-Marxist\nthinking affects our entire social and political structure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hegelian dialectic\nis the framework for guiding our thoughts and actions into conflicts that lead\nus to a predetermined solution. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bWwzqdJxe-k/VEp1Kjn_r2I/AAAAAAAAxlY/-1lLaIWfqOg/s1600/imouygvages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we do not understand\nhow the Hegelian dialectic shapes our perceptions of the world, then we do not\nknow how we are helping to implement the vision. When we remain locked into\ndialectical thinking, we cannot see out of the box.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel's dialectic is\nthe tool which manipulates us into a frenzied circular pattern of thought and\naction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-14Kbn1bK9e4/VEp0FnLoHUI/AAAAAAAAxlQ/cNb1g-xTGqc/s1600/ima%2C7tges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-14Kbn1bK9e4/VEp0FnLoHUI/AAAAAAAAxlQ/cNb1g-xTGqc/s1600/ima%2C7tges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can see Hegel\u2019s &nbsp;influence on all of our destinies worldwide.\n... , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Below: The government takes\nTrillions of taxpayer dollars to bail out banks and pay huge bonuses to those\nworking in the financial industry who created the problem in the first place.\nThe taxpayer is left with the debt and austerity measures.</i></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-06sYGUq5OEY/VEqdbtdOTBI/AAAAAAAAxn0/7yBzmpQEFBc/s1600/ac.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-06sYGUq5OEY/VEqdbtdOTBI/AAAAAAAAxn0/7yBzmpQEFBc/s1600/ac.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The history of the\neconomic crises experienced in America can only be understood within a\nframework of the Hegelian dialectic process.&nbsp;\n: Problem-Reaction-Solution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE GREAT DEPRESSION\nVADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why does it take a\nblogger to tell India,&nbsp; that our most\nvaluable Nuclear scientist Homi Bhabha was missiled out of the sky,&nbsp; &nbsp;nearly\nhalf&nbsp; century after it happened ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t we have any\nintelligence agencies ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">HOMI BHABHA IN AIR\nINDIA FLIGHT AI 101 CRASH VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every major financial\ncrisis America has experienced in her history has followed this same Hegelian\ndialectic pattern with the outcome being another incremental step toward world\nfinancial domination by an elite few. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International\nbankers create the Problem in the first place... the Reaction is the economic\ncrisis... and the Solution is provided by the same bankers and bureaucrats that\ncreated the problem in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE MURKY TRUTHS OF\nINFLATION AND GLOBALISATION &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yj6QE9Ssru8/VEqhFaII9CI/AAAAAAAAxok/ya4N5ERccmo/s1600/ijrjages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegelian dialectical\ntheory is simply a philosophy, a way of thinking\u2013a thought process. &nbsp;But when taken to its diabolical extreme, &nbsp;and applied by unscrupulous characters, &nbsp;it is a very dangerous and lethal strategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For it is not a new\nstrategy or idea, but an very spiritual ancient one. &nbsp;&nbsp;And it takes many forms. &nbsp;Indeed, it can be difficult to expose the\nstrategy, even by those deeply familiar with it, because the agenda is hidden,\nand the predetermined ends are kept secret by the evil people employing the\nstrategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hegelian dialectic\nis not only a strategy of outcomes, but also a strategy of psychological projection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-21t7nU7FIdk/VEqkr_6mMhI/AAAAAAAAxpM/SnJ_EK52NLY/s1600/imawtygesCAK8S85I.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"214\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-21t7nU7FIdk/VEqkr_6mMhI/AAAAAAAAxpM/SnJ_EK52NLY/s1600/imawtygesCAK8S85I.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectics has its\norigins in ancient Vedic society 30,000 years ago, penned down 7000 year ago in\nSanskrit, &nbsp;lifted by Greeks 2400 years\nago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qnavmQBwN-0/VEqjx6A7PkI/AAAAAAAAxos/zpYfdNi_zYw/s1600/imagesCAPUfMOQA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noble Maharishis sought\nto understand Nature as a whole, and saw that everything is fluid, constantly\nchanging, coming into being and passing away. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wW-R8u7HK_A/VEqkUQX-F7I/AAAAAAAAxpE/vOAL8pwClMg/s1600/imfages%2B(8).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These ancient Sanskrit texts were translated\nby the white invaders.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OyieQCzqw4o/VEqj8rSmzVI/AAAAAAAAxo0/UNIbUdLllCo/s1600/wrer.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best of western philosophers could NOT understand the\ndeep wisdom contained in the verses of these ancient texts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EcrxghInqTw/VEqkLSxDz6I/AAAAAAAAxo8/VpwzNDmV1Po/s1600/imeages%2B(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So they developed this\nridiculous piecemeal method of observing nature in bits and pieces. These white\nmen accumulated enough half baked &nbsp;knowledge for the interconnections, the\ntransitions, the genesis of things to become comprehensible ( sic) , that\nconditions became ripe for modern dialectics to make its appearance.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v4qg-EVNiOA/VEr3lKWMFfI/AAAAAAAAxqc/YdwDs8Ik3u8/s1600/doEEwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-v4qg-EVNiOA/VEr3lKWMFfI/AAAAAAAAxqc/YdwDs8Ik3u8/s1600/doEEwnload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel with\nhis limited intelligence tried his best &nbsp;to sum up this picture of universal\ninterconnection and mutability of things in a system of Logic which is the\nfoundation of what we today call Dialectics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectics provides the\nfoundation for Marx\u2019s theory of dialectical materialism\u2013an outgrowth of\nHegelian dialectics. &nbsp;&nbsp;This is an important\ndistinction to make\u2013meaning, not to confuse Hegel\u2019s dialectics with Marx\u2019s\nmaterialistic philosophy of dialectical materialism. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russian students attending university in the\nformer Soviet Union were required to take three years of materialistic philosophy.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leftist political\nstrategy centers around the concept of dialectical change.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dialectic is\nanalogous to the argument that \u201ceverything is just shades of gray.\u201d&nbsp; Hegel\u2019s dialectical process proposes there\nare only shades of gray\u2013no black or white.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE ARE NO BLACK AND\nWHITE ANSWERS TO LIFE.&nbsp;&nbsp; EVERYTHING COMES\nIN SHADES OF GREY \u2014&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hegel bhaiyya , this truth has been penned down in our\nUpanishads &nbsp;7000 years ago .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Tum kaayikko chori kiya re ?</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-E4hJrk-CHT8/VErph5VmRlI/AAAAAAAAxpc/tauQbEppKX8/s1600/imffgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
