line-height: 150%;\">He did NOT answer\n,instead he rambled \u201c See this is the way we did navigation in the navy \u2013these are\nDR scenarios \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I said \u201c Captain saab, I want\nyou to go down to your cabin. &nbsp;I am in\ncommand now unofficially . &nbsp;When I get a position by radar , and after I alter course , I will\nhand over charge ( command ) back to you. &nbsp;We are right inside the Gulf of Kutch and we\nare doing 19 knots of speed due to spring tides . If you do NOT leave the\nbridge I will call my Cadets and physically lift you and take you down \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He left without a word-like a beaten dog<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After some time , I got\na fix using the radar. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Okha radar coast line was etched in my head. &nbsp;It would come as spots &nbsp;NOT a coast line ,on those old model &nbsp;radar screens &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;If we had altered at that time with more than\n15 metres of draught we would have run aground. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">After I altered course\nI called the Captain back.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">I whispered into his ear \" You are back in command , sir!\" .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nHow many of you have seen the movie CRIMSON RAGE. ( In fact as soon as he felt the ship\nshaking under his feet he ran to his cabin and locked his door and went under\nhis blanket )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote a personal\nincident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">I was a two striper\nsecond mate and was fast asleep , after finishing my 12 hours of night watch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bosun cried \u201c\nSecond Saab, hold no 4 is on fire &nbsp;. We\ntold the Chief Officer 15 minutes ago and he just disappeared. Captain is\nashore&nbsp; .\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this case my 3\nstriper Chief Officer was a full Commander in the Indian navy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So I jumped into my\nboiler suit and shoes\u2014and when I reached hold no 4, almost the entire Mumbai shore\ndock workers were milling around the hold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I rushed in grabbed the\nnearest FOAM extinguisher told the crew to lower it into the hold. I noticed\nthat two sets of breathing apparatus was missing from its place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To cut a long story\nshort\u2014I put of the fire and came up gasping\u2014all alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fighting fire is an\nart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I demanded , where is\nthe Chief Officer?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chief Engineer told\nme \u201c That stupid cu#t is hiding near the mate\u2019s locker , and he has the two\ncadets with him . &nbsp;It is I who told the crew to wake you up \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below:&nbsp; The fighters must not draw until the clock of the Transylvanian town makes\nthe first chime of the high noon hour\u2026note the weather beaten clock -- check out Raimi's attention to creaky sound detail&nbsp;</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RyTjHrA6k5o/VEZhNIKYVGI/AAAAAAAAxTU/MxDzShxpx6Q/s1600/imah6uges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RyTjHrA6k5o/VEZhNIKYVGI/AAAAAAAAxTU/MxDzShxpx6Q/s1600/imah6uges.jpg\" height=\"215\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this contest, anyone\ncan enter. The renegade contestants are paired off, and at the stroke of 12 on the town\nclock, they stand in the middle of the street and shoot at each other.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One must\ndie in order for the other to win. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Raimi's wild camera angles --getting killed while proving themselves&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">Then\nit's on to the next round (in this frontier town it's \"High Noon\" over and\nover again). &nbsp;The last man standing\ncollects the prize money. &nbsp;Ze</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;prize is to\ndie for and of course many will before it's all over.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said, Herod\nis always the last man standing.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nrequires zilch acuity to figure this out as he has been doing it for years and\nhe is still alive. &nbsp;He gets to draw and\nkill all his enemies and of course the winner\u2019s paycheck is always safe with\nhim--and his reputation as the fastest gun in the West snowballs.</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the first round of\nduels, Herod kills braggart , leather suited and booted Ace Hanlon, who had\ntaken credit for some of Herod's own accomplishments.. &nbsp;As soon as he falls, the people of this sad town\n, rush in to scavenge all his body leather .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Herod later learns that\nthe townspeople have secretly hired a bounty hunter, Clay Cantrell, to enter\nthe contest and kill him, but he kills Cantrell instead. &nbsp;Herod then angrily informs the townspeople\nthat since they had so much money to hire a bounty hunter , he's gonna raise\nthem taxes.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Flashbacks reveal that The Lady's true name is\nEllen, and she had grown up in Redemption, where her father was the town's\nMarshal.&nbsp; One day Herod and his men\ninvaded the town, killed all the deputies and tied her father to the gallows.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Herod gave Ellen a gun and offered to let her shoot the rope and free him. &nbsp;However, she missed and killed her father\ninstead. Seeking revenge, she has come to Redemption with the intent of killing\nHerod.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Herod's idea of\nkicks is standing up a man on a chair, tying a noose around his neck and\nshooting the chair out from under him splinter by splinter.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7NCILfuKNCo/VEZ5AbBoRNI/AAAAAAAAxTg/WEyEEsUMKZs/s1600/imktdqages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7NCILfuKNCo/VEZ5AbBoRNI/AAAAAAAAxTg/WEyEEsUMKZs/s1600/imktdqages.jpg\" height=\"215\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to fight Herod\n, Ellen &nbsp;must beat everyone else in the competition. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above :&nbsp; The cocky kid bites the dust . He had\nsaid&nbsp; \"Damn, I'm fast!\" after\nwasting an opponent, and he ponders loudly&nbsp;\n\"Is it possible to improve on perfection?\". He could improve on his whimpering, now ! &nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></i></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The cocky Kid had big\neyes for Ellen.</span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Ellen and Cort are\nforced to face each other, they refuse to open fire and Cort only shoots Ellen\nafter Herod threatens to kill them both. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cort furiously\nchallenges Herod to a duel the next day, but seconds before their duel, Ellen\nsuddenly reappears after using the Kid's stolen dynamite to blow up Herod's\nillegitimate business establishments: &nbsp;she and Cort had faked Ellen's death with\nhelp from Wallace and a blind salesman.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below:&nbsp; Raimi's style of direction is\nlarger-than-life. Check out the outrageous Bugs Bunny-style bullet hole. &nbsp; &nbsp;EXIT WOUND HAI TO AISA ! &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">In one scene a shootist\nshoots his gun and the camera becomes the bullet\u2026little things like that reminds you, yes-- you are watching a Sam Raimi film.</span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pShH2zgiCpU/VEcqy8XjMqI/AAAAAAAAxVw/RMY_joyEb_w/s1600/imagy%2Cyes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pShH2zgiCpU/VEcqy8XjMqI/AAAAAAAAxVw/RMY_joyEb_w/s1600/imagy%2Cyes.jpg\" height=\"175\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the confusion, Cort\ndispatches Herod's men while Ellen goes on to fight Herod. Although Herod\noutdraws and shoots Ellen in the arm, she shoots him in the chest and finishes\nhim once and for all with a well-aimed gunshot to the eye. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With Herod gone and the\nlaw restored, Cort becomes the new Marshal of the town as Ellen rides off into\nthe sunset-like how my sh#t doesn\u2019t smell Rambo rode away to land of freedom Pakistan\nwith Osama Bin Laden and Taliban riding hells bells behind him .trying to keeping\npace. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raimi's &nbsp;screen-framing\ntrademark is a camera shot where the camera follows a bullet creating a\nfirst-person point of view from the object itself--extreme closeups using a\nwide angle lens, the lot.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Water holds memory.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
