font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>HINDUISM IN BALI, TURN\nOF TIDE AND HINDU RESURGENCE VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HIQ5FtulvCM/VD1MV3T4ZWI/AAAAAAAAxCw/GR0b9Y8J5ps/s1600/imagesCAMM3BddW3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HIQ5FtulvCM/VD1MV3T4ZWI/AAAAAAAAxCw/GR0b9Y8J5ps/s1600/imagesCAMM3BddW3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the great\nKuruskhetra war , that&nbsp; nearly destroyed\nhumankind and humanity alike, the battle field lay still ! &nbsp; The battle was over\n, and the vast field lay blood soaked and strewn with bodies of kings, princes\nand soldiers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was no mood for\nhip-hip huzzah among the surviving Pandava &nbsp;army. Most stood sullen and stunned\nby the gruesome bloody scene . They were devastated at the destruction that a single\nwar had caused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stunned and speechless,\nthey scanned the battle field to check out for survivors among the\nlifeless.&nbsp; Gandhari with her blind fold\nstill in place was crying over her dead sons.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was rambling in extreme grief , her speech slurred. \u201cDuryodhana , my\nson , open your eyes. speak to me my first born\u2026A hundred did we bear, all fine\nand proud. Was it for such a foolish end? Her husband, the blind king\nDritharashtra stood by, looking lost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pandavas and\nKrishna hurried over to Gandhari and Dritharashtra, to offer their respects,\napologies and condolences.&nbsp; Sanjaya, the\nking\u2019s escort, gently bent down to Gandhari, to inform the blindfolded woman of\nthe arrival of the Pandavas and Krishna.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chaste Gandhari's grief turned to a burning rage . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She went up to Krishna\nand screamed . &nbsp;The Pandavas recoiled in fear.&nbsp;\nGandhari cried out to Krishna \u201cYou, who I worshipped as Vishnu and You,\nknown as an avatar of the supreme godhead. Aren\u2019t you ashamed of your doings? &nbsp; Could you not have averted this war with your divine will and power? &nbsp;Is this\nhow you answer my prayers? &nbsp;Ask your mother, Devaki, the pain of losing a child.\nShe had seven of her children being killed at birth and now I have seen a\nhundred sons of mine being butchered to death\u201d . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna smiled .\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She now vented her\nsteam \u201c Oh mocking god , If my years of Vishnu bhakthi have been true, and if I\nhave been true to my husband with this blindf, then, may you die in 36 years\nfrom today. May Dwaraka be flooded , may every one of your Yadava kin perish\nby killing each other, just as you made the kins of Kuru kill one another. &nbsp;May\nthe Yadavas perish \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly the gravity of\nher words dawned on her . &nbsp;She has indeed been true to her devotion to Vishnu\nand to her blindfold . Her curse would take effect .&nbsp; Her anger vapourised and she fell at\nKrishna\u2019s feet for forgiveness .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna smiled and\ngently lifted her up. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He whispered \u201c Oh mother , your curse will take effect,\nnot only because of your true devotion towards me and your husband, but also\ndue to the ever changing sands of time. &nbsp;In the mean time, let\u2019s attend to the\ntending of the dead and sending them away on their journey to the heavens.\u201d\nLord Krishna walked past the stunned Pandavas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the war was over\nKrishna was himself contemplating the end of the snooty Yadav race. They were\nvery powerful under the protection of lord Krishna so no external force could\ndefeat them.&nbsp; If the Yadavas were\nunharnessed , they will become a burden to the planet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna realized the\ngravity of the situation and the importance of bringing the destruction of his\nown beloved race.&nbsp; Gandhari\u2019s curse came\nat the right time as if on divine cue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Days flew by after the\ncoronation of Yudhishtra as the king of Hasthinapur. Krishna went back to\nDwaraka to rule over the prosperous kingdom.&nbsp;\nSlowly but steadily the the curse of Gandhari bore fruit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pompous Yadavas\nshed their conduct, morals, scruples and humility.&nbsp; One incident sealed their fate. Some great\nsages were on pilgrimage and they stopped by at Dwarka to meet Krishna and\nBalarama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yadavas, which\nincluded Bhodakas, Vrishnis, Kekeyas and Andakas, were now &nbsp;at the peak of wanton\nuncouth behavior. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bunch of Yadava boys decided to tease the learned sages. &nbsp;They\ndressed Samba, the handsome son of Krishna&nbsp;\nas a woman and tied pillows on his stomach to make the woman look\npregnant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They approached the\nsages and asked them to predict whether the 'lady' would give birth to a boy or\na girl.&nbsp; The dismayed sages saw through\nthis charade and were shocked at this lack pf respect.&nbsp; In anger, on of the sages cursed them saying\nthat the disguised boy will give birth to a lump of iron which will destroy the\nentire Yadava race.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-q5nkhK1JXr0/VD1KHld5r9I/AAAAAAAAxCU/Ya-AkXoDypU/s1600/bgv%2B-5dd2.1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-q5nkhK1JXr0/VD1KHld5r9I/AAAAAAAAxCU/Ya-AkXoDypU/s1600/bgv%2B-5dd2.1.jpg\" width=\"306\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yadavas, again\nshowed extreme disrespect and responded with sarcasm, instead of an apology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a pall of\nfear and impending doom the next day when Krishna\u2019s son Sambha developed labour\npains and soon delivered an iron mace . They immediately rushed with the mace\nto Akroora and Ugrasena and in the presence of Krishna himself; they narrated the\nweird tide of events. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Krishna knew the events which would transpire\nin future , and kept quiet. Seeing Krishna silent , Akroora cried \u201cGrind the\nmace to a fine powder and cast it into the ocean.\u201d The Yadavas nodded and ran\nto comply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Akroora looked with\nintent at Krishna, his eyes full of questions.&nbsp;\nKrishna simply smiled back. \u201cUncle, the Kala Chakra is now in motion .\nSambha has played his part perfectly.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He left without another\nword, leaving both of them bewildered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhat did he mean by\nthat?\u201d asked Ugrasena. \u201cI can tell you that, father.\u201d Ugrasena turned around to\nthe source of voice - Rukmini. \u201cThirty six year ago, Krishna prayed to Shiva\nfor a son like him\u2014a god of destruction -does that mean anything?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The time for chaste Gandari\u2019s\ncurse to take effect had arrived.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oR34sLOJKiU/VD1Lky2iZmI/AAAAAAAAxCg/GW_4NPPAEJg/s1600/imagesCAIPO1dM2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oR34sLOJKiU/VD1Lky2iZmI/AAAAAAAAxCg/GW_4NPPAEJg/s1600/imagesCAIPO1dM2.jpg\" width=\"313\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhari was terrified of\nthe dark as a small girl . &nbsp;When grand\nsire Bhishma brought the alliance of blind King Dhritarashtra , her brother\nShakuni who loved her a lot, was unable to stop it. &nbsp;&nbsp;Elders\nwere respected those days . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aHhcHOcCQlE/VD1LuAd7VuI/AAAAAAAAxCo/1nuFIep02RU/s1600/tumblr_lzgo0866Xe1rnms60yo1_1280.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aHhcHOcCQlE/VD1LuAd7VuI/AAAAAAAAxCo/1nuFIep02RU/s1600/tumblr_lzgo0866Xe1rnms60yo1_1280.jpg\" width=\"251\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhari\nblindfolded herself , though she would die a thousand deaths every moment of\nher life. &nbsp;Even when she was taken to her\ndead children on the Kurukshetra battle field&nbsp;\nafter the war, she still did NOT remove her blindfold for a last look. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Z7iXhUdbqo4/VD1J0DG2-II/AAAAAAAAxCM/Ii8FJdVD5RE/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Z7iXhUdbqo4/VD1J0DG2-II/AAAAAAAAxCM/Ii8FJdVD5RE/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Outside the palace, the\nYadavas had obeyed Akroora\u2019s command and they ground the iron mace into fine\npowder\u2014except for a stubborn triangular piece looking like an arrow head.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z22iG4JDC2M/VD3k7hYoecI/AAAAAAAAxFw/xexeA5f7MCE/s1600/1000px-Mace-dwpp7-dlc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z22iG4JDC2M/VD3k7hYoecI/AAAAAAAAxFw/xexeA5f7MCE/s1600/1000px-Mace-dwpp7-dlc.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nwas too hard to grind .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ghRysm2XtCI/VD3klQUVR4I/AAAAAAAAxFo/_DUw-Y_8K14/s1600/imdddages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ghRysm2XtCI/VD3klQUVR4I/AAAAAAAAxFo/_DUw-Y_8K14/s1600/imdddages.jpg\" width=\"282\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yadavas threw everything into the sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fear disappeared\nand they went back to their wanton and rowdy behavior . They started to drink\nheavily and were intoxicated throughout the day.&nbsp; Time rolled by. The triangular piece of the\nmace was swallowed by a fish.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fish was caught by a hunter, who upon finding\nthe piece in the fish\u2019s entrails immediately used it to craft a fine poisonous\narrow.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Fsk8LSN39E/VD3lWvItazI/AAAAAAAAxF4/qAZ3z2gCBNQ/s1600/imavvges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"182\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Fsk8LSN39E/VD3lWvItazI/AAAAAAAAxF4/qAZ3z2gCBNQ/s1600/imavvges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fine powder, on the\nother hand, washed back ashore and deposited itself by the beautiful coast of\nDwaraka. A certain sharp serrated grass grew in lush abundance in the area\nwhere the powder was deposited.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything was set and\nin place for the final showdown.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KjOtnOvvB9s/VD1VblCdI0I/AAAAAAAAxDk/ROhzo7np9bw/s1600/Panddchajanya.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KjOtnOvvB9s/VD1VblCdI0I/AAAAAAAAxDk/ROhzo7np9bw/s1600/Panddchajanya.jpg\" width=\"211\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 36 years of\nMahabharat war, evil omen started to appear in the Dwaraka city. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ifIiTsgtXmM/VD1VGvjtjCI/AAAAAAAAxDc/A_BMSj_i3UI/s1600/hqdefaucclt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ifIiTsgtXmM/VD1VGvjtjCI/AAAAAAAAxDc/A_BMSj_i3UI/s1600/hqdefaucclt.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sudarshana\nchakra, Panchajanya shankh, the chariot of lord Krishna and the plough weapon\nof Balarama just disappeared from the face of the earth.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tu0v-XlOJ3c/VD1VChSsXjI/AAAAAAAAxDU/-LnOa2oB_nk/s1600/piddc66.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tu0v-XlOJ3c/VD1VChSsXjI/AAAAAAAAxDU/-LnOa2oB_nk/s1600/piddc66.jpg\" width=\"272\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day, the Yadavas gathered on the beach. The liquor that they drank\nmade them lose their senses completely. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They started teasing\none another, bringing up the gory pasts and gruesome mistakes of each\nother.&nbsp; Satyaki and Krithavarma acted as\nthe starting points of the doom of Dwaraka.&nbsp;\nSatyaki had fought on Pandava\u2019s side in the battle of Kurukshetra and\nKrithavarma, on the Kaurava side.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They taunted one another, bringing back\nmemories of the horrific war where the Pandavas cheated against the rules of\nwar , aided and abetted by Krishna.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Old Bhurishravas, was\none of the 11 commanders of the Kaurava army. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When Bhurishravas was\nabout to behead Satyaki, in FAIR one on one battle, Arjuna from behind severed\nBhurishravas' arm with an arrowin a FOUL manner against the rules of war. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bhurishravas totally\nshocked by the foul deed ,from a great warrior like Arjuna , laid down his\nweapons, and sat in the lotus posture to meditate in the thick of Mahabharata\nbattle , 6000 year ago.. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Satyaki was equal to\nArjuna in fighting merit and was also a surgeon.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He had fainted in fright ,\nemerged from his swoon and swiftly decapitated his old Bhurishravas from behind\n--against all DHARMA .</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a fit of rage,\nSatyaki, jumped on Krithaverma and cut his head off. &nbsp;The friends of Krithavarma\npounced on Satyaki and a great mass brawl followed.&nbsp; Pradyumna, the son of Krishna, innocent\nthough he was, found himself in the thick of the fight and was killed.&nbsp; As they have come to the sea shore for a pleasure,\nthey did not carry any weapons along with them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They saw the long grown\nsharp serrated grass in abundance along the sea shore. They picked up the grass\nstems and beat and killed each other. The whole area was soaked in red blood.\nThose grass stems are nothing but blades made of the powder of the same lump of\nIron born to Samba.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The curse of saints had borne fruit. Each blade of grass\nbecame a mace, smashing into the Yadavas, killing them instantly. Except\nKrishna, all Yadavas were killed. Krishna\u2019s charioteer Daruka and another one\ncalled Babhru only survived.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-erXYdWOUmYc/VD1JjH5ok5I/AAAAAAAAxCE/yOlbSM6vqpY/s1600/downlaoddad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-erXYdWOUmYc/VD1JjH5ok5I/AAAAAAAAxCE/yOlbSM6vqpY/s1600/downlaoddad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They both approached\nSri Krishna and said: \u201cO Krishna! All Yadavas were killed. Whereabouts of\nBalarama are not known. It is better to search for him.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balarama was in deep\nmeditation under a tree. Seeing this, Krishna told Daruka, \u201c\u201cO Daruka! you\nimmediately go to Hastinapura and inform Dharmaja about the mass massacre of\nYadavas and bring Arjuna here. He will look after everything.\u201d said Krishna.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accordingly, Daruka rushed towards Hastinapura in a chariot. Krishna went to\nthe place where Balarama was sitting and said \u201cO brother Balarama! I will sit\nin meditation along with you.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z74oYsc4ULY/VD1SWVOLhPI/AAAAAAAAxDA/b-NCdmrssE8/s1600/Krishna%2C%2Bthe%2BKiddng%2Bwith%2BBalrama.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z74oYsc4ULY/VD1SWVOLhPI/AAAAAAAAxDA/b-NCdmrssE8/s1600/Krishna%2C%2Bthe%2BKiddng%2Bwith%2BBalrama.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But there was no reply\nfrom Balarama. A long spiral smoke type serpent came out of the face of\nBalarama. Balarama had just left this mortal body.&nbsp; His soul travelled into the sky through the\nsea. As Balarama was the incarnation of Adi Sesha, Naga community welcomed back\nBalarama.&nbsp; Balarama attained moksha\nand&nbsp; joined Vishnu at Vaikuntam .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gyFGZPxxeO8/VD1JWlObdII/AAAAAAAAxB8/j5Hic1EvZ-w/s1600/eess.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gyFGZPxxeO8/VD1JWlObdII/AAAAAAAAxB8/j5Hic1EvZ-w/s1600/eess.jpg\" width=\"234\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna knew that the\ntime for him to shed his earthly avatar had come. Krishna knew the only way for\nsomeone to kill him was by wounding his foot.&nbsp;\nHe remembered the curse of Maharishi Durvasa, which left his foot\nvulnerable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna laid down under a\ntree and went into Yoga Samadhi.&nbsp; At that\ntime a hunter Jara entered that forest. That hunter misunderstood the moving\nfoot of Krishna as a lurking deer and shot a lethal arrow that pierced into\nKrishna\u2019s feet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the hunter\nreached Krishna, he realised his mistake and pleaded the lord for forgiveness.\nLord Krishna consoles him and tells him how his death was inevitable and things\nare going as per divine plan .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna says that in his previous birth as Lord\nRama , Rama killed Vali (Sugreeva's brother) from behind. So,\nKrishna has now reaped the price for the same through Jara who was king Vali\nin his previous birth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such was the Dharma\nthatt, even for the Ruler of the Universe, the laws of Karma remain the same.\nHence, lord Krishna left the mortal world.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The time from which lord Krishna died is considered to be worst time of Kaliyuga. &nbsp; Daruka, sent by Sri Krishna, met Pandavas and informed them about\nthe tragic deaths.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On hearing this,\nPandavas plunged into great grief. After taking suitable instructions from\nDharmaja, Arjuna reached Dwarka.&nbsp; Dwarka was\ndestined to be flooded&nbsp; within seven days\nof Krishna\u2019s death; hence, Arjuna decided to &nbsp;take the survivors to\nIndraprastha.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna's father left for\nheavenly abode while being in deep meditation. Arjuna performed the last rites\nfor Krishna and his kinsman. All the ladies and children started moving towards\nIndraprastha along with Arjuna. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1r9mQhThoHk/VD1JAppysgI/AAAAAAAAxB0/waAw74Cg-4M/s1600/Dwarka-Goldsen-Cittyty-Krishna-Balrama.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1r9mQhThoHk/VD1JAppysgI/AAAAAAAAxB0/waAw74Cg-4M/s1600/Dwarka-Goldsen-Cittyty-Krishna-Balrama.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the people walked\naway from the Dwaraka city, and they looked back for the last time, the city\nsank into the sea. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zKL-44HHboM/VD1I42D_fgI/AAAAAAAAxBs/fCYhofLz7t0/s1600/downddelosad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"182\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zKL-44HHboM/VD1I42D_fgI/AAAAAAAAxBs/fCYhofLz7t0/s1600/downddelosad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the way, some\nthieves of saw that only one man with a bow accompanied the ladies. They tried\nto rob them. Arjuna who was once a very great archer, found it very difficult\nto even lift his bow. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he tried to\ninvoke his Divya astras, he forgot all those mental passwords to arm his\narrows..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/M1sE-29iXNA/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/M1sE-29iXNA&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/M1sE-29iXNA&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thieves killed many people and kidnapped some beautiful women.\nSome of the ladies including the wives of Krishna and Balarama self\nimmolated.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was NOT Sati.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WRCjb-Qkkeg/VD1S53c4YDI/AAAAAAAAxDI/Oyowsa7d7Ao/s1600/154717_28333gg2528425146_920007889_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"396\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WRCjb-Qkkeg/VD1S53c4YDI/AAAAAAAAxDI/Oyowsa7d7Ao/s1600/154717_28333gg2528425146_920007889_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arjuna unable to even\nprotect the women arrived at Hastinapur in a most dejected condition, not\nwishing to live anymore. &nbsp;The Pandavas\nvisited sage VedaVyasa and narrated the Yadavas destruction, &nbsp; Krishna's death\nand Arjuna\u2019s inability to save the Yadava women. The sage consoled the Pandavas\nand told them that their purpose on the earth is served. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pandavas coroneted\nParikshit and embarked on their final journey towards the Himalayas with\nDraupdai . A dog followed them . &nbsp;Krishna\nparticipated in the Kurukshethra battle only after Arjuna and Duryodana themselves\nvoluntarily came to seek his help in Dwaraka. Matters so transpired that he\ngave his mighty Narayani sena to Duryodana and became a charioteer to Arjuna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Mahabharat war\nof 4000 BC,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the finest flower of\nchivalry and heroism perished in the flames of war in a matter of eighteen\ndays.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pandavas were guilty of over\ndrive, of course aided by Lord Krishna. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nhad no honour left and were having nightmares during sleep.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Lord Krishna himself who advised them\nto seek the blessing of Lord Shiva.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p-OAxzeBA8Q/VD1Iv3Q0DeI/AAAAAAAAxBk/u7uvZM7GeUk/s1600/download.jpgskjguv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-p-OAxzeBA8Q/VD1Iv3Q0DeI/AAAAAAAAxBk/u7uvZM7GeUk/s1600/download.jpgskjguv.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above:&nbsp; Arjuna can be seen restraining Krishna from\nattacking grand sire Bheeshma against the rules of the war.&nbsp; Bheeshma was killed by Arjuna by firing his\narrows over the shoulders of Shikandi .&nbsp;\nBheeshma did NOT protect himself as he recognised Shikandi as Amba in\nre-birth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amba had jumped into\nthe fire as Bheeshma refused to marry her ( in her previous life ),</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">when insisted by Lord Parashurama.. This\nevent is marked by the Sabarimala pilgrimage \u2013 this planet\u2019s biggest pilgrimage\n, 55 million pilgrims in 2014.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sCGAG8mQ5Zw/VD1IpE-dNwI/AAAAAAAAxBc/0fT8BViNOzg/s1600/downlvvoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sCGAG8mQ5Zw/VD1IpE-dNwI/AAAAAAAAxBc/0fT8BViNOzg/s1600/downlvvoad.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon the onset of the\nKali yuga and the departure of Lord Krishna, Yudhisthira and his four brothers\nretired, leaving the throne to their only descendant to survive the war of\nKurukshetra, Arjuna's grandson Parikshit.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: King Parikshit\nputting a poisonous snake on Shamika rishi while in deep meditation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jHJ82CyyLcg/VD1HjkpIEPI/AAAAAAAAxAs/_FbALXGFIYw/s1600/parikshsjpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jHJ82CyyLcg/VD1HjkpIEPI/AAAAAAAAxAs/_FbALXGFIYw/s1600/parikshsjpg.jpg\" width=\"312\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Parikshit who was\nkilled by snake bite , was father of Emperor Jayameyjayan who built Kedarnath\nTemple in a grand manner .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3-E0aNSQ300/VD1HsA9sjYI/AAAAAAAAxA0/WwnH1SnwBSM/s1600/kedarnath-nfcemple.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3-E0aNSQ300/VD1HsA9sjYI/AAAAAAAAxA0/WwnH1SnwBSM/s1600/kedarnath-nfcemple.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving up all their belongings and ties, the\nPandavas and Draupadi , accompanied by a dog, made their final journey of\npilgrimage to the Himalayas in search of Lord Shiva .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-by82be6KQ-c/VD1Hy9H5E4I/AAAAAAAAxA8/7sTP1OjPT6M/s1600/dowrehnlosad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-by82be6KQ-c/VD1Hy9H5E4I/AAAAAAAAxA8/7sTP1OjPT6M/s1600/dowrehnlosad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile at Kedarnath\na very healthy and good looking bull joined them.&nbsp; Shiva has taken the form of the bull, as he\nwas NOT happy with the Pandavas for their deceit during the war, and hence\nloathe to give them darshan.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pandavas sort of\nhad the gut feeling that the bull was Shiva in disguise.&nbsp; Bhima as usual jumped the gun and tried to\ncatch the bull by its tail.&nbsp; Lord Shiva\njust disappeared into the ground, leaving the hump above the ground as a Lingam,&nbsp; and a blazing fiery column of light sprouted.\nThis is why only the Kedarnath Shiva Lingam is a sort of a&nbsp; hump.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ihFGiifY0zk/VD1IBvJjXdI/AAAAAAAAxBE/fK4O4YPgHW8/s1600/Kedarvnath.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ihFGiifY0zk/VD1IBvJjXdI/AAAAAAAAxBE/fK4O4YPgHW8/s1600/Kedarvnath.jpg\" width=\"189\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression:&nbsp; While climbing the peaks, Draupadi and four\nof the Pandavas fell to their deaths, dragged down by the weight of their guilt\nfor their enormous sins.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aQm-y2ZaCQA/VD1IH7eUJvI/AAAAAAAAxBM/826oyKOkLu4/s1600/heavessn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aQm-y2ZaCQA/VD1IH7eUJvI/AAAAAAAAxBM/826oyKOkLu4/s1600/heavessn.jpg\" width=\"161\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yudhisthira was the\nonly one to reach the mountain peak, because he was unblemished by sin or\nuntruth. The fact remains that he did deceive to kill his Guru Dronacharya, by\nusing a loophole . He said Ashwatthama is dead alluding to an elephant , which\nwas also the name of Dronacharya\u2019s son.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dronacharya\ngot down from his chariot in grief , sat down in meditative pose and he was\nbeheaded from behind.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BhcHj8ZXDTc/VD1IQHgMhjI/AAAAAAAAxBU/dUHHc1RtLsQ/s1600/trssjytj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BhcHj8ZXDTc/VD1IQHgMhjI/AAAAAAAAxBU/dUHHc1RtLsQ/s1600/trssjytj.jpg\" width=\"215\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On reaching the top, Lord\nIndra asked Yuddhistra to abandon the dog before entering the Heaven, at Chorabari&nbsp; Sarovar. &nbsp;&nbsp;But Yudhisthira refused to do so, citing the\ndog's unflinching loyalty as a reason.&nbsp;\nOnce again it turned out that the dog was his father, Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satyaki's grandson was\none of stalwarts of the Indus valley civilization -- by which time river\nSaraswati had become non-perennial.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2fAxw9FXfPQ/VD1YDfiQ-UI/AAAAAAAAxDw/b6SWgE3-QC4/s1600/saraswati-river-cocxsurse.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2fAxw9FXfPQ/VD1YDfiQ-UI/AAAAAAAAxDw/b6SWgE3-QC4/s1600/saraswati-river-cocxsurse.jpg\" width=\"416\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Vali was a friend\nof King Ravana of his neighboringkingdom. If you read the Mahabharata and the\nRamayana without pre-conceived notions you will find that the WINNER wrote\nhistory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Ravana was Lord\nVishnu\u2019s MOST DEAREST DEVOTEE and Lord Vishnu loved him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ravana was NOT a bad\nman. King Ravana was a great devotee of Lord Shiva and Lord Shiva too loved\nhim. Whatever happened was pre-ordained . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Ravana was JAYA of\nthe Jaya/ Vijaya duo ,&nbsp; the gatekeepers\nof Vaikuntam , who were cursed by the four Sanatkumaras in being refused entry while Vishnu was sleeping ...</span> &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TyONGrNxpcg/VD28H4IO_oI/AAAAAAAAxEg/kZ2CZ1Xhilc/s1600/02yyy0%2B(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TyONGrNxpcg/VD28H4IO_oI/AAAAAAAAxEg/kZ2CZ1Xhilc/s1600/02yyy0%2B(1).jpg\" width=\"306\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva as Dakshinamurthy , the\nfirst Guru who had NO Guru - attuned the 4 Kumaras via silence in Turiya state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OkBuNHoKCR0/VD28YQ2ILJI/AAAAAAAAxEo/ROVHZAINMdE/s1600/Dakshinamffurthy1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OkBuNHoKCR0/VD28YQ2ILJI/AAAAAAAAxEo/ROVHZAINMdE/s1600/Dakshinamffurthy1.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu took many\navatars on earth to kill his favourite two gate keepers at Vaikunta Jaya and\nVijaya , who were cursed by the four Kumaras for arrogance.&nbsp; Lord Vishnu had to kill them so that they\ncould come back to him as soon as spooible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">----&nbsp; Third avatar as Varaha (the boar) to\nkill&nbsp; Hiranyaksha ( Jaya ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1F3wZvpa10k/VD271mCILbI/AAAAAAAAxEI/qwpBGa-6d-Q/s1600/imagestyjpgb%2C%2B%2Cnk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1F3wZvpa10k/VD271mCILbI/AAAAAAAAxEI/qwpBGa-6d-Q/s1600/imagestyjpgb%2C%2B%2Cnk.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-----&nbsp; Fourth avatar&nbsp;\nNarasimha (the human-lion) to kill Hiranyakashipu ( Vijaya )\u2014the great\ngrandfather of Kerala asura King Mahabali.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">----&nbsp; Seventh avatar Lord Rama to kill Ravana (\nJaya ) and his brother Kumbhakarna ( Vijaya ). Rama also killed Kerala King Vali.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IshTiJaB7hQ/VD27xa3G45I/AAAAAAAAxEA/N5vj8WhPkys/s1600/anime_digi_paint__lord_ravgma_vs_demon_king_ravana_by_nairarun15-d5uvgei.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IshTiJaB7hQ/VD27xa3G45I/AAAAAAAAxEA/N5vj8WhPkys/s1600/anime_digi_paint__lord_ravgma_vs_demon_king_ravana_by_nairarun15-d5uvgei.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---- Eighth avatar Lord Krishna also to kill Banasura the powerful emperor and son of King Mahabali of Kerala.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ravana did NOT have ten heads-- it was ten heads worth of knowledge . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The killing of Vali is THE\nmost contested episode in the whole of Hindu literature, leave alone Ramayana\nliterature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immoral white\nhistorian and his fake mutts painted virtuous Queen Tara as a wh0re. Tara was\nmore beautiful and more virtuous that all the Hindu myth heroines like Sita,\nAhalya, Mandodari, Kunti etc.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her beauty\nwas so dazzling that some scriptures said that she was churned out of Samudra\nManthan as a celestial apsara. &nbsp;On top of\nthis she was a most intelligent and&nbsp;\nlevel headed statesperson , fit to be a revered Queen .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-re1WQALXgqQ/VEBgdS8bLPI/AAAAAAAAxG8/aeSX77ImODI/s1600/12gg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-re1WQALXgqQ/VEBgdS8bLPI/AAAAAAAAxG8/aeSX77ImODI/s1600/12gg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\ninjected&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">poison</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;that when Vali was stuck in a cave and when Sugriva took over\nthe&nbsp;Kingdom of Kishkinda , &nbsp;Tara shared Sugriva\u2019s bed in addition to his own\nwife Ruma\u2014a gruesome threesome sexual orgy.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">There were thousands of discussion as how in\nHindusim it is permitted for the widow of a brother to have sexual intercourse\nwith her dead husband\u2019s brother. <o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--N2jsyB78P8/VEBfimJz6II/AAAAAAAAxGk/9MsNpe0rS-Y/s1600/imageLIKHs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"328\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--N2jsyB78P8/VEBfimJz6II/AAAAAAAAxGk/9MsNpe0rS-Y/s1600/imageLIKHs.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They gave bull, that\nafter Vali died and Lakshmana went to meet King Sugriva after the monsoons to prepare\nto invade Lanka, no amount of knocking or banging on the bed room door , could make Sugriva\nopen the door.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a long wait a inebriated Queen Tara opened the door in an semi nude dishevelled state with Sugriva lying drunk and naked on the bed, &nbsp;which made Lakshman very angry.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OfoPBT2N0IM/VEBfsyLNwbI/AAAAAAAAxGs/jo3lNog2kkA/s1600/imaui57ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OfoPBT2N0IM/VEBfsyLNwbI/AAAAAAAAxGs/jo3lNog2kkA/s1600/imaui57ges.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR Ambedkar , Mahatma\nPhule and EVR Periyar ridiculed the heroes and heroines of Hinduism.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-RdgsaO1gMnE/VEBhmaid8NI/AAAAAAAAxHM/FQkeVDkanyI/s1600/imagddes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVR Periyar asked\nseveral times verbally and in writing- : Why do Hindus hold up a murderer like\nRam who killed Vali from behind while hiding behind a tress as a role model\nMARYADA PURUSHOTTAM ?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">He smirked at\nstupid Hindus for considering a wh0re like Tara as a role model for chastity.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost every white\nskinned INDOPHILE is ignorant of Hinduism and most of them are wolves in sheep\u2019s\nclothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is just\ntoo great for their small petty minds ( example Wendy Doniger who is the dirt\nunder my finger nail ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do we do Namaste?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-atC1HjAsf50/VECT3SVHsBI/AAAAAAAAxH8/rj260wJXAz8/s1600/imasssges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By doing that we\nrespect that small ball of energy in that person, the energy which was born\nbillions of years ago along with the stars.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A dead human cadaver has NO aura.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1WN7f8FKJDk/VECSNhf27NI/AAAAAAAAxHw/FqLYl6AoBhc/s1600/imccages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
