font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Energy can never be\ndestroyed-it can only be transformed . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Energy has a potential,\nit flows from higher potential to lower potential. These are profound\ntruths&nbsp; which have been ORDAINED by\nbrahmAn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was well understood\nin Hinduism, thousands of years before the Vedas were penned down in 5000 BC . &nbsp;&nbsp;Most of\nthe allegories in Sanatana Dharma deals with energy and cosmic forces . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earthy avatars of\nVishnu were REAL- like Rama, Krishna, Parashurama etc.&nbsp; &nbsp;They\nhave been woven into timeless myths in a most clever manner by great minds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Lord Rama shot an\narrow from behind, just as Vali was about to smash Sugriva\u2019s head on to a rock --with Sugriva crying out to Rama, -- SAVE ME !. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Vali\u2019s wife\ncradled her dying husband\u2019s head in her lap and cried-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n||&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cOh, brave one, kill me\ntoo with the same arrow with which you have killed my dear husband, and on\ngetting killed at your hand I wish to reach his near, as my husband Vali takes\nno delight without me\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Thus that way when Tara\nspoke to that lord and great-souled Rama, &nbsp;Rama consoling Tara well, spoke this\nword of expediency, \u201cOh, wife of valiant one, let not your mind go raving, the\nCreator decreed and pre-ordained the cosmos to be in this way, isn\u2019t so!\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND THEN LORD RAMA\nSHOWED HIS VISHWARUPAM TO THE DYING VALI , GIVING HIM INSTANT MOKSHA .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A God like Rama could\nkill Vali anytime,&nbsp; despite the boon he\nhad that anybody who fights with him in single combat will lose half his power\nwhich will be transferred to Vali. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in Sanatana Dharma\nthey are careful NOT to upset and boons and curses made by gods, demi-gods or\neven maharishis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God Vishnu as Narasimha\navatar could have killed Hinaryakashipu anytime \u2013 Gods hold the VETO power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Vishnu was careful\nNOT to upset the boon granted by Brahma.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Hiranyakashipu could not be killed\nby human, deva or animal. This is why the form of Narasimha was chosen as an\navatar .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narasimha is neither one of these, as he is a form of Vishnu incarnate\nas a part-human, part-animal. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Dalit , Kancha Ilaiyah types will cry-- Hindu gods like to kill --SQUEAK - Well Kancha baby, &nbsp;Hinduism was NOT created for you -- lay off !</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">He comes\nupon Hiranyakashipu at twilight (when it is neither day nor night) on the\nthreshold of a courtyard (neither indoors nor out), and puts the demon on his\nlap (neither earth nor space). Using his nails (neither animate nor inanimate)\nas weapons, he disembowels and kills the demon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/sxZsOXsePHo/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/sxZsOXsePHo&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/sxZsOXsePHo&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I do NOT want CHOOTS (\nmein prasad nahin khaaunga-- ghar lekhe jaungaa &nbsp;types ) arguing why the lap is NOT earth or space .&nbsp;Their petty minds wont understand .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma\neverything that happens due to the will of MEDIATOR Lord Vishnu.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If Rama would not kill Vali then Vali could\nnot kill him in his next avatar as Krishna ( next incarnation.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Tara curses Rama by the\npower of her chastity ,&nbsp; this proves her\nto be a chaste woman. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the meaning of\nPERCEPTION \u2013 which the immoral white invader, the FAKE &nbsp;shankaracharyas, &nbsp;the wolves in sheeps clothing Indophiles &nbsp;etc do NOT have . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See in one sentence I have caught all of these PRETENDERS with\ntheir pants and dhotis down ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The poison injection\nparty tried to portray King Vali as a evil rapist. That he drove away his\nbrother Surgriva and usurped his wife Ruma. That Vali kicked out his wife Tara\nfrom his bed and ravished an unwilling Ruma instead.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is NONSENSE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara was THE most\nbeautiful woman in Hindu mythology.&nbsp; It\nwas discussed in our scriptures that only Samudra Manthan could have churned up\na wonder woman celestial nymph Apsara type woman like her\u2014surpassing even\nRavana\u2019s wife Mandodari in sheer beauty .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surgriva usurped King\nVali\u2019s throne by deceit.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He told everybody that\nhis elder brother King Vali was dead. As soon as Sugriva heard that Vali is\nalive and on his way back to his palace and throne ( he heard a loud cheers &nbsp;) he ran for his life .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was NOT the time\nto be weighed down by his wife Ruma. &nbsp;He\nran away to a place Rishyamukha where King Vali could never go, due to a curse . &nbsp;And King Vali knew that too. He did NOT send anybody to capture Sugriva .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Vali was previously\ncursed by Sage Matanga and hence cannot lay a foot on this piece of land. Doing\nso would cause his death.&nbsp; &nbsp;Once when Vali defeated a powerful demon\nDundhubhi, he picked him by his feet and whirled him around like a hammer\nthrow, and the demon fell in the ashram of Rishi Matanga 6 kilometers away.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Matanga was furious to\nbe disturbed inhis meditation.&nbsp; He &nbsp;pronounced the following curse: \u201cIf whoever\nhas sone this comes within six kilometers of my ashram, he will instantly die. &nbsp;If his friends or supporters &nbsp;come here, they will remain as stone statues\nfor thousands of years.\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So as soon a Sugriva\nheard the cheers of the people welcoming Vali to the palace he ran to Rishyamukha.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Vali did NOT rape\nRuma \u2013 nor did he drive away his good wife Tara from his bed. &nbsp;Vali treated Ruma like a queen giving her all\ncomforts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a powerful\nRakshasa Mayavi was troubling his citizens . King Vali being a virtous king\nwent alone to fight with this demon&nbsp; . His\nbrother Sugriva tagged along, and Vali never suspected foul play. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the demon saw Vali coming, he knew\nthat his time was up. As Vali held the boon that he would usurp half the demon\u2019s\npower . Victory was certain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The demon ran into a dark cave to hide and &nbsp;Vali went in . While the fight was going on,\nSugriva causes and avalanche of huge boulders which blocked the cave mouth. &nbsp;And then\nhe ran back to the palace and told all that Vali was killed by the demon and\nbefore he died he shouted that Sugriva must be made king.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people of Kishkindha crowned Sugriva as\ntheir new king as per their beloved King Vali\u2019s wishes-- despite the fact that Vali's and Tara's son was ready to be king.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But King Vali was very\nstrong and resilient.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He took a long time , and was weakened by lack of food\nand water, yet he came out of the dark cave.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then went to his palace , NOT\nimagining in his wildest dreams that his brother Sugriva had usurped his\nthrone.&nbsp; If Sugriva was alive, he would\nhave helped him, right ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali was worried about his missing\nbrother Sugriva. &nbsp;When Vali head from his\nwife Tara about this extreme deceit , he was most upset, that his own brother\nwould do such a slimy thing to usurp the throne.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But being a pious King he\nlet things be .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara never ill treated Sugriva's wife Ruma. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must know that the\nsame thing happened to king &nbsp;Ravana too. &nbsp;His brother Vibhishana deceived him, so that\nhe could become king.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e4zb7N1qYp4/VECvqIcCX7I/AAAAAAAAxIw/xKsg41MKMfQ/s1600/stonssebridge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e4zb7N1qYp4/VECvqIcCX7I/AAAAAAAAxIw/xKsg41MKMfQ/s1600/stonssebridge.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ravana and Vali being\nkings of neighbouring Kingdoms were friends and allies. Together NO force on\nearth could defeat them .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali was even more powerful than Ravana in combat and\nthere are stories how once Vali defeated Ravana in a fair fight and tossed him around like a small fruit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O8TGt_iV9rE/VECvAga3gwI/AAAAAAAAxIo/fz-8UywlW2c/s1600/66209ff11_f520.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-O8TGt_iV9rE/VECvAga3gwI/AAAAAAAAxIo/fz-8UywlW2c/s1600/66209ff11_f520.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva met Rama and\nLakshmana while in hiding. He gave cock and bull stories how bad brother Vali ,\nsnatched away his throne and his wife.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva offered his army to fight Ravana , if he is re-instated on his throne to fight\nRavana. &nbsp;Rama knew that Ravana and Vali were friends and allies. &nbsp;And he wanted\nthe army of Sugriva to build a bridge to Lanka. &nbsp;Hanuman told Rama to support Sugriva .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UE5BrjhIo-E/VECunC8u3NI/AAAAAAAAxIg/iKs2JYsHRU8/s1600/Sethu-93dd%2Bkm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"369\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UE5BrjhIo-E/VECunC8u3NI/AAAAAAAAxIg/iKs2JYsHRU8/s1600/Sethu-93dd%2Bkm.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali was an evolved\nbeing . He did sandhya-vandana in the morning at the eastern ocean and gave\narghya.&nbsp; Similarly in the evening he\nwould go to Western ocean and give arghya.&nbsp;\nThis is a sure indication that his palace was at the southern tip of the\nWestern Ghats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva was mortally afraid\nof his elder brother Vali . He was &nbsp;full\nof doubts that Rama could kill him. He tells him many incredible stories of\nVali's power. &nbsp;&nbsp;As proof, he shows Rama a hole in a saal tree\nwhich Vali had made in one shot. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just to mollify him\nRama makes a through a through hole through seven &nbsp;saal trees in a row with one single arrow. &nbsp;After going through the trees, the arrow made\na strike on a huge rock and splintered it.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;The arrow then returned back to\nRama\u2019s quiver . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bkj5wDWVzkI/VEDdp_300VI/AAAAAAAAxJM/2_4QfDJd4C0/s1600/iG%2BYUFages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"258\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bkj5wDWVzkI/VEDdp_300VI/AAAAAAAAxJM/2_4QfDJd4C0/s1600/iG%2BYUFages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva was astonished\nand cried, \"O Rama, you are great.\" &nbsp;Sugriva greased up Rama \u201cI have gained your\nfriendship and I have no more use for fear or grief. &nbsp;Slay Vali and save me. &nbsp;Let us go to Kishkindha today.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rama asks Sugriva to\nchallenge Vali and bring him outside Kishkindha. &nbsp;As Rama explains later, for 14 years he cannot\nenter a city. &nbsp;Moreover, Rama does not\nwant any unnecessary bloodbath of Vali's army which would soon pass on to\nSugriva .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Together, Sugriva and\nRama went to seek out Vali.&nbsp; While Rama\nstood back, Sugriva shouted a challenge, and dared him to battle.&nbsp;&nbsp; The brothers rushed at each other, fighting furiously\n. Vali was stronger and was toying around.&nbsp;\nRama could NOT make out who is who , to get a clear shot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva's counsellor\nHanuman stepped forward and placed a garland of Gajapushpi &nbsp;flowers around Sugriva's neck. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali knew that this was a sign of deceit as\nhis wife Tara had warned him that Sugriva does not have the balls to challenge\nhim to a one on one fight. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D5q4zzM4oFM/VEDdTBMM9iI/AAAAAAAAxI8/KFD-y2Sc5I4/s1600/downlEYEoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D5q4zzM4oFM/VEDdTBMM9iI/AAAAAAAAxI8/KFD-y2Sc5I4/s1600/downlEYEoad.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali\nhas assured her that Sugriva was his own blood brother and he would only crush\nhis ego, as punishment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali now picked up\nSugriva by his feet to smash his head</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">on\na rock . Sugriva cried out in terror and Rama swiftly dispatched an arrow\nthrough Vali\u2019s chest from behind., with the arrow head sticking out from front.\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali lay mortally wounded but NOT dead. &nbsp;Tara came running and cradled Vali's head in her lap .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TtKXJi9BEKE/VEDdeAbGa1I/AAAAAAAAxJE/gfzzL8N9xBY/s1600/ijtmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TtKXJi9BEKE/VEDdeAbGa1I/AAAAAAAAxJE/gfzzL8N9xBY/s1600/ijtmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cRama!\u201d&nbsp; Vali gasped . \u201cHow could you do this? &nbsp;The gods had judged rightly in this matter,\ndeclaring me the victor\u2014but you have now interfered with justice. &nbsp;&nbsp;Who\nwill now wear the badge of Maryada Purush&nbsp;\nin this world, when you have thrown it away so lightly?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhen I am not your enemy,\nwhy do you have to kill me. &nbsp;I would have\nhelped you to retrieve Sita from Ravana , without a fight , &nbsp;if you had only asked me\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI was fighting with\nsome other person and was not careful enough when you shot me. &nbsp;In the end, O virtuous Rama, you have taken\nthe life of a person who had done you no wrong,\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rama realized that he\nwas fooled by Sugriva.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara cries \u201cwhat use is\nmy son, or kingdom, or my life to me when the great Vali my dear husband is\ndead\u201d &nbsp;\u201c O dear husband , this sharp arrow\nhead is hindering me from embracing you\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lamentations of\nTara and Sugriva, brought tears into the eyes of Rama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chaste Tara cursed Rama\nthat in his next birth, he will be killed by Vali.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara was reputed for\nher levelheaded behavior. Her regard is so great that her counsel to Vali\nsometimes have a commanding tone. \"a beautiful chaste woman of unusual\nintelligence, foresight , devotion and confidence\u201d &nbsp;is what the ancient scriptures say about Tara.\n. Her father was a Ayurvedic surgeon Sushena who gave her a virtuous upbringing\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rama consoled a\ndisconsolate Tara .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara had requested Rama\nto send her to her husband's place with the same arrow which killed him. Rama\nconsoled her and said, \"Wives of great heroes never sink into\ndespair.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LGh0VVB0Sc0/VEDonxCPBcI/AAAAAAAAxJ0/0YqlNLdafPE/s1600/imaMHBges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LGh0VVB0Sc0/VEDonxCPBcI/AAAAAAAAxJ0/0YqlNLdafPE/s1600/imaMHBges.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"You will get paramount\nappeasement as before, and your son will become the crown prince, God has\nordained destiny only in that way. Wives of the valiant ones will not mourn\nemotionally.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Rama said \u201cO Vali,\nif you still feel that I have wronged you than I can give you back your life\nright now.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Rama showed Vali\nhis vishwaroopam, Vali realized in an instant that Vishnu was moving in a\npre-ordained manner &nbsp;to liberate his\nbeloved Jaya , the doorkeeper of Vaikunta ( Ravana )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali &nbsp;cried \u201cMy dear Lord, I\u2019ll get many lives, but\na death like this when will I get again. To die in Your presence is the\ngreatest fortune and it is a perfection of life. I seek only that I can behold\nYour face and die in your presence.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali said that when\nsomeone has Rama\u2019s approval, he can rule any kingdom, and so Sugriva, who has\nRama\u2019s blessings, would &nbsp;make a good king\n\u2013better than his own son Angada.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iBby5EdHx8g/VEDoGY36UII/AAAAAAAAxJk/XqUKD1rB6KM/s1600/imdertages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iBby5EdHx8g/VEDoGY36UII/AAAAAAAAxJk/XqUKD1rB6KM/s1600/imdertages.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali, then removed his &nbsp;own necklace, which was given to him by Indra,\na source of his power, not to his own son, Angada, but to Sugriva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before giving that\nnecklace Vali told his son, 'don\u2019t bear any animosity against Sugriva or Rama\nbecause they have not killed me.&nbsp; It is\nmy own Karma that has caused my death.&nbsp;\nPlease serve Sugriva as you have served me and please serve Lord Rama as\nThe Supreme Lord.' &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vali requests Rama to take care that Tara is not insulted\nand advises Sugriva to unquestioningly follow her advice.&nbsp; Vali dies in the embraces of Tara, who mourns\nhis death in a painful manner.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugriva suddenly starts\n&nbsp;moaning at this sudden turn of events. &nbsp;He cried copius tears \u201c I am a sinner, I don\u2019t\ndeserve Kishkinda\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Extraordinary Tara continued \u201cThe\ngods have used Rama as their instrument to perform their judgement in this\nmatter. &nbsp;Long live Rama the Righteous\nOne!\u201d &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">have you ever killed an\nanimal and NOT eaten it\u2014say a rat \u2013better convert boy !</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(6) Kalasutram( Hot as\nhell)- for those who do not respect their elders ( boy\u2014if you have disrespected\nany elder , bettEr convert maan )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lDwHh6eeGgg/VEHQOrWtjYI/AAAAAAAAxLE/wkgpOVYv8Vs/s1600/dovvvwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lDwHh6eeGgg/VEHQOrWtjYI/AAAAAAAAxLE/wkgpOVYv8Vs/s1600/dovvvwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(7) Asitapatram(sharp\nflogging)- for people who abandon one\u2019s own duty. ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you wanna while at work\n, shirk better convert </span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(8)Sukaramukham(Crushed\nand tormented)- for rulers who neglect their duties <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WecGurcRDhQ/VEHQU8eNiKI/AAAAAAAAxLM/uUaOYkmHd-0/s1600/iee3mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WecGurcRDhQ/VEHQU8eNiKI/AAAAAAAAxLM/uUaOYkmHd-0/s1600/iee3mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(9) Andhakupam( Attack\nof the animals)- This is hell for those who do not help despite having the\nresources. ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you don\u2019t want to part with your penny better convert </span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(10) Taptamurti( Burnt\nAlive)- Those who plunder ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert if you wanna steal</span></i> )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(11) Krimibhojanam(Food\nfor worms)- for those who use men or women only for their own gain ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to\nconvert if you do NOT want to pay bonus and hike up the salary</span></i> ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jrLJU2JOEUs/VEHQgQtkTAI/AAAAAAAAxLU/tNcLV0DE_-c/s1600/imassges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jrLJU2JOEUs/VEHQgQtkTAI/AAAAAAAAxLU/tNcLV0DE_-c/s1600/imassges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(12) Salmali(Embracing\nred hot images)- for men and women who have committed adultery. (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> if you wanna\nhave sex outside marriage , better convert </span></i>)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(13)\nVajrakantakasali-(Embracing sharp images)- for those who want to fu#k animals (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\nbetter to convert and enjoy bestial sex -but first tie the camel&nbsp;</span></i>).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YlqbW2vBs2E/VEHQn6SJ7bI/AAAAAAAAxLc/Y-NzNKxacJw/s1600/imagvfrfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YlqbW2vBs2E/VEHQn6SJ7bI/AAAAAAAAxLc/Y-NzNKxacJw/s1600/imagvfrfes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(14) Vaitarani(River of\nFilth)- Rulers who abuse their power -- it is a river which is filled with human\nexcreta, blood, hair, bones, nails, flesh and all kinds of dirty substances. (\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert if you want to treat your employees badly</span></i> )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(15) Puyodakam (Well of\nhell)- This is a well filled with excreta, urine, blood, phlegm. For men who\nhave intercourse and cheat women with no intention of marrying (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> better to\nconvert and screw around merrily</span></i> )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A9YXYV9fuLc/VEHQwwEhVHI/AAAAAAAAxLk/CvSOo54c3sA/s1600/imccgages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-A9YXYV9fuLc/VEHQwwEhVHI/AAAAAAAAxLk/CvSOo54c3sA/s1600/imccgages.jpg\" width=\"262\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(16) Pranarodham (cut\npiece by piece)- for those who keep dogs and eat ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">better to convert and eat\nbeef and be merry </span></i>).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(17) Visasanam(Bashing\nfrom Clubs) for rich people who spend excessively just to display their wealth\nand splendour. ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">if you wanna enjoy your money better convert</span></i> )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cu9INuVRNKM/VEHQ5UTj9oI/AAAAAAAAxLs/ycwYMzMktsY/s1600/FFRe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cu9INuVRNKM/VEHQ5UTj9oI/AAAAAAAAxLs/ycwYMzMktsY/s1600/FFRe.jpg\" width=\"253\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(18) Lalabhaksam-(River\nof semen)- for the Hindu who FORCES HIS WIFE TO GIVE HIM A BLOW JOB . His only\nfood will be semen . (<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> better to convert and take blowjobs from 4 wives</span></i> ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(19)\nSarameyasanam(Torment from dogs)- for those guilty of anti-social acts <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sjjfmtIb5cU/VEHRol7oCII/AAAAAAAAxMc/P-56uFDf6h8/s1600/imagddees.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"279\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sjjfmtIb5cU/VEHRol7oCII/AAAAAAAAxMc/P-56uFDf6h8/s1600/imagddees.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(20) Avici( turned into\ndust)- for bearing false witness and false swearing. There are hurled from a\ngreat height and they are utterly smashed into dust when they reached the\nground. They are again restored to life and the punishment is repeated ( <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Oh boy\n!</span></i>)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2xiFlD94ztE/VEHZR6j7v7I/AAAAAAAAxNg/Fbs3-4jpRZw/s1600/05.04.visuau5pathway.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2xiFlD94ztE/VEHZR6j7v7I/AAAAAAAAxNg/Fbs3-4jpRZw/s1600/05.04.visuau5pathway.gif\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DVAU BHUJA KARANAM,\nTHOPPU KARANAM, ITHAM IDUKA VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nGetting back-<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Vali\u2019s death ,\nKing Sugriva treats Tara as a mother figure and salutes her as Tara, lustrous\nas the moon.&nbsp; The Ramavataram signifies\nher white clothes, the sign of a widow. How Lakshamana is reminded of his own\nwidowed mother seeing Tara. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ramayana\npresents Tara as a chaste woman. &nbsp;While\nthe posion injected versions talk of how Surgiva and Tara being drunk though out\nthe day, &nbsp;humping in bed \u2013with his real\nwife Ruma being isolated in another room .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forgetting his promise\nto help Rama in his search of Sita, &nbsp;King\nSugreeva indulged in all types of pleasures, for a prolonged period. &nbsp;This apathy annoyed Rama and he expressed his\ndispleasure to Laksmana. &nbsp;In great anger,\nLaksmana rushed to Kishkindha, to remind King Sugreeva of his broken promise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen mother Tara rose\nto the occasion.&nbsp; She quenched Lakshman\u2019s\nanger . &nbsp;She came out to receive Lakshman\ngracefully and with kind and polished words she was able to convince that\nSugriva had not forgotten his promise. &nbsp;&nbsp;The conversation between Lakshman and Tara\nforms an interesting event in Ramayana.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tara told him that King Sugriva was not\nungrateful. &nbsp;&nbsp;Neither was he cunning or\nheartless. Having suffered untold miseries for a long time, he was now absorbed\nin small pleasures with his wife Ruma. That Sugriva would soon deliver on his\npromise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lakshman cooled down. &nbsp;Then Tara went and instructed King Sugriva in\nprivate how greet and receive Lakshman courteously and talk tactfully. &nbsp;&nbsp;She herself led Lakshman to Sugreeva and\neverything ended on a happy note. &nbsp;&nbsp;Lakshmana was hapy and he apologized for the\nharsh language used in condemning Sugreeva over a broken promise. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the age when women were supposed to have\nlost all individuality, Tara stands out for independent views, level headed and tactful\nbehavior. &nbsp;This why she stands out as one\nof the best among the women of Hinduism.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you really want to\nknow poison injected by the white invader and his stooges- just a few examples--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ravana said to\nVali&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ''</span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">From now on my wife Mandodari\nis yours and all my possessions are yours too.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Similarly Tara and all of yours are mine\ntoo.&nbsp; There is no such thing as yours and\nmine\"</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one stroke of wife swapping they had hoped to\ndestroy two of the most virtuous, chaste and beautiful women \u2013 nay- queens of\nHinduism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader has\nreally sweated it out over brandy and cigars to inject poison into Hindu\nscriptures &nbsp;Tara invokes the power of her\nchastity and curses Rama so that he will soon lose Sita after he regains her. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was just to shore up the FAKE Tulsidas\nversion of Rama abandoning his pregnant wife Sita and rearing her twin sons Luv\nand Kush on her own in the forest ashram.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Jolly good !</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mMjgBvoAzF4/VEH9rQujPTI/AAAAAAAAxOc/gbVyOIrE7B0/s1600/titanic-brassndy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"378\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-mMjgBvoAzF4/VEH9rQujPTI/AAAAAAAAxOc/gbVyOIrE7B0/s1600/titanic-brassndy.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: Readers-- trust me this pains!-- this had happened to me at the same age.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pcAGtLGqXRU/VEJY5svkdxI/AAAAAAAAxOs/zU-QLNsjMo8/s1600/IMG-20141018-WA0001%2B(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pcAGtLGqXRU/VEJY5svkdxI/AAAAAAAAxOs/zU-QLNsjMo8/s1600/IMG-20141018-WA0001%2B(1).jpg\" width=\"325\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2778589754875938154\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_208M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/10/no-farting-please-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1413251569228#c2778589754875938154\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 13, 2014 at 6:52 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_208MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IMPORTANT-- IMPORTANT--IMPORTANT !<br /><br />I WANT ALL MY READERS TO GO THROUGH THE POST BELOW-<br /><br />Being silent does NOT help!<br /><br />http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-satyamev-jayate-smear-campaign-2nd-suspect-traced-in-udaipur-2025484<br /><br />Let me lay down the ground rules:-<br />1) TELLING THE TRUTH IS NOT DEFAMATION/ HATE SPEECH .<br />2) OUR CONSTITUTION ALLOWS FREE SPEECH ESPECIALLY WHEN THE HONOUR OF BHARATMATA IS INVOLVED.<br /><br />What really transpired ?<br /><br />QUOTE : \"In the first part, a malicious blog was written through which negative publicity of the show was done. In that case, we traced the suspect Ajit Vadakayil, 58, a retired captain of the merchant navy from Kerala. Vadakayil admitted to have written the alleged post in 2010-11. He also claimed that he had done some research on the issue before posting it on social media. However, he later realised that his research was wrong and regretted having written the post. Vadakayil was arrested in April and a chargesheet was filed against him.\": UNQUOTE<br /><br />above is not true !<br /><br />It is our family custom that our PITRU PAKSHA and SHRADDH we donate free breakfast/ lunch / dinner to any LARGE orphanage / govt hospital / mental home .<br /><br />So this time we decided to donate to HUMANITY TRUST of SATYAMEVA JAYATE \u2013 the TV show run by Aamir Khan.<br /><br />On searching for the Internet donation site , we found HUMANITY TRUST DOT COM.<br /><br />On checking out what this trust does it was found that this Islamic organization builds Madrassas / Mosques etc.<br /><br />I checked out the first FIVE pages of google search\u2014and did NOT find any other organization with the same name , as FAKE sites swindle money on the Internet .<br /><br />Later SMJ clarified that their donation trust is HUMANITY TRUST DOT ORG.( not dot COM )<br /><br />Now if I or any other man on this planet , were in the shoes of AAMIR KHAN we would be happy , right?<br /><br />WHY IS AAMIR KHAN FURIOUS ?<br /><br />What is the catch?<br /><br />If anybody does NOT agree with me the time to tell is now !<br /><br />This HUMANITY TRUST DOT \u201cORG\u201d DID NOT COME UP ON THE PAGES ON ANY INTERNET SEARCH ENGINE EVEN A YEAR AFTER MY FIRST SEARCH .<br /><br />Yes, I called him NAUTANKIWALLAH ( for crying in every episode ).<br /><br />But then in PURE Hindi this word alludes to ACTOR.<br /><br />During the Narmada Andolan , Aamir Khan\u2019s movie FANAA was stuck, and almost every politician in India came on TV and called Aamir Khan a NAUTANKIWALLAH \u2013and declared they do NOT want a Nautankiwallajh to save India. Aamir Khan did NOT get angry , probably the politicians were hard targets.<br /><br />I had said a few unsavory truths about KNIGHT IN SHINING ARMOUR selling coke one year and pepsi the next year .<br /><br />All my posts have SAILOR LANGUAGE \u2013 as I have been a sailor for 4 decades and in command of ships for 30 years \u2013in fact I hold the world record as a ship captain.<br /><br />My blogsite is:-- ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com.<br /><br />My blogsite does NOT make any money\u2014 I do NOT allow advertisements, though I can make a fortune by doing so. .<br /><br />There are many other sites using variants like ajitvadakayil1 / ajitvadakayil2/ ajitvadakayilmyson etc .<br /><br />Some of them make money using my name , by allowing advertisements.<br /><br />I knew of all this through my readers .<br /><br />IF I WERE AAMIR KHAN I WOULD BE FURIOUS !<br /><br />Why should I be furious when some one tells me that a DUPLICATE site is making money on my FAIR NAME ?<br /><br />THIS IS THE MEANING OF PERCEPTION !<br /><br />THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE\u2014TO TEACH \u201cPERCEPTION\u201d TO THE GOOD DENIZENS OF THIS PLANET.<br /><br />I ask my readers?<br /><br />Is the police force allowed to be a BOUNCER for a TV programme ?<br /><br />By NO means is a person who files an FIR , FIIRRRRSSSSTTTTT the winner in a court case.<br /><br />Are we Indians still slaves ?<br /><br />And in my blog post, I have clearly mentioned that I am a fan of Aamir Khan , and I even put a full GHAJINI song .<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQ4M_AH465Y<br /><br />I still enjoy this song, maybe my mind is FREE without MALICE .<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_208MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" kind=\"i\" o=\"r\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 3:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFollow your inner voice. When reading bhaja govindam previously, even I did not fee comfortable with the first verse saying \"\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0947<br />\n\u0928\u0939\u093f \u0928\u0939\u093f \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u093f \u0921\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0947\". Then again the part where a saffron clad Adi Sankara says<br />\n\u091c\u091f\u093f\u0932\u094b \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0940 \u0932\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0947\u0936\u0903<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u0937\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0930\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0964<br />\n\u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u091a \u0928 \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0942\u0922\u094b<br />\n\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0926\u0930\u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0965 \u0967\u096a\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean<br />\nshaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are<br />\nclothed in orange, yet others in various colours --- all just for<br />\na livelihood.<br />\n<br />\nHow can a saint himself deride saints like this? Even if there are black sheep, will he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself to say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n\u0914\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0924\u093e \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u0928 \u0927\u0930\u0908 \u0964<br />\n\u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924 \u0938\u0947\u0907 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u092c \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0915\u0930\u0908 \u0965\u0969\u096b\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI will not keep any other God in my heart, except Hanuman.<br />\nSo I will not even remember Ram/Vishnu (even though Hanuman himself worships Ram)?<br />\n<br />\nThis never felt right.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as Ajit ji wrote this, it was a Eureka moment.<br />\n<br />\nMany thanks, Ajit ji.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_84MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_84BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 4:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_85MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA, THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE HANUMAN TEMPLE IN INDIA</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BY THE TIME JEW ROTHSCHILD LEFT INDIA WE HAD 20 TIMES MORE HANUMAN TEMPLES THAN RAM TEMPLES</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN RAMAYANA HANUMAN IS A MONKEY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAM WAS THE GOD</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TULSIDAS WHO WRITE HANUMAN CHALISA WAS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HANUMAN IS NOT THE SON OF VAYU</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522592724925#c5545695387053178508\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"text-decoration-line: none;\">April 1, 2018 at 7:55 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/cuttack/odisha-newborn-snatched-by-monkey-found-dead/articleshow/63565559.cms</span><br />IT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO PRESERVED MONKEYS IN INDIA CLAIMING THAT THEY ARE GODS<br /><br />A MONKEY IS NOT EVEN USEFUL WHEN DEAD..<br /><br />WHILE ALIVE THEY ARE DISEASE CARRIERS AND A MENACE<br /><br />MONKEYS IN CITIES ARE TRAINED TO STEAL MOBILE PHONES , GOLD JEWELRY AND PURSES<br /><br />\u201cI had invested Rs 50,000 to plant corn on my 1.2-hectare (ha) farm. Monkeys completely destroyed it,\u201d he says. Ironically, the drawing room where the meeting is convened has a big Hanuman calendar on its wall. \u201cWe worship Hanuman but these monkeys are not his descendants. They belong to the evil monkey king Bali who was slain by Lord Ram,\u201d<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.downtoearth.org.in/coverage/out-of-control-why-monkeys-are-a-menace-50817</span><br /><br />SORRY---<br /><br />HANUMAN WAS A MONKEY<br /><br />KING VALI AND HIS WIFE TARA WERE HUMANS.<br /><br />TARA CURSED RAMA AND SINCE SHE WAS CHASTE THE CURSE TOOK EFFECT --AND HIS NEXT AVATAR KRISHNA WAS KILLED BY JARA<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/king-vali-and-queen-tara-of-ramayana.html</span><br /><br />WE INDIANS DID NOT HAVE A SINGLE HANUMAN TEMPLE BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br /><br />TODAY WE HAVE 20 TIMES MORE HANUMAN TEMPLES THAN RAM TEMPLES.<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD EVEN REMOVED THE GARUDA VAHANA ( VISHNUs CARRIER ) FROM ARJUNAs CHARIOT FLAG IN MAHABHARATA WAR AND INSERTED HANUMAN.<br /><br />IN RAMAYANA THERE IS ONLY ONE GOD-- RAM..<br /><br />DEVADASI WHORES WERE MARRIED OFF TO HANUMAN..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</span><br />HANUMAN CHALISA WAS WRITTEN BY TULSIDAS IN AWADHI--TULSIDAS NEVER EXISTED<br /><br />GORAKHPUR GITA PRESS WHICH PRINTED LAKHS OF HANUMAN CHALISA BOOKLETS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br /><br />WE ASK--<br /><br />EXTERMINATE THE MONKEYS IN CITIES --LEAVING SOME IN FORESTS --FOR ECOLOGICAL BALANCE<br /><br />MONKEYS CAN BE TRAINED IN REMOVAL OF MINES..<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me start off my\nnarrating a REAL life anecdote told at a shipboard party by a Filipino sailor. &nbsp;Few beach bums&nbsp;\ndecided to play black jack. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
