font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They did NOT have the\nmoney to buy a pack of cards- so they decided to do the game with measured farts.\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;So , so- they placed their bets on the table\nand gave short farts as near to 21 as possible. &nbsp;&nbsp;One contestant reached up to 19. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon another guy\nreached 20. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then comes another guy\nwho farted the exact number 21. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his excitement he\nscreamed BLACK JACK and started grabbing ZE money. &nbsp;&nbsp;But in his ungainly effort to grab a small coin at the\nfar end of the table, his gargantuan beer belly pressed on the table and he let go another inadvertent fart, when made him cross\n21 to 22. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and grabbed their money back. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THE LIE OF GREENHOUSE\nGASES CAUSING GLOBAL WARMING &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Pj0GHlfajfU/VDTl7YuwH6I/AAAAAAAAwwI/isyaDuBYia0/s1600/cowfargyuts2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Pj0GHlfajfU/VDTl7YuwH6I/AAAAAAAAwwI/isyaDuBYia0/s1600/cowfargyuts2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Glutton humpless cow fart\nand belch ( methane gas ) is responsible for global warming. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nirm5ZyJyy8/VDTmFj0HLhI/AAAAAAAAwwQ/4O7vyeSbTRk/s1600/imfkkages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cow lobby is so strong that nobody dares\nto raise a voice .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SlQVrvE4GRQ/VDTlpuLEkmI/AAAAAAAAwwA/1YayPC1IO-s/s1600/methane-co2-balancyyue-scale-290a.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SlQVrvE4GRQ/VDTlpuLEkmI/AAAAAAAAwwA/1YayPC1IO-s/s1600/methane-co2-balancyyue-scale-290a.png\" width=\"386\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fart gas is nothing but\npure methane CH4 --which has one carbon atom in the aliphatic hydrocarbon-- two\ncarbon atoms make it ethane, and 3 makes it propane etc-- C1 to C4 is gas, C5\nto C9 is car petrol, C10 to C18 is car diesel\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LCsp-MGzmD0/VDTlkv6z5FI/AAAAAAAAwv4/5IWpVHJP4Q0/s1600/methane-vs-co2-gguuraphic-new.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LCsp-MGzmD0/VDTlkv6z5FI/AAAAAAAAwv4/5IWpVHJP4Q0/s1600/methane-vs-co2-gguuraphic-new.png\" width=\"386\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many of you heard\nof a whoopee bag which gives a real Bronx cheer ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were three fat old\nladies who used to visit my mother at home , for donation to some charity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would NOT have suspected in their wildest dreams that such a\nthing called whoopie bag existed on this planet . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7eOv_AVPjLc/VDT1YAAf4UI/AAAAAAAAwxE/XGnd1hmZQNg/s1600/dowdenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later I heard via the grapevine that this gruesome threesome were no more together, dishing out innuendos .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HjChvdUA4JQ/VDTzcbYSAjI/AAAAAAAAwwo/Hn8qIi5dQmM/s1600/imagh%2Ces.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"196\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HjChvdUA4JQ/VDTzcbYSAjI/AAAAAAAAwwo/Hn8qIi5dQmM/s1600/imagh%2Ces.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/XCpPEnwQe3Q/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XCpPEnwQe3Q&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/XCpPEnwQe3Q&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human gut is host\nto&nbsp; more than 100 trillion individuals\nfrom more than 500 species .. Nine out of every ten cells in our bodies belong\nto microbial species. Western diets ( processed foods, GM foods, antibiotic\ninjected meats )&nbsp; ) are unable to&nbsp; nourish the friendly bacteria. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DKLWwJzP27Q/VDYjUvHxl7I/AAAAAAAAwy0/HyRGSVrcgDw/s1600/imaguyes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DKLWwJzP27Q/VDYjUvHxl7I/AAAAAAAAwy0/HyRGSVrcgDw/s1600/imaguyes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the advent of\npenicillin until the late 1990s, the evil pharma has waged a scorched earth\ncampaign against all microbes, applying antibiotics like napalm to patients'\nintestinal tracts.&nbsp; They did NOT know\nthat they were destroying friendly bacteria which is so important for human\nphysical and mental health.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-X1hHNuhPhks/VDgQuCmQPsI/AAAAAAAAw1w/_RNM8oqPPjM/s1600/imas22ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-X1hHNuhPhks/VDgQuCmQPsI/AAAAAAAAw1w/_RNM8oqPPjM/s1600/imas22ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taken as a whole, the\norganisms in the gut constitute the largest and one of the human body's most\nimportant organs of defence. Gut bacteria manufacture essential vitamins\n(including vitamin K as well as several B vitamins) and a great many other\ncompounds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these compounds\nact on the central nervous system, moderating our appetite and the mechanisms\nthat determine how we store fat. We eat Idli as breakfast with sour curd\nchutney as a culture. Idli is probiotic, while the chutney with fibre is pre-biotic.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-en1-tqn3DMc/VDYjJS4PVLI/AAAAAAAAwys/08G9nbSb_v8/s1600/imaggyges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"217\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-en1-tqn3DMc/VDYjJS4PVLI/AAAAAAAAwys/08G9nbSb_v8/s1600/imaggyges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But under the pressures\nof broad-spectrum antibiotics,&nbsp; mindless\nfood pasteurisation and a Western import&nbsp;\nprocessed canned food diet loaded with preservatives , the human microbe\ncommunity has probably changed more in the past 60 years than in the previous\n30,000, when the shift to agriculture and cooked food ( in India ) altered our\ndiet and lifestyle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With mindless\npasteurization our children are exposed to fewer bacteria . Their immune system\nis NOT qualified to accurately distinguish between good and bad microbes, which\nexplains the escalating rates of allergy, asthma and autoimmune disease in the\ndeveloped world.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 66% of 65\npercent of U.S. corn crops contain a special gene added that allows them to\nproduce an insecticide. This way, when bugs attempt to eat the corn they're\nkilled right away (specifically their stomach is split open) because the plant\ncontains an invisible, built-in pesticide shield.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Genetically modified foods can cause\ndisruption of DNA, which is cancer. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5_PvFNPVfgk/VDYhii7XhgI/AAAAAAAAwyU/7tu_jSygoXo/s1600/dowddnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5_PvFNPVfgk/VDYhii7XhgI/AAAAAAAAwyU/7tu_jSygoXo/s1600/dowddnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\n\"lipstick\" foods which have NIL food value, minerals and vitamins. If\nyou eat a lot of processed foods, for instance, your gut bacteria are going to\nbe compromised because processed foods in general will destroy healthy\nmicroflora and feed bad bacteria and yeast<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your gut has both good\nbacteria and bad bacteria.&nbsp; The human\nbody carries about 100 trillion microorganisms in its intestines, a number ten\ntimes greater than the total number of human cells in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bacteria make up most\nof the flora in the colon and up to 60% of the dry mass of feces.&nbsp; You can feed the probiotics (good bacteria)\nin your gut with prebiotic foods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prebiotics are the\nnutrients that allow the probiotics to thrive inside your intestine. In Kerala\nwe start our morning with probiotics. We eat fermented foods like Idli, Dosa ,\ncurd chutney etc. Having plain yoghurt , or curd after lunch and dinner is\ncommonplace. &nbsp;Your gut is quite literally\nyour second brain as well as the home to 80 percent of your immune system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1OQetDAwQ78/VDfxdxM6OoI/AAAAAAAAwzE/pAqe2wdRG10/s1600/fa6a3579938k16144651244f0ebc6d9f2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1OQetDAwQ78/VDfxdxM6OoI/AAAAAAAAwzE/pAqe2wdRG10/s1600/fa6a3579938k16144651244f0ebc6d9f2.jpg\" width=\"318\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these friendly\nbacteria are INHERITED bacteria which prevents us from getting allergies. Your\ngastrointestinal (GI) tract is not your own. It contains a menagerie of\nmicroorganisms working in conjunction with your body's own cells to process\nfood and assist the immune system. We inherit many of these colonies from our\nmothers during our transit through the birth canal ( natural delivery ) and via\nthe ingestion of breast milk.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antibiotic-associated\ndiarrhea (AAD), is caused when a course of antibiotics scrubs your intestines\nof all bacteria\u2014both friendly and hostile. This \"changes carbohydrate\nmetabolism with decreased short-chain fatty acid absorption\".&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ngSKpr23Odg/VDfxovGl3qI/AAAAAAAAwzM/IYkoACNy0qM/s1600/fartkjh_date.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ngSKpr23Odg/VDfxovGl3qI/AAAAAAAAwzM/IYkoACNy0qM/s1600/fartkjh_date.jpg\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The result: diarrhea, gas, and cramping.\nBut ingesting probiotics such as Lactobacillus rhamnosus could help temporarily\nreplace those decimated cultures until your natural contingent of bacteria\ngrows back while keeping pathogenic bacteria in check. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A reduction of\nbeneficial bacteria lead to digestive problems causing poor immunity and\nmetabolism , yeast infections , urinary tract infections etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prebiotics and\nprobiotics are vital to your health, as they help to keep your intestine\nworking properly. Foods that stimulate the production of the bacteria in the\ndigestive system could help burn off pounds quicker than by eating less or\nexercising more. Morbidly obese people fed up of fruitless exercising and\ndieting must understand this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fibre in the food is of\nparamount importance .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you seen young\npeople looking old? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3OGoHEn_ivE/VDfxwsNTzDI/AAAAAAAAwzU/AUnpyEuOxdk/s1600/ima88kges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3OGoHEn_ivE/VDfxwsNTzDI/AAAAAAAAwzU/AUnpyEuOxdk/s1600/ima88kges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aging process\nresults from the activity of putrefactive (proteolytic) microbes producing\ntoxic substances in the large bowel.&nbsp;\nIntroducing \"good\" bacteria into the gut, helps maintain\nimmune system activity, which in turn helps the body react more quickly to new\ninfections.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The teacher asked\nlittle Johnny to use the word \" definitely \" in a sentence. Little\nJohnny replies, \"Teacher, do farts have lumps in them?\" The Teacher\nsays, \"Of course not Johnny,\" To which Johnny replies, \"Then I\nhave definitely sh*t my pants,\".&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gut flora's primary\nbenefit to the host is the gleaning of energy from the fermentation of\nundigested carbohydrates and the subsequent absorption of short chain fatty\nacids. Good flora increase the gut's absorption of water, reduce counts of\ndamaging bacteria, increase growth of human gut cells, and stimulate growth of\nindigenous bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gut sends&nbsp; signals to the brain, via the vagus nerve\nwhich explains why stress can often be the cause of gastrointestinal\nproblems.&nbsp; It is two way street here.\nPrebiotics are a type of fiber that is indigestible in the intestine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j9o5iy1TLWI/VDfx313DqWI/AAAAAAAAwzc/iZVCN3proV4/s1600/imaddges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-j9o5iy1TLWI/VDfx313DqWI/AAAAAAAAwzc/iZVCN3proV4/s1600/imaddges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The beneficial bacteria\nfeed off prebiotics in order to survive.&nbsp;\nPrebiotics do not replace bacteria, but help feed and maintain levels of\n\u2018good\u2019 bacteria in the digestive tract.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prebiotics help your\nimmune system by keeping the beneficial bacteria healthy enough to help fight\noff disease.&nbsp; Prebiotics are mainly found\nin fruits, barley, onions, vegetables and some grains. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A broke dirty Cowboy\nwalks into a bar and says, \"Gimme whiskey.\" The bartender says,\n\"I'll have to see your money first.\" \"I'm broke, but if you give\nme a bottle of whiskey, I'll get up on that stage and fart Dixie!\" The\nbartender had never seen someone fart any kind of song, so he agrees. The\nCowboy drinks the whole bottle of whiskey, then staggers up on stage and the\naudience start applauding. Then he drops his pants and the audience start\ncheering even louder. Then, he proceeds to shit all over the stage, and\neveryone gets disgusted and leave. The bartender screams, \"You said you\nwere gonna fart Dixie! Not shit all over my stage!\"&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">And the Cowboy\nreplies, \"Hey! Even Frank Sinatra had to clear his throat before he\nsang!\"</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They selectively feed\nthe good bacteria such as lactobacilli and bifidobacteria without feeding the\nbad types.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a prebiotic, garlic\ncan help probiotics thrive within the intestine. When consumed together, the\nindigestible prebiotics in the garlic will remain in the intestine where the\nprobiotics that live there can use it as food.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Poor food choices, emotional stress, lack of sleep, antibiotic overuse,\nother drugs, and environmental influences can all shift the balance in favor of\nthe bad bacteria.&nbsp; When the digestive\ntract is healthy, it filters out and eliminates things that can damage it, such\nas harmful bacteria, toxins, chemicals, and other waste products.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2sKEZQSqwGQ/VDgQBCpbBpI/AAAAAAAAw1g/ithd5W7QQIY/s1600/dowgrenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raw, unheated honey is nature\u2019s only\npredigested food.&nbsp; Unheated honey is a\nprebiotic supplies a rich array of nutrients, including amino acids and\nenzymes.&nbsp; The body uses pure honey for\nquick energy . Consumed in small amounts, honey does not contribute to blood\nsugar imbalances.&nbsp; Raw, unheated honey is\nthe best sweetener, and we used this in ancient India.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KAFDD3s8f1Q/VDgQSezTs4I/AAAAAAAAw1o/iGDkZQKBEeY/s1600/imajhvdges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
