, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Choosing the right\nprebiotic foods containing fibre that help protect the intestines, and&nbsp; boost the metabolism and reduce inflammation\nin the body.&nbsp; Prebiotics mostly come from\ncarbohydrate fibers called oligosaccharides. .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yv4dGx_TcFo/VDfyCOTRCTI/AAAAAAAAwzs/j67Y80QL_HE/s1600/imagcces.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yv4dGx_TcFo/VDfyCOTRCTI/AAAAAAAAwzs/j67Y80QL_HE/s1600/imagcces.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probiotics are\nbeneficial bacteria similar to those found naturally in the gut.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probiotics are defined\nby the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) as\n\"Live microorganisms which when administered in adequate amounts confer a\nhealth benefit on the host\" Probiotics remain in the gut and act to aid in\ndigestion and immunity. Probiotics are naturally found in yogurt and hard\ncheese.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without adequate prebiotics, the probiotics may not get enough\nnutrients to survive, and the natural flora of your intestine will change. If\nthe beneficial bacteria are underpopulated, other, more harmful bacteria can\nmove in, potentially causing gastrointestinal problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mFPorZ3eQFg/VDfyHRFza_I/AAAAAAAAwz0/a4P5y3GwKT8/s1600/imagddwes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mFPorZ3eQFg/VDfyHRFza_I/AAAAAAAAwz0/a4P5y3GwKT8/s1600/imagddwes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probiotics \u2013 the\nbeneficial bacteria ,calms the immune system and reduce inflammation,&nbsp; shortens the duration and severity of\nallergies and reduce the risk of serious diseases\u2014all by improing the health\nand function of the gut. Prebiotic fiber is not affected by heat, cold, acid or\ntime. Probiotics can be killed by heat, acid or simply the passage of time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prebiotics nourish the thousands of good bacterial species already living in\nthe colon.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Probiotics contain from one\nto a few species of bacteria which are added to the colon when they are\ningested (eaten).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive drinking\nalcohol destroys the good bacteria.&nbsp;\nEating meat from FDI stores and fast food joints KFC etc pumped with\nantibiotics kills the gut flora.&nbsp;\nProbiotic bacteria use cholesterol as fuel. It&nbsp; reduces the amount of cholesterol your liver\nmakes.&nbsp; Ingesting probiotics may lead to\na significant increase in good (HDL) cholesterol, which is difficult to raise\nby other ways.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Shlf3DhCnyw/VDfyNuokMlI/AAAAAAAAwz8/GrWo_PPWMTo/s1600/imagekjbgs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Shlf3DhCnyw/VDfyNuokMlI/AAAAAAAAwz8/GrWo_PPWMTo/s1600/imagekjbgs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intestinal problems can\nalso arise when the lining of the intestines is damaged.&nbsp; Taking probiotics may help maintain the\nintegrity of the lining of the intestines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Probiotics can\npreventing eczema associated with A1 humpless cow\u2019s milk allergy. They suppress\nthe growth of pathogens.&nbsp; Drink only A2\nmilk taken from humped cows. Eat organic vegetables.&nbsp; Broiler poultry grown just for meat is always\ninjected with hormone and antibiotics.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.Avoid consuming sugar,\nincluding fructose, and processed foods (which virtually all contain added\nsugar and fructose). The sugars serve as fuel for the growth of pathogenic\nanaerobic bacteria, fungi and yeast, and competitively inhibit your good\nbacteria, tending to crowd them out of their appropriate niche. These\npathogenic bacteria, fungi and yeast then produce metabolic waste products that\nwill cause your health to deteriorate.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A lady\nwalks into a BMW dealership. She browses around, spots the Top-of-the-line\nBeemer and walks over to inspect it. As she bends over to feel the fine leather\nupholstery, she inadvertently breaks Wind. Very embarrassed, she looks around\nnervously to see if anyone has noticed her little accident and prays that a\nsales person doesn't pop up right now. As she turns around, her worst nightmare\nmaterializes in the form of a salesman standing right behind her. Cool as a\ncucumber and displaying complete professionalism, the salesman greets the lady\nWith, \"Good day, Madame. How may we help you today?\" Very\nuncomfortably, but hoping that the salesman may just not have been there at the\ntime of her accident, she asks, \"Sir, what is the price of this lovely\nvehicle?\" He answers, \"Madam, if you farted just touching it, you are\ngoing to shit yourself when I tell you the price.\"&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GN_8qe_EJk4/VDfyUIeOxzI/AAAAAAAAw0E/AO0gjSG87TI/s1600/imagelpopps.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GN_8qe_EJk4/VDfyUIeOxzI/AAAAAAAAw0E/AO0gjSG87TI/s1600/imagelpopps.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western diets are\nfilled with sweets and sugars, processed foods, and fast foods. These foods\ndamage and inflame the intestinal walls, promoting overgrowth of bad bacteria\nand yeasts and breakdown of the intestinal barrier that leads to leaky gut..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dnZnjbQF7nc/VDfy2W49tnI/AAAAAAAAw0M/MTSuF4KXa0U/s1600/imal7ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"307\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dnZnjbQF7nc/VDfy2W49tnI/AAAAAAAAw0M/MTSuF4KXa0U/s1600/imal7ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intermittent distention\nof the abdomen is caused by excessive formation of intestinal gas. Flatulence\n(farting) results from the production of gas by bacteria within the intestines\nwhen they digest sugars and polysaccharides.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nExcessive production of gas can be from bacterial overgrowth of the\nsmall intestine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The usual cause of\nbelching is a distended (inflated) stomach caused by swallowed air. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bloating is the\nsubjective sensation (feeling) that the abdomen is full or larger than normal<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CxNfsPr7i6o/VDf0qWlyRBI/AAAAAAAAw0g/W0OBTsxrer4/s1600/nhg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CxNfsPr7i6o/VDf0qWlyRBI/AAAAAAAAw0g/W0OBTsxrer4/s1600/nhg.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intermittent distention\nis usually due to the occasional accumulation of gas and/or fluid within the\nstomach, small intestine, or colon.&nbsp;\nFlatulence, also known as farting, is the act of passing intestinal gas\nfrom the anus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bacteria produce\nthe gas (primarily hydrogen and/or methane) when they digest foods, primarily\nsugars and nondigestible polysaccharides (for example, starch, cellulose), that\nhave not been digested during passage through the small intestine. The bacteria\nalso produce carbon dioxide, but the carbon dioxide is so rapidly absorbed from\nthe intestine that very little passes in flatus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_q8MTy9Bn0w/VDf0lybf_BI/AAAAAAAAw0Y/mFXuDtJvsr8/s1600/imluilages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_q8MTy9Bn0w/VDf0lybf_BI/AAAAAAAAw0Y/mFXuDtJvsr8/s1600/imluilages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugars that are\ncommonly digested poorly (maldigested) and malabsorbed are lactose, sorbitol,\nand fructose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lactose is the sugar in\nmilk. The absence of the enzyme lactase in the lining of the intestines, which\nis a genetic trait, causes the maldigestion. Lactase is important because it\nbreaks apart the lactose so that it can be absorbed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorbitol is a commonly\nused sweetener in low calorie foods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fructose, primarily as\nhigh fructose corn syrup, is a commonly used sweetener in all types of candies\nand drinks.&nbsp; You drink coke and you fart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_s7GCZq7pn4/VDf0vrIGDwI/AAAAAAAAw0o/LOZDi5tpAcM/s1600/tiger_farlngdt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_s7GCZq7pn4/VDf0vrIGDwI/AAAAAAAAw0o/LOZDi5tpAcM/s1600/tiger_farlngdt.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas is primarily composed\nof carbon dioxide, oxygen, nitrogen, hydrogen, and sometimes methane. Flatus,\ngas passed through the anus, may also contain small amounts of gasses that\ncontain sulfur. Flatus that contains more sulfur gasses has more odor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Burping allows some gas\nto leave the stomach. The remaining gas moves into the small intestine, where\nit is partially absorbed. A small amount travels into the large intestine for\nrelease through the anus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YzMcA3iFT2c/VDgOSbr1SlI/AAAAAAAAw1A/CEpOQSM_PGc/s1600/imagses%2B(2).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YzMcA3iFT2c/VDgOSbr1SlI/AAAAAAAAw1A/CEpOQSM_PGc/s1600/imagses%2B(2).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stomach and small\nintestine do not fully digest some carbohydrates\u2014sugars, starches, and fiber\nfound in many foods. This undigested food passes through the small intestine to\nthe large intestine. Once there, undigested carbohydrates are broken down by\nbacteria in the large intestine, which release hydrogen and carbon dioxide in\nthe process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z3zsHEMiPGg/VDiSfWt66dI/AAAAAAAAw2Q/eL_PdFyqz78/s1600/fat-guyyy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z3zsHEMiPGg/VDiSfWt66dI/AAAAAAAAw2Q/eL_PdFyqz78/s1600/fat-guyyy.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other types of bacteria in the large intestine take in hydrogen\ngas and create methane gas or hydrogen sulfide, the most common sulfur gas in\nflatus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">people with conditions\nthat cause constipation are more likely to produce detectable amounts of\nmethane.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yZLeXBAV95o/VDgOLcbbBNI/AAAAAAAAw04/eAB0Qqd_06w/s1600/imnfages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yZLeXBAV95o/VDgOLcbbBNI/AAAAAAAAw04/eAB0Qqd_06w/s1600/imnfages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the gas produced in the intestines is\nabsorbed by the bloodstream and carried to the lungs, where it is released in\nthe breath.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fyS0jKVhkV0/VDgPMLqoqKI/AAAAAAAAw1Y/ynI4GI7qcoE/s1600/lli.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"223\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fyS0jKVhkV0/VDgPMLqoqKI/AAAAAAAAw1Y/ynI4GI7qcoE/s1600/lli.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most convenient way\nto test for bacterial overgrowth of the small intestine is hydrogen/methane\nbreath testing.&nbsp; Normally, the gas\nproduced by the bacteria of the colon is composed of hydrogen and/or\nmethane.&nbsp; For hydrogen/methane breath\ntesting, a non-digestible sugar, lactulose, is consumed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yl10a4oP9Ok/VDgOuxBDCSI/AAAAAAAAw1Q/XgGmt3N2DtY/s1600/imagibfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yl10a4oP9Ok/VDgOuxBDCSI/AAAAAAAAw1Q/XgGmt3N2DtY/s1600/imagibfes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At regular intervals following ingestion,\nsamples of breath are taken for analysis.&nbsp;\nWhen the lactulose reaches the colon, the bacteria form hydrogen and/or\nmethane.&nbsp; Some of the hydrogen or methane\nis absorbed into the blood and eliminated in the breath where it can be\nmeasured in the samples of breath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-plPyQENvaNs/VDgOoWO3Z-I/AAAAAAAAw1I/2xccF6-SkD0/s1600/immhages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-plPyQENvaNs/VDgOoWO3Z-I/AAAAAAAAw1I/2xccF6-SkD0/s1600/immhages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In normal individuals,\nthere is one peak of hydrogen or methane when the lactulose enters the colon.\nIn individuals who have bacterial overgrowth, there are two peaks of hydrogen\nor methane. The first occurs when the lactulose passes and is exposed to the\nbacteria in the small intestine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b5QyDQQhgHY/VDiR3OS-UFI/AAAAAAAAw2A/gqlTcVy2Y04/s1600/diagsssram2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b5QyDQQhgHY/VDiR3OS-UFI/AAAAAAAAw2A/gqlTcVy2Y04/s1600/diagsssram2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second occurs when the lactulose enters\nthe colon and is exposed to the colonic bacteria. Hydrogen breath testing for\novergrowth also may be done utilizing lactose, glucose, sorbitol, or fructose\nas the test sugar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GT4iRxIQYP8/VDiSL88JBPI/AAAAAAAAw2I/7iP8vj5iEG0/s1600/diajjgram3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"576\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GT4iRxIQYP8/VDiSL88JBPI/AAAAAAAAw2I/7iP8vj5iEG0/s1600/diajjgram3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogurt, in which the\nlactose has been broken down partially by bacteria, produces less gas than\nmilk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are certain types\nof vegetables and fruits that contain types of starches that are poorly\ndigested by people but well digested by bacteria.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uHO85blfSLo/VDiS8PkMMAI/AAAAAAAAw2c/MAxGi32CfP4/s1600/imaytges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uHO85blfSLo/VDiS8PkMMAI/AAAAAAAAw2c/MAxGi32CfP4/s1600/imaytges.png\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These include beans, lentils,\ncabbage, brussels sprouts, onions, carrots, apricots, and prunes. Reducing the\nintake of these vegetables and fruits, as well as foods made from whole grains,\nshould reduce gas and flatulence.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6nc1ouRBMas/VD0WtJM063I/AAAAAAAAw-g/DYApMZDbXVc/s1600/farming-farm-ozonebcarbon_monoxide-cow_farmer-cows-19833165_low.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6nc1ouRBMas/VD0WtJM063I/AAAAAAAAw-g/DYApMZDbXVc/s1600/farming-farm-ozonebcarbon_monoxide-cow_farmer-cows-19833165_low.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Doctor's Visit Doctor:\n\"What seems to be the problem today?\" Patient: \"Doc, I've got\nthe farts. I mean I fart all the time,\" The Doctor nods, \"Hmm.\"&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Patient: \"My farts do not stink and you can't hear them. It's just that I\nfart all the time. Look, we've been talking here for about 10 minutes and I've\nfarted five times.\" \"Hmm,\" says the Doctor, as he picks up his\npad and writes out a prescription.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The patient is thrilled \"Thank you Doc.\nThis prescription, will it really clear up my farts?\" \"No,\"\nsighs the Doctor, \"The prescription is to clear your sinuses, it stinks\nlike a fermented diaper in here.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Next week I want you back here for a hearing\ntest.\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ROIt7JTnbMU/VDi7WFXlOQI/AAAAAAAAw3E/AXuHVbnLbgg/s1600/imo8yages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ROIt7JTnbMU/VDi7WFXlOQI/AAAAAAAAw3E/AXuHVbnLbgg/s1600/imo8yages.jpg\" width=\"276\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flatulence refers to\nthe passage of rectal gas. The gas is generally a combination of swallowed air\nand gas produced by the action of colon bacteria on undigested carbohydrates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary components\nof gas &nbsp;are five odorless gases:\nnitrogen, hydrogen, carbon dioxide, methane, and oxygen. The characteristic\nsmelly odor is attributed to trace gases such as skatole, indole, and\nsulfur-containing compounds.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flammable character of flatus is caused by\nhydrogen and methane. The proportions of these gases depend largely on the\nbacteria that live in the human colon that digest, or ferment, food that has\nnot been absorbed by the gastrointestinal (GI) tract before reaching the colon.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WYJpQHKQjoA/VD0W0oPtUFI/AAAAAAAAw-o/rSNwvnvdG5E/s1600/imaO8Yges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WYJpQHKQjoA/VD0W0oPtUFI/AAAAAAAAw-o/rSNwvnvdG5E/s1600/imaO8Yges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the body does not digest and absorb some carbohydrates (for example, the\nsugar, starches, and fiber found in many foods) in the small intestine because\nof a shortage or absence of certain enzymes there, this undigested food then\npasses from the small intestine into the large intestine, where normal,\nharmless bacteria break down the food, producing hydrogen, carbon dioxide, and,\nin about a third of all people, methane. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zTIpfiwf9E4/VDi7QrKRo8I/AAAAAAAAw28/239We_L8ABQ/s1600/ippmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zTIpfiwf9E4/VDi7QrKRo8I/AAAAAAAAw28/239We_L8ABQ/s1600/ippmages.jpg\" width=\"318\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbonated drinks can\ncause bloating because the carbon dioxide bubbles they contain foster the\nformation of gas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most foods that contain\ncarbohydrates can cause gas. By contrast, fats and proteins cause little gas. Rice\nis the only starch that does not cause gas. Carbohydrates are the biggest\nculprits when it comes to gas producers because they\u2019re made up of\npolysaccharides, which have long chains of difficult-to-digest sugars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the starches in\nwheat, oats, potatoes, and, to a lesser extent, corn, all may reach the colon.\nThese starches, therefore, may result in the production of appreciable amounts\nof gas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Many foods contain soluble and insoluble\nfiber. Soluble fiber dissolves easily in water and takes on a soft, gel-like\ntexture in the intestines. Found in oat bran, beans, peas, and most fruits,\nsoluble fiber is not broken down until it reaches the large intestine, where\ndigestion causes gas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insoluble fiber, on the other hand, passes essentially\nunchanged through the intestines and produces little gas. Wheat bran and some\nvegetables contain this kind of fiber.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flatulence and wind are\nsymptoms related to gas in the gastrointestinal (GI) system. 'Flatulence'\nusually refers to gas passed per rectum. 'Wind' as a symptom may mean either\nbelching (gas passed from the stomach outwards via the mouth) or gas passed per\nrectum (or even just feeling bloated). 'Eructation' is another term for\nbelching.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body needs to get\nrid of the build-up by farting (flatulence) or burping (belching).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CxNLse-gtw0/VDi7KCdUQ0I/AAAAAAAAw20/Z0mX3VUntjg/s1600/imaghbfes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CxNLse-gtw0/VDi7KCdUQ0I/AAAAAAAAw20/Z0mX3VUntjg/s1600/imaghbfes.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belching or burping is\nyour body's way of expelling excess air from your stomach. It's a normal reflex\ncaused by swallowing air. You may swallow excess air if you eat or drink too\nfast, talk while you eat, chew gum or suck on hard candies, drink carbonated\nbeverages, or smoke.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c3qALxCc56Q/VDqZoAJ3tHI/AAAAAAAAw40/eToTlHMEokM/s1600/Trying-not-to-fartee3-meme-resizecrop--.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-c3qALxCc56Q/VDqZoAJ3tHI/AAAAAAAAw40/eToTlHMEokM/s1600/Trying-not-to-fartee3-meme-resizecrop--.jpg\" width=\"238\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people swallow air as a nervous habit \u2014 even when\nthey're not eating or drinking. In other cases, chronic belching may be related\nto inflammation of the stomach lining (gastritis) or to an infection with\nHelicobacter pylori, the bacteria responsible for some stomach ulcers. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hSLhksCrhhc/VDqZe3HlyUI/AAAAAAAAw4s/30WNxkgFCsM/s1600/smell-my-own-fart-humbbor-sarcastic-funny-t-shirt.american-apparel-unisex-fitted-tee.white.w760h760.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hSLhksCrhhc/VDqZe3HlyUI/AAAAAAAAw4s/30WNxkgFCsM/s1600/smell-my-own-fart-humbbor-sarcastic-funny-t-shirt.american-apparel-unisex-fitted-tee.white.w760h760.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Belching may signal a more serious upper GI\ndisorder such as peptic ulcer disease, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD),\nor gastroparesis. Because bacteria are largely responsible for the production\nof hydrogen, an increase in exhaled hydrogen as measured by the breath test\nwill suggest a food intolerance, with the bacteria fermenting the undigested\nfood to produce excess gas. After the patient eats a problem food, breath\ntesting should show an increase in hydrogen in as little as 2 hours.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drink before meals. If\nyou drink liquids with your meals, you lose stomach acids and then can\u2019t break\ndown the foods as well</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gas which accumulates\nin the right upper portion of the colon can lead to pain which could seem like\ngallbladder pain. Gas which accumulates in the left upper portion of the colon\ncan radiate up to the chest and seem like cardiac pain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Zh7dwOuc5I/VDi7BxBuueI/AAAAAAAAw2s/5Xyy5vI9g14/s1600/imaguyes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--Zh7dwOuc5I/VDi7BxBuueI/AAAAAAAAw2s/5Xyy5vI9g14/s1600/imaguyes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">This is a true incident\nwitnessed by my friend nearly 36 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">One old man was\nstanding in a crowded tram enroute from Kidderpore to Dharamtalla.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">His ass was a level\nwith a fat lady\u2019s face who occupied the aisle seat .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He let go a silent dangerous\nfart, and the woman\u2019s nose was just 6 inches off. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">She wrinkled her nose\nand protested \u201c This is NOT good !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">It happened 2 more\ntimes \u2013 the old man farting and the fat woman poking him viciously on the ribs\nand telling him \u201c This is NOT good !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">When it happened again\n, the old man turned around and told the fat lady- \u201c LISTEN , I CANT DO ANY\nBETTER , SO YOU MIGHT AS WELL STOP POKING ME ON MY RIBS !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HaMM7h2L0gQ/VDj4uxV7S2I/AAAAAAAAw3c/day4CRNBT7Q/s1600/imajhges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HaMM7h2L0gQ/VDj4uxV7S2I/AAAAAAAAw3c/day4CRNBT7Q/s1600/imajhges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some carbohydrates\ncannot be digested by the enzymes in the small intestine and reach the colon\nwhere bacteria metabolize them to hydrogen and carbon dioxide gasses. Examples\nof such food are bran, cabbage, cauliflower, broccoli, and beans. This can\nresult in excess flatulence in some patients.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many patients experience\nabdominal cramps, bloating and flatulence when they ingest A1 humpless cow\nmilk, certain cheeses or ice cream because they lack the enzyme (lactase) which\nis required to digest milk sugars (lactose). This condition, called lactose\nintolerance, is common in India.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/GO3lgO55kuY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GO3lgO55kuY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GO3lgO55kuY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foods that contain fiber, sugars, and starches\nthat don't get digested and absorbed, eventually causing intestinal gas when\nthey are finally broken down in the large intestine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid artificial\nsweeteners. Sorbitol and related sugar alcohols used in many sugar-free\nversions of foods can also aggravate gas as they are digested by gut bacteria\nwhich ferment and release gas.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GVyUqY96xcY/VDj5RonJASI/AAAAAAAAw3k/MkwuJ73syM0/s1600/imiugcvages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GVyUqY96xcY/VDj5RonJASI/AAAAAAAAw3k/MkwuJ73syM0/s1600/imiugcvages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are lactose intolerant are unable to\ndigest lactose, the sugar that is found in milk and milk products. Many\npeople&nbsp; normally have low levels of the\nenzyme lactase needed to digest lactose after childhood. Also, as people age,\ntheir enzyme levels decrease.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/wJQoxdSFTJ0/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/wJQoxdSFTJ0&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/wJQoxdSFTJ0&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beans contain large\namounts of the complex sugar known as raffinose. Most starches (potatoes, corn,\nnoodles, and wheat) produce gas as they are broken down in the large intestine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a person is\nconstipated or has decreased bowel function for any reason, flatulence can\nfollow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alterations in bowel\nhabits can be a result of the following:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Poor dietary fiber<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Parasites<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Inflammatory bowel\ndisease<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Intestinal obstruction\n(including cancer)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Diverticulosis or\ndiverticulitis<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Poor thyroid function<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Narcotic and other drug\nuse</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If fart odor is a great\nconcern, then help is at hand\u2014you can line your as$hole area with activated &nbsp;charcoal filter undergarments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0DWL6GI65lE/VDj4XUiun7I/AAAAAAAAw3U/qfbKpzBHJfA/s1600/dowceenload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0DWL6GI65lE/VDj4XUiun7I/AAAAAAAAw3U/qfbKpzBHJfA/s1600/dowceenload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flatulence (passing\nintestinal gas) prevents gas from accumulating in the intestines.&nbsp; There are two other ways in which gas can\nescape the intestine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9jBcGtlB2VI/VDqUKAIaqeI/AAAAAAAAw4E/EHiAWM5e_NM/s1600/colon_intestssines.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9jBcGtlB2VI/VDqUKAIaqeI/AAAAAAAAw4E/EHiAWM5e_NM/s1600/colon_intestssines.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First, it can be\nabsorbed across the lining of the intestine into the blood. The gas then\ntravels in the blood and ultimately is excreted in the breath. Have you ever\nwondered why some people have sh#t breath?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FGNFEReEcZw/VDqTgjoJgQI/AAAAAAAAw30/xfIPl5lKPuA/s1600/good_bad_bactxxeriawebsite_330_211_s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"255\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FGNFEReEcZw/VDqTgjoJgQI/AAAAAAAAw30/xfIPl5lKPuA/s1600/good_bad_bactxxeriawebsite_330_211_s.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Second, gas can be\nremoved and used by certain types of bacteria within the intestine. In fact,\nmost of the gas that is formed by bacteria in the intestines is removed by\nother bacteria in the intestines<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DJBur2ZsTS4/VDqWLJLCQaI/AAAAAAAAw4Q/B0bn2CkdOus/s1600/imssages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DJBur2ZsTS4/VDqWLJLCQaI/AAAAAAAAw4Q/B0bn2CkdOus/s1600/imssages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of gas that\nbacteria produce varies from individual to individual. In other words, some\nindividuals may have bacteria that produce more gas, either because there are\nmore of the bacteria or because their particular bacteria are better at\nproducing gas.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/yFwrHoKkZBc/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/yFwrHoKkZBc&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/yFwrHoKkZBc&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There may be poor\ndigestion and absorption of foods in the small intestine, allowing more\nundigested food to reach the bacteria in the colon. The more undigested food\nthe bacteria have, the more gas they produce.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7lBieoAMxb8/VDqWcW3dLkI/AAAAAAAAw4Y/0uvtWawsAhs/s1600/Probiotics-sswvs-Prebiotics-Graphic.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7lBieoAMxb8/VDqWcW3dLkI/AAAAAAAAw4Y/0uvtWawsAhs/s1600/Probiotics-sswvs-Prebiotics-Graphic.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples of diseases of that\ninvolve poor digestion and absorption include lactose intolerance, pancreatic\ninsufficiency, and celiac disease.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BH3vqoIMIrQ/VDqT8XejuuI/AAAAAAAAw38/mKdlhmPnQzo/s1600/intestinal-microflorass-410.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"351\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BH3vqoIMIrQ/VDqT8XejuuI/AAAAAAAAw38/mKdlhmPnQzo/s1600/intestinal-microflorass-410.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bacterial overgrowth\ncan occur in the small intestine. Under normal conditions, the bacteria that\nproduce gas are limited to the colon. In some conditions, these bacteria spread\ninto the small intestine. When this bacterial spread occurs, food reaches the\nbacteria before it can be fully digested and absorbed by the small intestine.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VzS7Qq7S4Hw/VDqWn85QJzI/AAAAAAAAw4g/LGPb-z8w5VI/s1600/best-probissstic-for-leaky-gut-3-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VzS7Qq7S4Hw/VDqWn85QJzI/AAAAAAAAw4g/LGPb-z8w5VI/s1600/best-probissstic-for-leaky-gut-3-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, the bacteria in the small intestine have a lot of undigested food\nfrom which to form gas. This condition in which the gas-producing bacteria move\ninto the small intestine is called bacterial overgrowth of the small intestine\n(bowel).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/s0Y5JJmsVfs/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/s0Y5JJmsVfs&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/s0Y5JJmsVfs&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What's the definition\nof bravery? <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Tear Gas.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-NN9U0kVCudY/VDtIID4WFeI/AAAAAAAAw5U/NnZYWhZukLQ/s1600/funny-farswat-jokes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
